115b6: pa'i rlung thams cad/ / rnam 'gyur byas pa'i bar thim bya// rnam par shes pa 'dres gyur pa'ang // khams thams cad kyi bcud len te// 'thungs pas dngos grub thob par 'gyur// dbang po rnams bgrod mtshan nyid las/
115b7: rgan gyi phyogs su gnas pa'i lce// a ba d+hU tIr de rab bshad// cha shas can gyi tha ma yi// bdud rtsi'i rgyun ni 'dzag par 'gyur// rtsa thams cad du bkang ba ste// yang dag rig pa'i gzugs su thim// mdor bsdus pas
115b8: ni khams lnga ste/ / gzhan gyi dngos po 'dir mi brjod// dbang chen la ni me yis sreg/ chu yis dbus su rab tu thim// myur du zhu nas 'gro bar 'gyur// rlung gi nam mkha' la gnas so// chu yi tshogs ni bsam

116a1: thas pas/ nga na sa na/ sa sa na las ma/ ga mam 'a'a'ams lal/ nams dgas / lag sa dad
116a2: shes bya bdag/ de ltar 'od dpag med pa bsgom/ rtsibs brgyad legs par brtan pa'o// shes bya'i 'khor lo 'di bsgom bya// bum
116a3: tha ma Amra/ / d+ham mo ngomaka 'dreg// rlung du d+ha thamashes du ma grod das mams mang bzhin// de bzhin 'dal 'di rnams dgod// a i sa e myo as don nams// bag gas la sogs ga ldan/
116a4: shar la sogs par dgod par bya// ring po de nyid de dgod bya// aM aHnyi ma zlar shes bya// nyi ma zla ba 'dir grol ba// ku li re la nyi ma ste// gza' lhag gdod lnga pa 'dir gnas// mthar ni gang zhig lhag ma yi//
116a5: sa so tshogs za bar 'gyur// rwas rnams kyis brgyan pa yi// 'gro kun la phan 'khor lo de// de ltar dol 'khor lor 'gyur// nu s+yA na se dus da shAg/ lag nams rag sogs dang // tha ba dang nyim dam/
116a6: 'ad ba'i mtshan nyid mngon pa na// mdor bsdus pa yis bshad par bya// rgyu skar dus chod yang dag ldan// gza' dang nang ni de bzhin te// dom+ba rAsa'i tshad kyis ni// skye ba'i las su brjod pa yin// kAr tika dang bar
116a7: 6/ / mgang ma de bzhin smin drag ste// de la 'chi bar shes par bya// rgal ten la 'byor ba med na'o// mAr ga shAr kha mgo dang ni// gzangagaganyis la skyob// mgul pa'i nang kyis nyin bkan// khrumachog la
116a8: na rtag tu tsho/ / d+ha la dang phraga'i du sar dang // gza' lag 'khrig pa la 'cha'o// ku li ram nu'i ches brgyad kyi// tho ngas pa sangs la 'tsha'o// sre dang mchu la thug dang // chos bcu srin paseng ge la// ba pom lnga

116b1: shes bya/ / ga sa pa m+b+ha man+ta // ma lams ma// sa ba rna dang // gas yo nga// gags sa sa ASh+Ta // zlu
116b2: bya/ / sngon dang bcugacig nag po dang // pur bu sdig pa la 'chi'o// chu stod chu srad tshes dgu dang // gro 'on bani dang pa sangs 'chi// grozhin tshes bdun zla ba dang / rgyal dang chu srin la nor med// zhubs stong
116b3: khrums smad bcu gsum pa/ / zla ba mon gre bum pas 'dzad// tha skar brgyad pa nam gru dang // spen pa dang ni nyal 'chi// sems can kun gyi skye ba'i rtsis// dus smras pas ni shes par bya// sa bon gcig las skyes
116b4: yon tan/ / gnyis pa skye ba'i dus kyis so// rigs gnyis su ni shes byas nas// de'i dus skye rtsis brtsam par bya// sngon las rnam pa sna tshogs kyis// mkhas pas de'i rigs su skye'o// de yi 'bras su shes
116b5: bya ste/ / mtshan nyid kyis ni rjes su gnas// rA si sogs 'khor 'brel ba de// rnam shes kun gyi mtshan nyid do// 'od dpag med kyi rab sbyor bas// dkyil 'khor gsal bar bsgom par bya// dbus su 'od dpag
116b6: med mgon po/ / lhag mar mkha' 'gro ma sogs so// de ni rnam shes skyes gsal bar// las kyi 'bras bur de dran bya// thams cad bde ba kun sbyor las// de tshe gnyis med la rten pa'i// 'od dpag med kyi sbyor/
116b7: ldan pa// bcom ldan ston pas 'di gsungs so// zhe khya ba ni 'od gad kyi ga ster ba byed badrug pagod ni 'od kyi ba sbyong bas// ye shes de kho nyid bshad bya// lha mos slar yang mchod byas nas// de kho na nyid ye shes bus/
116b8: sems can rnams kyi rnam nges pas// 'tshe ba'i mtshan nyid gang 'dra ba// de 'dra ba dag gis bshad bya yis// rtse gcig pa yi yid kyis nyon// lus la rtsa rnams mtshan ma ni// de rnams ji ltar gsal bar dbye//

117a1: rgya chen sum bcu rtsa gnyis te// de rnams kyi ni gtso bo mchog/ bcu gnyis de bzhin du lha mo// dbyangs rnams bgrod pa'i mtshan nyid de// dkar po nag po'i phyogs kyis ni// nyi shu rtsa ba'i ru ni brjod/
117a2: der ni snying po dgu po mchog/ lus kyi mtshan ma'i mtshan nyid do// gang gis shes pa tsam gyis ni// 'chi ba'i dus lta bur gnas so// dbugs ni rnam par spros tsam gyis// lus can 'pho ba drug gnyis na// snga dro
117a3: ro hi ta yi char/ / de yi rtags ni mtshon par bya// sna dang mig gi phyogs dang ni// 'gram pa dang ni rna ba'i rtsar// lde dang mche ba'i mtshams dang ni// mgrin pa rtsibs logs de bzhin du// snying gi gur dang lte ba dang //
117a4: brla dang byin pa de bzhin gzhan// 'doms dang ling ga dag de bzhin// mgo bo dang ni spyi bo'i phyogs// mtshams ni de rnams thams cad du// dbugs ni mched cing 'chad pa'o// lus kyi mtshan ma dgu rnams te//
117a5: ba'i dus ni bstan pa yin// nyi ma'i tshad kyi grangs rnams ni// 'khor lo dus bdag nyid can dga'// gang tshe nyi ma drug rnams zhon// gcig brjod pa ni brgyan pa yin// der ni lo gsum 'gyur can te// sum brgya drug
117a6: bcu rnams de bzhin/ / cha shas de ltar gyon tshad// mdor bsdus pa yis bshad par bya// nyim bdun ni yongs thob nas// gang tshe rlung gi 'drab ba na// lo gnyis yang dag brjod pa dang // dus kyi grangs can zla ba dang /
117a7: rnam sman pan n+d+ha k+ta// gang na ga rlung du yang dag brjid// zhag brgyar rnams su yongs gting bas// rgyu na gang cha' ba ba ban// loganas sran mongs bshad pad+ma// des 'tsha yin krungs// sa pan
117a8: ni/ da ma ga rgya grangs// nyis kya pa gang// seM yin za sa pa// ma nyam gyur ba na// miganyis kun 'chos/ thag nyis ma pa// na tho sa

117b1: no/ / lha mo'i ma bcu rnams kyis// lo gnyis su ni de 'tshe'o// nyi ma bcu gcig de bzhin du// gang tsha rtsa ni rab 'jug na// lo gcig gi ni lam bcas pas// zla ba yang ni dgu'i grangs kyis// nyi ma bcwa brgyad rab tu shang
117b2: therom med par bshad pa'o/ / zhag ni bcu gnyis rab 'bab pas// lo gcig tu ni rab tu grags// zla ba yang ni lo'i grangs can// nyi ma rnams ni dus kyis mdzes// bcu gsum du ni gang tshe rtsa// g.yas su bgrod par
117b3: 'bab pa na/ / lor ni yang dag bshad pa ste// zla ba yang ni rig byed grangs// nyi ma rnams ni dgu'i grangs na// 'chi ba'i mtshan nyid bshad pa'o// lha mo gang tshe bdun gnyis su// rtag tu rlung ni 'bab pa na// le ni tshe ru
117b4: yang dag bshad/ / zla ba'i tsher ni yang dag grags// nyi ma rnams ni bcu gnyis te// de yi 'tshe ba'i tshad yin no// gang tshe lnga bcu nyi mar ni// rlung ni de bzhin 'bab pa ni// de tshe 'chi bar shes bya ba// lo gcig na ni the tshom med/
117b5: nyi ma mchog ni phan pa yi// gang tshe brgyad gnyis su 'bab na// 'tshe ba zla ba bcu dang ni// nyi ma rnams ni mchog grangs kyi// nyi shu rtsa ba'i'i nyi rnams kyi// tshad du bdag gis bshad pa'o// nyi ma rnams ni bcu bdun du/
117b6: nges par gang tshe rlung 'bab na// de tshong yi chad kyis ni// zla ba rnams ni dgu dang ni// nyi ma bcwa brgyad na de bzhin// 'chi ba'i dus la the tshom med// nyi ma bcwa brgya chub yis// zla ba yang ni brgyad na dang // nyi ma rnams kyang
117b7: nyim 'grangs/ / dus kyi grangs ni bshad pa'o// gang tshegatsagu man nyi shung ni// dril zhon pa spyod pa na// nyim yang drug pa shang bya ba// 'tshob zlab bdun dang ni// nyim rnams ni dus grangs bshad// dus 'di rnams kyis
117b8: mchag gdang can/ / gang can burar gyu // zlab blan ci pa thal// ma chu ci gnams pa// gang nyis pa ban// thab la tshus sa 'tshaste// rnams na kyi grangs/ Ta gtas pa

118a1: sa/ /
118a2: ba myal banas// skabagasas shang pa ste// nyin cugacig na de bzhin du// 'dzi ba'i dris surnam par 'arjod// dra kyi grang ma ni med gzus nas// gong du rkyen du bshad do khyer// bar kyi mam pa shadagapa/
118a3: bcu gnyis nyid kyi grangs kyis ni// ma ye babs dang sbyangs nas// bar ni gsal bar byas pa yin// blo dman rnams kyis togs don du// dus 'di rnams ni rab tu bstan// rnal 'byor ma rnams shin phra mo'i// mthun ma
118a4: dus ni bdag gis bshad/ / lha mo rnams kyis yid ches// khams ni mnyam pa can du 'gro// sna yi sha na rnam chad cing // skyeng bltas ma ni de bzhin 'brab// de yi 'tshe bar shes bya ba// nyi ma bdun na the tshom med// mig gi/
118a5: gos ni yang dag chad// gyen kha bltas ma mchog de bzhin// cha shas dgul yang dag zhon// lngas lhag pan 'chad de bzhin// go dA bar+ya 'khur ba yi// ngos su steng du 'gro ba mo// nyi ma bcu ru shes bya ste// nub gcig
118a6: gis lhag de bzhin no/ / nab g.yas la yongs rten nas// bzang mo steng du yang dag rten// bcu gcig cha shas la zhon te// 'chad pa bcwa brgyad na de bzhin// bcu gnyis de bzhin du lha mo// lce la mi mo dag po can// lus can
118a7: kun gyi laNib 'i/ nam tha'i mtshan mos shes par bya// bcu gsum mo yi bar drani// gdong na gamoni rig de bzhin// namatha'i grangs kyi nyirnams kyis// 'thung po rnams kyi bzod pa yin// rgyun du mchi ma 'bab gang rtsa//
118a8: stong bsas mang na ngatu grags// bcu ni pa yi byang pa lazhon// 'du byed kyis ni mi tsha ma med/ snying pa'ig ninam pa dang / snying dunya mdemachogs// gsum dang slar 'dzas smra'o// thab byed du zer mam/

118b1: dbus su son lnga mo// bcu drug cha bdag can yongs rdzogs// sen mo'i khrag mang de bzhin nag/ nyin rnams bcu ru the tshom za// bcu bdun pa yi rtswa yang ni// brla yi steng du skams pa na// nyi shu rtsa bzhir yang dag grags// tin
118b2: zhan ta ma thar ba yang / / byin pa zung gi gang shigaH// snang du bsdus ma de bzhin mchog/ khan brgyang pa du shes byas// nyi ma rnams kyang nyid thakyis// gcig gis dman pa 'i nyi shu 'dongs// 'cha'i steng du'ab rtsas
118b3: mchog/ mnyam pas 'chad par 'gyur ba la// 'di yis 'tsho ba the tshom med// mtshan mar rol ldan mar grags ma// steng bgrod mchog gi dbang phyug ma// bcu gnyi su ni yang dag grags// nyin rnams dus tshod
118b4: tsham za/ / bar gyi nyi ma gang bshad pa// bcu gnyis nyid la the tshom med// lo yi rim pas de sbyangs nas// bdun bcu rtsa gnyis rim pa yis// drug dang sum bcu bcwa brgyad bcu// 'di ni thabs rim ji ltar// shes byad
118b5: ltar lha chen mo/ / rim gyis rim gyi bye ba'o// lhag ma nyid ni bsdus 'gyur bar// 'tsho ba yid ni shes par bya// yang dag chog 'di rnams kyis/ rdo rje 'od ni bsgom par bya// rab tu byor bas srog bka bas/ sangs rgyas
118b6: lus la 'chi ci thos/ / rab tu sbyor ba 'di brten nas// mdor bsdus paM yis 'chad par 'gyur// rdo rje'i lam nas son pa'i srog/ sAl ma bcu gnyis mtha' bar du'o// sangs rgyas rjes su dran sbyor bas// 'dod
118b7: balnga can laza' gyur/ / gsung stegs can pa'i 'ang la ni// gnas nas kun tu bgrod par bya// sgra ma'i bdag nyid 'chi med 'gyur// nam pa dri ba'i ris can no// Na yi kun nam 'gengs bzhin pa// dngos po kun la
118b8: gnas pa yin/ / skye bo kun gyi khams rnams ni// ye shes rnam par 'thob par byed// chos bdag med pa 'dzag par 'gyur// gang zag rnams la rgod par 'gyur// gnyis ka b+hUm chen po ste// snying rje'i dbang

119a1: 6/ / gis bzhugs pa yin// mthar thug pa yi sbyor bas sems// mtshams rnams kun du 'chi ba yin// 'chi ba chen po sangs rgyas gzugs// rnal 'byor rnams la bde snyer byed// dkyil 'khor thams
119a2: cad gzung ba yis/ / thams cad bde ba'i bdag nyid 'gyur// 'khor lo'i rim pa'i rab sbyor bas// bde pa dam pa yang dag myang // rdo rje 'od ni bsgom par bya// bcom ldan 'das kyi gzugs mtshungs ma// lha ni mngon
119a3: rtogs gzugs can te/ / shes rab thabs kyi bdag nyid can// srog kun yang dag sbyor ba las// mchog tu zag med bzhugs ldan pa// de bzhin gshegs pa dus 'khor grags// bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di
119a4: gsungs so/ / zhes bya ba nordo rje 'od kyi chog ster ba tu byed pa bdun pa'o// de nas phyag na rdo rje sogs// byang sems de bzhin gshegs rnams kyis// mchod pa byas shing phyag byas nas// 'di skad du ni gsol ba'o// gtso bo lha rnams bsgrub
119a5: thabs dang / / de rnams rang sngags bdag la gsungs// gang gis thams cad dbang gyur pa// gang gis rab sbyor nyid kyis lags// lha la sogs pa'i bsgrubs pa'i thabs// rdo rje sku yi rgyal po nyon// gang gis yang dag
119a6: cho ga yis/ / mAr du dngos grub rab tu 'jug/ dkyil 'khor bri ba byas nas ni// su bsgom bya ba 'dir bshad te// de lam mo lha rnams dang // pho nya 'byung po gza' de bzhin// lus sul po ni chen po dang // rig pa'i gas
119a7: sngags 'drir brjod bya/ / dbus ma'i yon nang gnas pa// sred pa dag pas bsgrubs pa yin// dus thams cad du bskyed pa ni// dkyil 'khor du ni rab 'bab can// ma mo dbang chen bsrub bya dang // wA ni chu yi dkyil 'khor
119a8: dri/ / 'byung po me la bsgrub bya ba// gza' ni rlung gi dkyil 'khor la// lus sul po nanam mkhar te// rdo rje'i sku yi rab sbyor bar// ye shes dkyil 'khor cha mis ni// a bad+hU tI 'bab pa yin// dkyil 'khor ldan pa

119b1: ma/ / des // de bltas nasan pa ma // sa sa la sogs dkyil 'khor dgang // nag tho brgyad nga na la// bzung po tshal 'khor sgrub ba bya// mam thag banas pa pa
119b2: s+yAng 'thur mdun du mngon sum du'o/ / tshangs mazhib mo de pa'i dang gzhon nam dang pag mo dang // dbang mo nyid dang tsamun te// tshogs kyi dbang mo mi gdan po// gnyis pa'i dra ba bur dbang po dang // ga sha
119b3: lus ngan dang / / yi dgas dbang dang me sten can// bden bral dang na rlung de bzhin// dum bu gsum par dgod bya ba// nyi ma zla ba mig dmar dang // gza' lag pur bu bsangs dang // spen pa dang ni rA du'o// bzhi bar rangs khyas
119b4: 'jug de bzhin/ / drag po gzhon nu nges par skor// sa dang chungang me dang rlung // 'byung ba chen po'i khams rnams dang // mkha' 'gro mar me 'jib ma dang // kam po ji khyab bdag de bzhin// 'byung po 'byung po'i gzugs
119b5: kyis ni/ / rtag tu chog bzhin bsrub bya// dkyil 'khor chen po'i sbyor ba yis// kun nas phyi sI dkyil 'khor gyi/ ri mo sum skor dbus byin pas// brtul zhugs can gyis mdzes par bya// bdam 'dab brkyang n+da
119b6: bya/ / lte ba zab pa'i spyod yul can// de yi dbus su rdo rje'i sku// zhal gcig pa la phyag bzhi pa// cung zad mche ba gtsigs pa'i zhal// bzhad pa'i zhal la khro dang bcas// kha dog sngon po drag chen po// thod pa'i blang
119b7: bas rnam par bgyur/ / nyi ma dgar mdzang rol bzhugs// sum bcu pa rnams 'jigs par mdzad// stag gi lpags pa'i na bza' 'dzin// bzang po'i gzugs can spyan gsum pa// zong pa dang ni kha dz+ra 'dzim
119b8: cang de gri gug gis ni brgyan/ / shar dang lho dang nub dang ni// byang du rim pa ji lta bas// mkha' 'grogam po rnga nyid ma// 'jib ma dang ni mar me ma'o// de ltar de rje su yi don// mdor bsdus pa yis brjod par bya//

120a1: lte bar rdo rje'i rnam par 'gyur// po nya rkang pa drug bgrod ma'i// snying kha gsang ba mgrin pa ru// de nyid rnam par slar dgod bya// de nas srog ni 'dzin bzhin pas// bsam gtan sems te gzhan gyis min//
120a2: lha rdzas 'od zer skyed par 'gyur// dkyil 'khor ba rnams rang lus skyes// las dang po'i sbyor ba yis// phyogs bcur rnam par spro bar 'gyur// hriHyig las byung ba'i lha mo// phag mo phyag ni bzhi ma ste// ga
120a3: dang mda' nyid de bzhin du/ / rgyal mtshan dang ni thod pa nyid// kha dog sngon po drag chen mo// phag gi gdong can 'jigs rung ma'o// par yig gis bris zhi ba mo// kha dog dmar me 'od chen mo// thod pa dang ni lcags kyu nyid/
120a4: kha Ta? Da ma ru de bzhin// hriHyi yi ges gzhon nu ma// kha dog ser mo phyag bzhi ma// rtse gsum pa dang ba dan gsum// gzhu dang mda' nyid de bzhin no// hoHyaM yi ges tsa muN Di// kha dog nag po phyag bzhim//
120a5: kha T+wA~M ga nyid thod pa dang // cang te'u chang snod de bzhin no// oM yig las ni tshangs pa mo// kha dog dkar mo phyag bzhi ma// pad ma nyid dang thod pa dang // gzhu dang mda' ni de bzhin mchog/ g.yig las ni tshogs dbang mo/
120a6: kha dge ljang khu phyag bzhi ma// rtse gsum po dang thod pa dang // bgrang phreng dang nil tu'o// bI yig las ni khyab 'jug ma// kha dog sngon mo phyag bzhi ma// 'khor lo dang ni thod pa dang // zhags pa ral gri de bzhin mchog
120a7: I yig las byung ba dbang mo/ / kha dog ser mo phyag bzhi ma// rdo rje mdung thung thod pa dang // sdigs 'dzub bcas zhags de bzhin no// thams cad 'bar bzhin gyen brdzes sgra// sna tshogs rgyan gyis rnam par grubs// rol
120a8: zhon ma spyan gsum ma/ / rked par stag gi lpags pa dkris// shar sgor tshangs pa bri bya ba// kha dog dkar po phyag bzhi pa// thod pa dang ni bgrang phreng dang // spyi blugs pad ma de bzhin no// byang du de bzhin khyab 'jug ni// kha dog

120b1: nag po phyag bzhi pa/ / ral gri de bzhin 'khor lo dang // thod pa dbyug pa de bzhin no// lho ru drag po bri bya ste// du ba mdog can phyag bzhi pa// rtse gsum thod pa de bzhin du// zhags pa phreng ba 'dzin de bzhin// nub du gzhon nu
120b2: bri bar bya/ / kha dog ser po phyag bzhi pa// dpa' bo mdung thung dbyug pa 'dzin// thod pa bgrang phreng 'dzin de bzhin// dbang ldan khyu mchog la zhon pa// kha dog dkar po phyag bzhi ste// thod pa dang ni rtse gsum 'dzin// phyag
120b3: gzhan thal mo sbyar ba'o/ / dbang po glang po la zhon pa// kha dog ser po phyag bzhi ste// rdo rje dang ni thod pa dang // thal mo sbyar ba byas pa mchog/ ma ru lug la zhon pa ni// kha dog dmar po phyag bzhi pa// me yi thab dang
120b4: thod pa dang / / skrag nas de bzhin lag thal sbyar// gshin rjer ma he la zhon pa// kha dog nag po phyag bzhi pa// dbyug pa de bzhin thod pa dang // kun du skrag nas thal sbyar 'dzin// bden bral khyil zhon pa ste// kha dog sngo
120b5: skya phyag bzhi pa/ / ral gri dang ni thod pa 'dzin// kun nas sreg pas thal sbyar mchog/ chu lhar chu srin la zhon pa// kha dog dkar po phyag bzhi ste// zhags pa de bzhin thod pa dang // bral mo sbyar ba de bzhin gzhan// rlung
120b6: du ri dgas la zhon pa/ / du ba'i mdog can phyag bzhi ste// ba dan dang ni thod pa dang // de bzhin thal sbyar 'dzin pa mchog/ lus ngan du ni gter la zhon// kha dog ser po phyag bzhi pa// rin po che dang thod pa 'dzin// thal
120b7: sbyar byas pa'o de bzhin gzhan/ / thams cad rgyu skar dang ni gza'// rang dkyil 'khor la gnas pa bsgom// rang gi dam tshig las byung ba// de rnams rdzu 'phrul ldan stobs che// ma mo rnams dang kun gyi ma// 'byung po rig
120b8: ma de bzhin gzhan/ / de lta'i cho ga'i bya ba yis// de phyir re re bsgrub par bya// dur khrod la sogs gnas rnams su// sna tshogs dam tshig za rnams kyis// rnal 'byor la sogs rtag dga' la// pho nya'i las ni yang dag brtsar// /

121a1: zla ba rdo rje'i cho ga yis// rdo rje sems dpa' 'byung bzhin no// sngags kyi rgyal pos bskul pa yis// de thams cad ni bran bzhin byed// gnas sogs nyi shu rtsa bzhi ru// daphyir rim pas mchod par bya// de
121a2: nas nga sogs dbul bya zhing / / sngags kyi bzlas pa yang bya ste// rang ming brjod pa'i gsang sngags la// oM hUM phaT sogs nad bcug pa'o// dbus su bcom ldan 'das brjes nas// der ni thams cad bsgrub par bya// de nas
121a3: gzhan brjes pa'i nang du/ / bcom ldan gzhan gyi gzugs can te// ba dan gsum pa 'bar ba dang // rdo rje thod pa rdul can mchog/ gzhu dang mda' ni 'dzin pa nyid// g.yas dang g.yon pa'i phyag gis 'phyar// lhags
121a4: sngon gyi gzugs can te/ / lus dang zhal sogs sngon gyi don// nges par dbus ma'i rnal 'byor gyis// 'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje'i bdag/ thams cad lus kyi rang bzhin can// gzugs
121a5: thams cad kyi nang bzhugs pa/ / bcom ldan gzugs kyis 'di gsungs so// zhes bya ba ni rdo rje sku'i cho ga ste rab tu byed pa brgyad pa'o// de nas 'dir ni bde rgyal po// rnal 'byor ma yis sad mdzad nas// ngag 'di yis ni 'dri bar mdzad/
121a6: blo gros chen po dus ci lags// kye rnal 'byor ma rnams khyed nyid dus// myu gu can gyis skyes pa'o// sna tshogs sa bon sems chen po// myu gu can gyi sbyor bas bshad// gza' dang rgyu skar tshe grangs ni// sems kyi dus su
121a7: mngon par brjod/ gzugs med grangs ni de yi dus// rnal 'byor rnams kyi bde ba'i rgyu// 'jig rten gyi ni dus tsam du// thub pa skyes mchog rnams kyis gsungs// de tshe mu gucan bsgom pa// sa bon sa bon gyi mtshan te
121a8: myu gu sems kyi gzugs can te/ / sems las byung ba myu gu can// rgyu skar rA saM gza' sogs pas// gang zhig du na myu gu skyes// de yi mu gu can nges byas// rang bzhin rang bzhin du myung bya// dge ba'am ni ming ga kun/

121b1: chu grangs d+hu skar gza' 'char ba// de rnams thams cad dus rnams su// thams cad bde bdag nyid skyes sgom// ro tra mi ni rnyed byed pa'o// ma b+ha ma nad dpa 'dobs pas srag ku mra/ dus byed gzus su ste// tshes grangs de ni
121b2: yongs su spang / so bu mo bzang dang bkra shis so// ra bu A 'joms par byed pa'o// b+hu bu b+ha dus kyi gzugs kyis so// b+ha bru gu rnyed pa byed pa po// mi gu d+ha nor la sogs par mdzad// tra gu pa dus kyi gzugs can no// bri shu/
121b3: pU dge ba rnams byed do// b+hi shu pU nad dang 'joms pa yin// b+hu b+ha shug shin rje'i mchi can no// krum kri grags dang bsod nams 'thob// bA ma A gdung byed pa po// pU ra ma 'chi ba'i dus can no// me'i gdan can du mi ka
121b4: ra/ / slar yang gshin rje ra ra Na Da spang // srin por bcwa lnga pa nyid dang // khyu mchog chu lhar spang bar bya// sems g.yengs rab tu 'joms nyid du// gter du rmi lam can de bzhin// bzang po mig ga/ sum nyid du// 'byung po'i
121b5: nyi ma shar de bzhin/ / zla ba dang ni nyi sogs chos// de rnams res mo rab bshad bya// bzang po yugs sa mo de bzhin// sems g.yeng 'byung po'i nyi mar gnas// skye bo kun gyi nyi ma yi// cha yi rgyu bar shes par bya// khyu mchog ma
121b6: ki rare nyid dang / / rmi lam bcwa lnga pa de bzhin// zla ba'i rgyu bar yang dag grags// rim pa 'di rnams rnam par brjod// nyal me ru yang dag gnas// stod pa rlung gi gnas su'o// de ltar de'i dbus gnas pa ni// phyog su gdung byed
121b7: yang dag gnas/ / zla ba nyi las byung ri mo// mnyam par lta bas mnyam par 'gro// zhi dang sdig pa bltas pa yis// shes rab can gyis des de spang // mche ba dang phrad ma bltas pas// bden par 'chi bar byed pa yin//
121b8: dus smras pa ni mdor bsdus pa// rA hu'i rgyu bar grags pa yin// dkar dang gcag shos cho ga yis// blo gros mthar thug pas shes 'gyur// rgyu skar sogs dang mi mthun par// rmongs pa gang zhig smra bar byed// skye bo

122a1: rang gis byas pa yis/ / las 'di shes par ma gyur to// las de yis ni dus rnams ni// the tshom med par 'byung bar 'gyur// lus kyi tshogs pa ji srid pa// de srid du ni dus rab 'jug/ rnal 'byor pa rnam
122a2: nyams su myong / / yang dag byang chub gnas 'thob 'gyur// de ni myu gu can du grags// kha dog dmar po 'od chen po// myu gu ku gu'i gzugs can ni// lte ba'i rtsa bar gnas pa bsgom// 'bar ba'i 'khor lo'i nang
122a3: sor ba/ / gzugs de lha rdzas kyi na gzugs// ye shes myu gu rnam sgoms pas// las rnams thams cad mthong mi 'gyur// thams cad bdag nyid sbyor chen las// sngon las rnam par 'joms mdzad pa// chu rnams su
122a4: ni rtag bzhugs pa'i/ / rdo rje rgyu yis de gsungs so// zhes bya ba ni mu ga rdo mug can gyi chog ster ba du byed pa dgu pa'o// / de nas rdo rje'i gar byas nas// rnal 'byor mas ni 'di dris so// ji ltar ston pa sems dpa' che// las dang bral bas
122a5: 'byung bar 'gyur/ / sngon gyi las ni rnam nyams pas// rkun nyams pasara'ang mad pa// 'di la bdag ni the tshom mchis// snying rje mnyes gshin pas bka' stsal// sems can chen po'i 'byung ba yang // sngon gyi sangs
122a6: tam rnams gsungs pa/ / mdor bsdus pa yis bshad bye yis// khyod ni yod gcig pa yis nyon// rdo dza ma pa can gyur bas// las kyi nang du bsgrub par 'gyur// ring yin sbyor ba'i// deni rang 'byung druganas so//
122a7: tu da pal gnas pas// rabang po thams cad 'du b.raH// yi lapas tag 'dis te// ram pa'i mi gas 'tshang ba yin// dga' bkun las kyang 'byung ba'i// dede'i khyod la 'a bar gyur// de
122a8: chags thams ca dadang / / dag pa'i las las zad par 'gyur// skye ba chen po de 'byung ba// gcig nyid lam gyis 'thob par 'gyur// rtog pa med las rtog par 'gyur// tog pa yis na rtog sa 'thung // dril

122b1: skan thob byas nas/ / de rnams mtshan nyid bshad par bya// ne dgu ci mo gcig pa dang // ce lnga rtse mo gsum pa can// de ltar bsogs dril bu che// rtse mo stong gi bar du'o// sgra brjod pa yi dngos po yis// smos pa med cing
122b2: yi ge med/ / ral 'byor pa yis mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho dag/ de yi ska las rtog pa yang dag zung // de nyid kyis ni rtog pa med pa'i bdag/ gnas rnams gang la nges par zhugs pa yin// sngon bshad ce can de rdoH// gang
122b3: du yang ni rnam 'phro ba/ / chos dang sprul pa'i ris su can// de nyid du ni gsor bar bya// phyi yi dril bu'i mtshan nyid ni// dpa' bos gsungs pa bshad par bya// dril bu rtag tu cha gsum can// lha yis yang dag brgyan par
122b4: byas/ / re re yi ni lha'i bdag po// ting 'dzir dkyil 'khor du ji ltar// rnal 'byor rnams kyis lhag mos pas// de bzhin thams cad zhal bya'o// lha mo de rnams kyi ni gdan// dril bu de la bad sogs bya// ji ltar de rnams
122b5: kyi ni brgyar/ / de bzhin dril bu'i sgra rigs so// lha ni sgo dang grwa rnams su// phyogs brgyad rnamasu bya ba nyid// ji ltar rnal 'byor pa'i mtshon cha// de rnams zhal nas rtse mo 'thon// bum pa sogs dang zhal gnyis la'ang // steng
122b6: du rang rigs mtshan ma can/ / 'di 'dra ba yi dril bu che// tshad ni gzhan du bshad pa yin// de ni nang gi gzugs can bdag/ de phyir sgra ni rnam mtshon bya// thig le'i gzugs ni khyab bdag che// rdo rje de yang de dang mnyam par
122b7: bya/ / de ltar ral pa'i sbyor ba las// sems can thams cad bsgrub par bya// ral can dril bur yang dag grags// rdo rje rje rjer brjod par 'gyur// rdo rje ral can bdag nyid kyis// dkyil 'khor du yang bsgom par bya// rnal
122b8: 'byor ma dang mkha' 'gro kur/ / de tshe nang du mngon par zhugs// thams cad gnyis pa yongs sbyor las// rdo rje ral pa can byung ba// rdo rje dril bur yang dag rten// bcom lda pa pos 'di gsungs so// zhes bya ba ni rdordzo pa pa ban gyi chog ste

123a1: byed pa bcu pa'o/ / de nas gzhan gyi sbyor ba che// dpa' bo chen po'i rab sbyor bas// bdag gis mngon sum du bshad kyis// rnal 'byor ma kun mnyan par gyis// lus can kun gyi lus gang la// gdan ni stong phrag
123a2: gnas pa ste/ / de rnams la yig dgod pa ni// ka sogs ha yig mthar de bzhin// yon tan la sogs dbyangs rnams yig/ khams re re la yi ge rnams// slar yang phyi mo bcu gnyis kyis// mkhas pa rnams kyis dbye bar
123a3: bya/ / gtum mo stong phrag bdag nyid can// mtshams kun tu ni gnas pa 'bar// khams thams cad kyi bde gnas las// dpa' bo'i longs spyod 'thob par 'gyur// 'od zer de rnams kyis bkug pa// byang chub sems dpa'/
123a4: rigs chen po// bdag med pa yis bdag tu bzhag/ gnyis med chos 'byung nang du'o// de ltar stong phrag gi ni lce// dpa' bo chen po'i go 'phangs gnas// sman thams cad dang nye ba yin// sbas pa'i bcud len gsungs//
123a5: pa'o// phyi rol rnams kyi 'ang yi ge'i bdag/ de'i ming nyid du shes par bya// me tog 'bras sogs sde tshan gyi// dang po'i ming ni stong phrag can// de rnams kyis ni bcud len bsgrub// gzhan du 'bras bu med par 'gyur/
123a6: ji lta'i rim pas rigs sogs kyi// gsogs thams cad sman chen te// las smra ba'i rgyung gzhan du// der ni nges par gsal rig bya// dang po'i mgon po rnam bsgoms nas// rtags rnams thob par bya ba yid// yang
123a7: ra grub rnal 'byor rnams kyi/ / bcud kyis len ni gang mthong ba// des kyang mthong btsam gyis ni// bla meng dngos grub 'thob par 'gyur// sde tshan rnams pas yongs sbyor las// bdud rtsi'i tshogs mtshams gzugs
123a8: ldan pa'i/ / grub pa'i sman rnams rang bzhin can// bcom ldan das kyis ning gsangs so// zhe bya ba ni dbang po chen po'i chog ste rab tu byed pa bcu gcig pa'o// de nas rnal 'byor ma dpa' mo// 'dres pas mchod pa byas nas ni// grong

123b1: khyer gsum kyi nang byung ba/ / ston pa rdo rje che ci lags// gang gi gzugs kyis byon pa lags// sprul pa gang du bzhud pa lags// chos nyan pa'i dus su yang // ci zhig gis ni brtan par bya// lha dang lha ma yin
123b2: dang mi/ / tsa yi dag gis 'gro dang 'ang // mngon par tshigs mtshams mtshan nyid ni// sngon gyi ji bzhin bshad du gsal// mngon par tshigs mtshams mtshan nyid ni// ji ltar rim pas bshad kyis nyor// shin tu zab mo
123b3: don chen po/ / sangs rgyas 'jig rten gyis ma shes// sems can rnams kyi rang snang can// bdag gis nges par mdor sdus pas// rdo rje sems 'od gzhan nyid du// khams dang mtshan mar gnas min can// lus dang ngag
123b4: sems dag pa yis/ / grong khyer gsum rnamasu byung ba'o// sngon gyi dngos por khyer nas 'ongs// nges par las chung bar 'gro'o// yang na dus rnams thams cad du ji ltar me long la bzhin mthong // sngon du nyan pa thob
123b5: sanas/ / sems kyang de yi gnas la'o// rje la sogs ting 'dzin gyis// lha la sogs pa de rnams rmongs// de mis rdo rje hUM mdzad kyi// rab tu sbyor bas rtag tu sprul// rdo rje'i rtse mor 'jig rten sprul// 'od zer lcags kyu spro ba ste// hUM gi yi
123b6: ge'i sgra yis ni/ / ston pas 'khor lo can mchog byas// chos 'byung khang pa brtsegs pa ru// nyi shu'i lhan cig skyes gdan du// ngag gi spyod pas nyan par byed// der seng nas ni de la thim// de ltar rnal 'byor
123b7: dbang ba po/ / slob dpon khyab bdag ces shes pa// rdo rje la sogs de'i ming nyid// de'i mtshan nyid bshad par bya// sems can kun la phan bdag nyid// mi 'jigs pa ni ster nyid dang // sngags dang rlud kyi sbyor ba ye/
123b8: sbyor ba bzo dang sgyu rtsal sogs// 'thun pa'i ngag dang thams cad la// bu gcig pa ltar 'thun pa dang // gtong ba sogs la rtag tu dga'// bsam gtan ting 'dzin de mchog gzhon// ji ltar smras pa de bzhin byed/

124a1: 'tshe ba med cing bde ba'i dag/ sems can kun la thugs brtse dang // lam du 'dzud pa de mthar byin// kun mkhyen yon tan dang mnyam dang // bstan chos kun gyi pha rol son// mgon med rnams kyi pa dang ma//
124a2: phyag brgya brdar ni byed pa po// de sogs yon tan rnams kyis gang // skye ba 'di la de bzhin gshegs// rnal 'byor ma 'khor lo dbus su// rdo rje hUM mdzad bsgom pa yin// dkyil 'khor byang chub sems kyi ste// bde ba'i rgyal
124a3: po rnal 'byor ma/ / sgra rnams su ni sgra'i ye shes// rdo rje hUM mdzad can khyab bdag/ 'phos pa'i lhag mar gyur ye shes// dang po'i mgon po'i rgyu yin no// sems kyi nyams su myong ba ni// de phyir phra mo'i rang bzhin can// s+phar shA
124a4: kham su yang dag grags/ / de nyid kyis ni khyer nas 'ongs// mkha' 'gro rgya mtshor rtag nges par// sa gsum de yi rang bzhin byas// de ltar sbyor ba mchog gtse bo// shing srin gzhan ni sog ma bzhin// 'di yi bskyod pa
124a5: ma shes pas/ / byis pa mi shes pa yis bcings// mtha' yis bde ba gsung ba po// bstan bya ston pa rdo rje 'chad// lhan cig skyes gzugs ston pa po// bcom ldan ye shes kyis 'di gsungs// zhes bya ba ni rdordo hU~M mdzad kyi cho ga ste rab
124a6: tu byed pa bcu gnyis pa'o/ / de nas gang gis sgrub pa po// 'grub pa'i bsam med sbyor bshad bya// de ni shi ni bzang rab sbyor bas// spyod dang brtul zhugs bshad par bya// lhun gyis grub 'gyur da'i spyod pa// dngos grub
124a7: 'dod rnams kyis shes bya/ / phyi rol gnyis med sbyor bdag nyid// spyod pa de ni rab tu bsngags// kun gyi bdag nyid yid bzang la// dbang po'i grong khyer yang dag rten// grong de rnamasu spyod pa dang // yid kyis brtul
124a8: zhugs bstan par bya/ / srid dang zhi ba'i gzugs rnams kyis// gang der bdag nyid kyis 'gro bya// bdag nyid gzugs kyi rang bzhin can// yang dag me long la mthong 'gyur// zhu ba'i sems la bsten byas nas//

124b1: lus ni lus la thim par gyis// sdom par bdag nyid kyis bsdams pas// phyag rgya chen por yang dag grags// phyag rgya la sogs lus la gnas// thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin// bdud rtsi lnga la sogs pa za/
124b2: lhan cig rnal 'byor ma rol ldan// chags pa'i sems kyis bsgom pa ste// mi 'dod kyang ni de phyir 'gro// gzung dang 'dzin pa'i dngos po yis// yid 'di la ni gos pa med// 'jigs med rnam pa'i sems
124b3: kyis ni/ / mtshan mo dur khrod sogs par 'gro// sa gzhi gang du spyod pa na// rnam shes brgyad du shes par bya// blo ldar spyod dang brtul zhugs ni// bde ba can du de rtsen to// dang po'i sbyor bar yongs brten
124b4: nas/ / phyi nas yid kyis rab tu bshad// srog thams cad ni mnyam sbyor bas// dbang po'i grong khyer bde ba yi// ye shes spyod pa'i brtul zhugs 'dzin// bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di gsungs so// zhes bya
124b5: ba ni shin du bzang po'i chog ster ba du byed pa pa cu ga sum pa'o/ / de nas spyi bo'i rigs kyi ni// khyad par bshad kyis mnyan par gyis// rdo rje bzang po'i rab sbyor bas// de rigs 'dir ni nyams par 'gyur// de la dang por lnga dang bdun// brgyad
124b6: dang bcu gsum bcwa lnga dang / / bcu bdun dang ni nyi shu gnyis// nyi shu rtsa bdun de bzhin mchog/ tha skar la sogs shes bya ste// lha rnams tshogasasu dran par bya// bzhi pa dang ni shar ba gsum// gnyis pa dang ni
124b7: drug de bzhin/ / byang phyogs pa rnams de bzhin gsum// mi yi tshogs su dran par bya// gsum pa ni bcu nyid dang // dgu pa dang ni nyi shu gsum// bcu bzhi pa dang bcu drug pa// bco brgyad pa dang bcu dgu pa// nyi
124b8: rgya bzhi de grags pa/ / srin po'i rigs su dran par bya// ra rigs gsum pa dang brgyad pa// kun pa zhi dang lnga pa'o// drug pa nyi shurtsa dgro pa// khyi la dngos por ba shad pa'o// bcu dang bcug cig byab te/

125a1: lha de bzhin dgu pa'o// bcu bzhi pa dang bcu drug pa// rtag tu de ltar brjod pa'o// bcu gnyis pa dang nyi shu lnga// khyu mchog gi ni rigs 'thob po// thog ma tha ma bod bu yi// rigasu de rnams rab tu grag/
125a2: bcu gsum pa dang bcwa lnga pa// de ni ma her mngon par brjod// thog ma dang ni nyi shu drug/ rta yi rigasu rab tu brjod// nyi shu pa dang nyi shu gnyis// spre'u zhes bya bar brjod pa'o// gnyis pa dang ni mtha' de bzhin// glang po//
125a3: yaM ni rigs su 'gro// nyi shu gsum dang nyi shu bzhi// mi ste stobs ni che ba yin// nyi shu gcig pa sre mo ste// mdor bsdus pa yis rab tu bshad// stobs dang bdag byed pa'i rgyu skar// bshad kyis de ltar mnyan
125a4: par gyis/ / mi rnams srog ni rgyu skar te// gzhan du rab tu 'thob pa min// skar mar dus kyi rtsa son par// 'dzin pa po ni nges par 'chi// lug dang srang dang kar ka Ta// chu srin mthon po la dran bya// kI Ta bum seng khru
125a5: mchog ni/ / brtan pa'i bya bar rab tu bstan// nya dang 'khrig pa de bzhin 'dir// gzhu dang bu mo 'dren ma la'o// bla ma nyi ma sa'i bu skyes bu// ngan spong rA hU zla ba bud med// gza' lhag bkra shis ma ning ste// mkha'
125a6: dkyil 'khor lo gza' gang yin/ / de ltar rigs rnams so gzhan du// byang chub sras po mi 'gyur ro// rdo rje bzang por de bshad de// rab sbyor rnam pa'i sems kyis ni// g.yon pa'i rtsa ru son pa'i sems// dbu
125a7: ma'i tha ma'i sbyor bar ldan/ / byang chubs bor rnams 'bab la// byang chub sems rnams kyis rigs so// snying rjer son pa'i yid kyis ni// las kyi nyis 'jig pa yin// yang dag rab ster rtag tu ldan// rig
125a8: med rigs can kyang med do/ / srid par rtsed mo tsam du ni// bsam gtan rnam pa'i lus son pa// me long gi ni yul la gzugs// gang 'dra mthong ste de med do// de 'drar byang chub sems dpa' rnams// bsam gtan

125b1: sbyor ba'i gzugs can no/ / de yi nang du zhu ba'i sems// de dang mnyam pa gzhan yod min// nges par dkyil 'khor rnams dbus su// rdo rje bzang po bsgom par bya// shes rab thabs kyi cho ga yis// gsang sngags mchod
125b2: ba sngon gyi can/ / dus dang dus min cha'i bdag nyid// dngos med ma yin byed por bzhugs// byang chub gzugs kyi bdag nyid che// bcom ldan sems dpa' 'di gsungs so/ zhes bya ba ni rje zang po'i chog ste rab tu byed pa bcu bzhi pa'o//
125b3: de nas gsang ba'i sbyor gang gis// bde kun bdag nyid du skye bshad// don dam pa'i sbyor ba yis// de bzhin nyid du rab 'jug bya// 'jigs byed chen po'i rnal 'byar gyis// sngags kyi phreng bar rang nyid byon// bzhi bcu
125b4: rtsa brgyad pa nyid ni/ / sa rnams la ni rab tu bshad// 'khor lo drug dbyibs ri mo ni// sa yi dbus su bya ba yin// thams cad du ni gsang sngags tshig/ bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad bri bar bya// de rnams sngags kyi gzugs rnam
125b5: ni/ / srog ni yi ge'i rnam pa can// yi ge'i cha rnams bzang po ni// spangs nas dbus ma'i gnas pa yin// stong par nges par thim byas nas// 'og dang steng du blta bar bya// rkang pa'i mtha' nas mgo bo ru// rnal 'byor
125b6: dbang phyug de srid byed/ / khams kun rab tu zhugs pa la// sems kyi spyod pa can ci smos// de ltar gsang ba gyen gnon pa// dpa' bo chen po'i don can no// dbus mar rab tu zhugs pa yis// bsnun dang bsgrub pa
125b7: la sogs spangs/ / 'thor rlung 'dzin bzhin pa yis ni// nyi ma dang po zad mer can// rdo rje'i lam nas langs pa'i sems// gang phyir brgyad pa'i rim pas so// de ltar sgyu ma'i bzlas pa 'dir// rtsa ba'i sngags sogs
125b8: re'u mig can/ / dpa' bo kun gyi re'u mig rnams// sngags kyi 'khor lor dgod par bya// ting 'dzin mgon po'i dpa' bo rnams// bcu gnyis rnams kyi'ang 'khor lor son// gang zhig gang gi ming sngon gyis//

126a1: de dang de yi gnas su bri// gzhan gyi sngags kun 'di rnams la// dkyil 'khor 'dir ni 'byung bar 'gyur// sku la sogs pa'i bzlas kun dang // de bzhin dag sogs bzlas pa can// sems sogs
126a2: bzlas pa thams cad dang / / de bzhin ye shes sogs bzlas can// sngags kyi rgyal pos bskul ba yis// de nas dpa' bo 'byung bar 'gyur// 'jigs byed chen po dbus rnams su// me yi gzugs can bsgom par
126a3: bya/ / shes rab rigs kyi nus pa yis// 'byung po'i tshogs de kun spyod bya// zhi ba dang ni rgyas dang dbang // drag po rings par byed yi ge/ las dang rjes 'thun gzugs bsgoms te// 'bar ba'i rnam pa sogs dgod
126a4: bya/ / 'chi bslu zhing de nyid kyis// rnal 'byor dang ni ldan par 'gro// nA da rA dar 'dzom bya zhing // thig le thig ler thim par bya// de ltar cho ga'i bya ba yis// gsang sngags bzlas nas phur bu gdab// 'di rnams
126a5: sngags kyi gtso bo yis/ / rkang pa bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad ste// oM hUM hUM phaT kyi yi ge mtha'// ji lta'i rim pas 'du kun la'o// na maHshrI badz+ra DA ki ma hA bI rA bI re shwa nA ya/ tri b+hud wan kam pa ka ma bA ba rA ya// Da~MSh+To ta ka Ta
126a6: b+hi Sha Da b+hai ra bA ya/ / sha ta sa ha sra de twA ya// bi d+hu dzi trA ya/ kaM kA la bA lA b+ha ra NA ya/ ko Ti la k+Sha b+hu dzA ya/ dzA lA ba lI D+ha lA ga nA ya/ ba ra shu pA sho d+ya ta shu lA ya/ ka wAn ta d+hu mu gra ba pu ShA ya/
126a7: ka Ta mu la tA tA rA bA ya/ mA tri ga Na pa ri pU ri ta pan drA ya// sa ta dza sud d+ha rI bam+ba b+ha ka rA ya// hU~M trA~M kA re tsA ra Na pU lA ya// pat+ta p+pa shAn pri yA ya/ sarba b+hU tas tAM sa da ka R+Sha ya// badz+ra kaM s+thAn tA k+Shi te dz+nyA la/
126a8: dza DA ka lA pa ma ku TA ya// kha tAM ga ka pA la shU la b+hi nan d+ha ri Ne// ma hA sa mu dra me kha lA ya// bAg+na tsa nA pa ba ra d+hA ri Ni/ She ta la sa~M g+ha brda na ka rA ya// ma hA big+h+nAM ni bA ri// shadruM ni sum+b+ha na ka ra ma/ tri sa twa sra baTA

126b1: saha sre ka ro pA ba l+yen tarba ti de/ / sha ta sa ha sra pu ka khA ya/ dz+nyA na sA ga ra mu khA ya// ma hA pi shi ta ru d+hi ro ba sA tA ri ni/ sarba mA ra ba lang+gaM si te/ sriSh+Ti saM hA ra kA ra kA ya/ sarba nA gA R+Sha sho Sha na sta pa d+han bi drAbahA/
126b2: ya/ an tra mA lA d+hA ri Ni/ su me ru ka ma bi ta nA dA ya/ kro d+ha bi gr-i tA d+hA ra NA ya// ma hA kA sha ti la kAta pa Ne/ bud d+ha ko Ta si wak+Sha NA niSh+Ta da nA ya/ dz+nyA na mri ta ba ra ShA pa NA ya/ sarba karba pra bar+t+ta nA yan/ ban d+ha na ka rA
126b3: ya/ sarba bi kalpa b+ha nye dza na ka rA ya/ muN DA ba li lag+hA sha rI rA ya/ pa ra kri ta yan tra man tra nA sha nA ye/ ma hA rak+Sha ka rA ya/ duSh+TA nAM baM dA la ne/ d+harmod ya ka rA ya/ kro d+ha s+pha ra s+pha ra NA ya/ in dra dza la sarba sa twAn pa
126b4: ne/ gra stan bA da pra bA da ma hA ma te/ de ltar la sogs gsang sngags gang // rab tu mang ba rgya che'o// sna tshogs rnam pa du ma'i ming // sems can ming gis shes par bya// sngags rnams thams cad mnyam sbyor bas/
126b5: khams gsum rnams su yongs bzhugs pa'i// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gtso// bcom ldan sngags pas 'di gsungs so// zhes bya ba ni 'jigs byed chen po'i tshig ste rab tu byed pa bcwa lnga pa'o// de nas mig la sogs dbang po// kun
126b6: gyi mngon shes cho ga bshad/ / mig mi bzang gi rab sbyor bas// rdo rje gsum ni rab bsgrub bya// gang du byang chub sems gnas pas// der ni mig gis nges par blta// rnal 'byor rnams kyi zag med mchog/
126b7: sems ni mig tu shes par bya// rtsa rnams kyi ni rab sbyor bas// so sor rlung ni dbab par bya// gang nyid du ni skyes dus su// de yi dus su thib nas 'gro// de ni mngon shes mig rnams kyi// sems 'di yis ni 'gro ba
126b8: 'gyur/ / skye 'gro'i nang du song ba'i gzugs// yid kyis sgra ni nyan par 'gyur// 'gro dang 'ong ba'i cho ga ni// lha rdzas dri ru rjes mtshon bya// lha rdzas ro yi rab sbyor bas// lce ni dga' bde de bcas kyis// lce yi

127a1: mngon shes la brten nas/ / dbu ma'i pho nya skyes pa yin// lus kyi rig pa'i rnam pa yis// mchog tu zag med de bsgrub bya// sngon gyi bag chags dran pa la// de nyid rnal 'byor ldan par 'gro// nyin zhag
127a2: mtshan mo mnyam byas nas/ / chu tshod drug bcu nyid dang ni// chu'i srad drug bcu tham pa dang // g+ha Ti kar yang sbyar bar bya// rgyar ni sor mo bcu gnyis la// dpangs su sor brgyad nyid yin te// gun dza drug bcu'i tshad
127a3: la ni/ / sor bcu gnyis pa'i thur ma'o// skad cig thang cig yud tsam dang // kASh+Ti mig btsums phye ba dang // se gol gtogs par shes bya ste// dbugs rgyu mngon par shes pas so// pha rol phyin drug tshul dag
127a4: gis/ / chos kyi dbyings ni mtshon par bya// dus dang dus min sel ba po// mig mi bzang ba bsgom par bya// mtshon cha mtshan nyid rnal 'byor ma'i// dkyil 'khor nang du byas pa nyid// sems 'di sna tshogs
127a5: gzugs can te/ / srog chags rnams kyi gar dgrod pa// bdag med rang bzhin 'thob par 'gyur// mdud pa rnams kyi phrang bas gnas// gzugs su byed 'gyur de'i dngos po// mchog gi dang po bral mtha' can//
127a6: chos kyi 'byung gnas gang gnas pa// rdo rje mkha' 'gror de shes bya// thur sel la la rtag brten nas// slar yang re re'i nang du ste// srog la sogs pa'i rlung lnga yis// mig ni lnga ru shes par bya// 'dzag pa med pa'i sa
127a7: bon 'dzag/ ye shes mkha' 'gro ma'i sbyor ldan// sa bor lnga rnams thig le yi// mngon shes byed po sogs lnga pa// de lta'i rnal 'byor mchog yongs rdzogs// rnal 'byor kun gyi 'ang mchog yin no// dngos
127a8: po'i ye shes can ma lus/ / ring du yongs su spangs pa yin// thams cad lus su mnyam sbyor las// lhan cig skyes pa'i spyan 'jug pa// dngos kun dngos po med mdzad pa// bcom ldan mig gis 'di gsungasas//

127b1: shi sag ga gyu sug byas nas// dpa na mchod pa chen po byas// stobs bcal spyan 'grags// bdag bcan pas bstad drugasal// mkhas pas drun dun bdagag/
127b2: sbyin bsreg bshad kyis mnyan par bya sa// stobs pa tshe ya rib sbyor bas// khams rnams kun gyis dgang blugs te// bde ba thab tu yang dag 'thob// nyi zla dgang gzar blugs gzar ro// slob dpon gnyis med de de la//
127b3: yang dag rigs pa'i gzugasu bsreg/ sna tshogs mkha' 'gro rnams 'di me// gsang sngags rang bzhin mtshan nyid do// yam shing rtsa ru yang dag grags// gang pyir sA li las skyes 'bras// tshil ni rtag tu zho zan nA
127b4: 'di ru mar ni byang chub sems/ / khrag ni sbrang rtsir shes par bya// srog sogs rlung rnams dur ba'o// gcig dang bshang ba dag de ltar// tsan dan dang ni gla rtsi'o// me tog rtag tu khrag tu grags// mchil ma lung ba 'bras
127b5: thug yin/ / bud shing so sen rus pa'o// mdor bsdus pa yis lpags pa gos// me yi thab kyi dbus su ni// skra dang bsdu lta ru 'gyur// sna tshogs phra mo'i khams gzhan ni// sna tshogs 'bru ste
127b6: de la bsreg/ / rim gyis mkha' 'gre rdzogs son pa// gang ba'i bsreg blugs su shes bya// dbang po thams cad gar byed de// de yi bag chags glu len no// sna tshogs sgra chen pos rol mo// snying rje sogs pas ston
127b7: mo yin/ / srog rnams kun gyi bdag po yi// stobs po che ni bsgom par bya// las thams cad pa'i sbyin bsreg ni// des mnyes pa yis dngos grub 'gyur// 'jig rten mchog gi khams kun tu// yid ni de ru yang dag
127b8: rol/ / gang tshe'i dus su bde gyur pa// de'i tshe'i dus su rab tu gnas// sbyin bsreg nad bdag nyid mthong bas// rmod dang rjes 'dzin byed pa yin// 'jig rten 'jig rten 'das ye shes// de rnams dbus mar 'thob par bya//

128a1: mtshams rnams kun tu khong khro ba// sems chen po ni gsang bar 'gyur// rtogs pas sprul pa'i sangs rgyas ni// de las byung ba bza' bar bya// mtshon bya mtshon byad rab bcom pas// gnyis dag shes
128a2: bar 'os pa yin/ / bla ma'i bdag nyid mtshan nyid ni// de la thim par byed par 'gyur// khams kun yang dge sbyor ba las// ye shes gnyis byar med mtshan nyid// ma yi gzugs su rtag bzhugs pa'i// bcom
128a3: ldan ma ju shes ni gsus/ de bu sa pa tsha tsha t+te ya tu byed pa bcu bdun pa'o// de nas do rje ba 'du ba// ji bzhin bshad kyis mnyan par gyis// rin chen rdo rje'i rab sbyor bas// a bad+hU tI can dngos grub// rnal 'byor
128a4: man yang dag rol/ / don dam pa'i nyams la gnas// de yi sbyor bas grol bar ni// gnyis med rgyu rnams kyis 'gyur ro// lus kyi nyams su myong bzhin pa// byos pa rnams kyi byang chub 'od// ha yig drug pa dang
128a5: ldan pa'i/ / sa bon rdo rje'i nor bur dgod// a ba d+hU tI'i rtsar 'bab ste// steng du kha bltas dpral bar son// bsrung ba'i dus su blo ldan gyis// rang gi lag pas rdo rje gzung // byang chub sems la rtsen byed la// rgas
128a6: dang 'chi ba ring ba yin/ / srid pa'i skyon las 'goms pa yis// srid gsum de'i rang bzhin 'gyur// las kyi phyag rgya'i rab sbyor bas// nyi ma re re bsgrub par bya// de yi dus su gang mthong ba// dngos po kun la ltung
128a7: bar bya/ / 'dod chags chen po'i tshul bdag nyid// rtag tu bdag nyid la 'byung 'gyur// rnal 'byor rgyud kyi rgyu don du// bstan bya ston pa por 'gyur ro// rnal 'byor ma yi rgyud kyi ni// sems can don ni nges par byas/
128a8: sku bzhi po ya rnal 'byor gyis// bden min bdag gis bshad mi bya// rin chen rdo rje'i rang bzhin can// sbyor skyes ye shes gyen du bgrod// ponya rnams kyi gtso nyid bya// 'dod chags ma yis dgyes par bya// byang chub

128b1: sems ni rtag gzung ba/ / lce yis bya yi lag pas min// lhan skyes 'phos pa'i mtshan nyid ni// mkha' lding phyag rgya nyid kyis gzung // phyag rgya'i kha nyid du sbyin te// de nas btung bar bya ba yin// stobs thams ca
128b2: kyi bza' bar bya/ / sa la skyes sogs 'bad pas so// spyan bsreg kun kyang de nyid kyis// dbang la sogs pa gang gang byed// de de'i'athod par bya ba ste// de nas sa bon gdab par bya// de rnams rjes kyis spang ba dang /
128b3: gtor ma dang ni bsrung ba bya// de yis bcings pa tsam gyis ni// de dang 'dra ba'i gzungs 'jug 'gyur// ri lu 'am ni skud pa ni// dpa' bo rang nyid kyis gsungs pa'o// b+ha ga'i dbus rnams su bsgos pa'o//
128b4: rin chen rdo rjes can de sman// dkyil 'khor khams rnams kun gyi sde// spangs pa rab tu bsnyam pa yin// gang dang gang gi las kyi ni// de dang de'i ming can sngags so// sa bon kun gyi yongs sbyor las// de ni rtag
128b5: tu sman rnams te/ / bcom ldan las kyi phyag rgya ni// rtag tu 'ching bas 'di gsungs so// zhes bya ba ni ni chen rdo rje chog ste rab tu byed babacwa brgyad pa'o// de nas 'khor ba'i mthar gnas pa'i// mkha' 'gro'i mtshan nyid bshad par bya// 1
128b6: mgrin gyi ni rab sbyor bas/ / pho nya'i mtshan nyid bsgrub par bya// ha yig skye gnas dbus su te// ya yig mgo bor gnas pa'o// gri yig dbu ma'i pad mar te// wa yi yi ge snying kha ru// rnal 'byor che la 'dzin bzhin
128b7: pa/ / dbyangs can ma dang 'dra bar byed// rmongs pa nyid ni thams cad 'phrog/ gang phyir gzhung ni rjes 'jug 'gyur// mgrin par rtag tu tshigs bcad ni// mgrin par ngag tu gnas pa nyid// 'tsho ba rta yi dbyibs
128b8: 'dir ni/ / gnas pa rnal 'byor lhag ma yin// de yi sbyor bas 'gro 'gyur ba// sngon du nyi ma'i gdan du'o// nyi de rdo rje sems dpa' ste// khams gsum por ni bskor bar 'gyur// nam mkhar nyi mas mdzes byas

129a1: nas/ / byang chub yid kyis 'gro bar 'gyur// phyogs kyi 'khor lo ma lus rtogs// rnal 'byor ma yi chu skyes mchog/ sems can kun gyi rmongs nyid dang // lam mthong ba ni nyams can la//
129a2: de nyid nyi ma rtag snang bar// mtshan mo mun pa drag po 'brog/ rnal 'byor ma 'khor dbus son par// rta yi mgon po bsgoms pa yin// gang gis sangs rgyas su 'gro ba// sgrub thabs yan lag 'char bar
129a3: 'gyur/ / bgegs rnams rnam par nyams 'gyur te// sprin la sogs par nyams par 'gyur// kun gyi sdig pa'ang 'phrog par byed// rang gi dga' ba shar mtshan nyid// mchod sbyin dus kyis 'jig rten du//
129a4: thams cad skad cig la sgrub 'gyur// khams bdun rnam par bzung ba yis// de tshe sa 'og dngos grub 'gyur// bdag med 'di rnams de lha mo// yan lag gcig gis rol par byed// sngags kyi bzlas
129a5: pa mi bya ste/ / sbyin bsreg A ga sogs de bzhin// ji ltar bde bas rtogs bya ste// rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid 'thob 'gyur// 'dod chags kyi ni 'dod chags sgo// me yis tshig la gdung bar bya// de bzhin 'dod chags
129a6: kyis 'dod chags/ / bsten par gyur pas mi 'ching ngo // de nyid thabs so yid kyis las// dge ba'i mtshan nyid can bya'o// nang du byed pa ma yin te// gus pa yid kyis dbu mar gnas// phyi rol ye shes
129a7: can rnams kyi ye shes/ / de nyid sangs rgyas rdo rje 'chang ba sogs// sems can 'jig rten sogs 'byung ba// de rnams spangs pas sangs rgyas med// mu stegs can dang sangs rgyas par// kun tu
129a8: dbye ba yod ma yin/ / lung thams cad ni 'gal ba ste// tshad ma pa rnams the tshom can// thams cad tshig ni rnam shes pas// ye shes can rnams de'i phyir shes// mkha' 'gro thams cad mnyam sbyor

129b1: las/ / nam mkha' rnam su bzhugs pa yi// bcom ldan 'jig rten 'jig rten par// rtag tu bzhugs pas di gsung so// zhes byang ni ma na gyi chog ste ni rab tu byed pa bcu dgu pa'o// de nas rab tu 'joms yon tan/
129b2: bshad kyis sgrub pa po rnams nyon// nam mkha'i snying po'i sbyor ba yis// rdo rje rlung gi mtshan nyid de// 'chags pa dang ni 'jig rnams// gang zhig stong pa de srog chags// khams rnams de 'drar shes bya ste//
129b3: dul ba'i sbyor bar yang dag gnas// zla ba'i gzugs su yongs grags pa'i// rang gi rang bzhin las skyes 'dzag/ rnal 'byor lhag ma'i ye shes kyang // de ni rab 'joms la brjod do// dus thams cad du g.yo
129b4: ba med/ / g.yo ba'am 'dir ni mi mthong ngo de// de ni thams bdag nyid rlung // bsam pa thams cad rab tu 'jug pa'o// do lA hA ra sogs sbyar bas// rnal 'byor rnams kyi thar ster po// sgra dang thig ler de shes bya/
129b5: 'od gsal ba dang snang ba gsum// de phyir nam mkha'i snying po yang // mkha' 'gro'i sbyor rnams kyis shes bya// nang gi dbus ma'i sbyor ba yi// srog de'ang rab tu bsngags pa yin// de yang kun gzhi shes bya
129b6: ste/ / me long du yang rab tu bshad// chos sku la sogs pa'ang de// dmyal sogs 'gro ba de bzhin te// sangs rgyas byang chub sems rnams kyi// gnas ni rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor ro// zla ba'i lam du gang tshe
129b7: mkha'/ / rnal 'byor rnams kyi lhag med 'pho// de 'dus rnam par gzhag med 'gyur// rnal 'byor byis pas bgrod bya min// nam mkha'i khams rnams thams cad kyi// de yi snying po rab tu bstan// de dag
129b8: shes rab thabs gnyis so/ / gnas skabs kyang ni gnyis nyid do// srid pa rnam par 'phro ba nyid// dbang po'i dbus su sbyar bar bya// sangs rgyas 'jig rten mtha' yas rnams// sa yi nang du rtsen par 'gyur//

130a1: de ltar nam bcas de nyid dang // rnam pa med pa'i go 'bang bzhugs// sems dang rnam par shes pa'i rgyud// gnyis po nyid ni gnyis med 'gyur// dbu mar lha rnams kyi 'grub ste// ye shes der 'di
130a2: rdzogs pa'o/ / gal te sangs rgyas rjes chags yod// chos dge 'dun la de bzhin mchog/ gal te mu stegs mkhas pa yi// tshul chen chos de 'dod pa dang // gal te shes rab thabs rnal 'byor// stong nyid
130a3: snying rje'i bdag nyid can/ / gal te thams cad mi rtag bdag/ tshul 'di bsgom par bya ba yin// 'dir mang smras pas ci bya ste// chos dbyings gal te 'dod kyang ngo // nam mkha'i snying po'i gzugs can gyi//
130a4: sangs rgyas sprul pa bsgob par bya// shen pa smig ma mkhan la sogs// gsod pa'i don la yongs gnas pa// de kun de'i gnas nyams dga' bar// lam rjes skyob rnams kyi grol 'thob// nges par dkyil
130a5: 'khor dbus rnams su/ / gzugs su bsdom pa bsgom par bya// 'jig rten 'di dang pha rol tu// rmongs pa'i bdag nyid dngos grub 'thob// rnam shes kun gyi sbyor bdag nyid// stong nyid snying po gcig pu pa/
130a6: bcom ldan rab 'joms rnam pa yi// rnal 'byor la bzhags pas 'di gsungs// zhes bya ba ni nam mdza'i snying po'i cho ga ste ba tu byed pa nyi shu pa'o// de nas lha mos mchod byas te// phyag byas pas ni 'di gsol to// rang gis
130a7: rig pa'i mtshan nyid ni/ / bcom ldan rdo rjes gsungs par mdzod// rang rig ye shes las byung ba// ji lta'i rigs pas bshad par bya// dpal he ru ka'i rab sbyor bas// rnal 'byor zla ba'i bgrod pa
130a8: rang / / dkar po'i tshes gcig la sogs nas// ye shes rgya mtsho 'phel bar 'gyur// thog mar ye shes skye bar 'gyur// gnyis par nam mkhar 'gro ba'i gzugs// gsum par mda' yi dbyibs dang

130b1: 'dra/ / bzhi par 'ben gyi gzugs can no// lnga bar rtse mo lnga'i bdag nyid// drug par khams drug 'byung ba yin// bdun par rgya mtsho yi ni gzugs// brgyad par pad mar brjod pa yin// dgub ru ni bcud len te/
130b2: bcu par lhan skyes gzugs kyis so// bcu gcig pa la zhi ba'i gzugs// bcu gnyis pa la 'khor lo'i gzugs// bcu gsum pa la nyi ma ste// bcu bzhir zla ba de bzhin no// bcwa lnga pa nyid rA hu ste// thig le zhes byas bcu
130b3: drug pa/ / rnam pa bcu drug mtshan nyid ni// rang gis rigs par shes par bya// dpal he ru ka'i sbyor ba yis// 'khor lo bzhi rnams su bsgrub bya// rgas pa med cing 'chi ba med// nad dang mdze sogs spangs pa yin// lte bar shI
130b4: yaM yi ger gyur/ / he yig snying khar dgod par bya// ru yig mgrin pa'i 'khor lor te// bod par ka yi yi ge'o// thig le bzhi yi rab sbyor bas// rang gis rig par 'grub par 'gyur// de nyid rnam pa bcu drug ni// nal
130b5: 'byor rnams kyi mchog zag med/ / gnas dang gnas su 'pho ba nyid// dbu ma'i nang du rab tu gzhug/ 'khor lo bzhi'i mdabason nas// rang gis rig pa mtha' yas mchog/ rigs de rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi// byung bar rnam par
130b6: shes par bya/ / sems chen po ni sad bzhin pas// don yod mthong ba 'thob par chung// rtag tu rmi lam du 'gyur te// dus thams cad du nges par gnas// longs spyod sprul pa'i mtshan nyid du// gnyid log pa yis de tshe mthong //
130b7: bzhi pa rab med bdag med de// de phyir de rnams mtha'i longs spyod// de ltar 'khor lo bzhir gnas nas// nges par lam du 'gro bar 'gyur// shes rab de nyid rtogs byas nas// nyi mas thabs kyi de nyid can// rdul gyi
130b8: sbyor ba 'byung ba ste/ / nag po'i phyogs su gang 'dir yang // bcu drug rnams kyi cha rnams kyi// nyi ma nyid ni ba ra bar du'o// stong nyid snying rje'i sbyor ba las// rdo rje 'bar ba 'bar zhing 'bar// dkyil 'khor 'khor lo 'debus rnams

131a1: su/ / dpal he ru ka bsam par bya// mtshan nyid thams cad yang dag ldan// rdo rje'i dga' bar 'gro bar 'gyur// gnas skabs thams cad yang dag sbyor// gtso bo rang rigs bdag nyid can// bcom ldan
131a2: 'das pa'i bzhi pa'i mthar/ / rtag tu bzhugs pas de gsungs sa// zhes bya ba ni dpal te ru ka'i cho ga ster ba tu byed pa nyi shu rtsa gcig pa'o// de nas lus sogs lha rnams kyi// ston mo mngon pa bshad par bya// pad ma gar dbang phyug nyid kyi/
131a3: rab tu sbyor ba 'di byung ngo // rtsa ni pad mar yang dag grags// srog gi rlung gis gar byed do// byang chub sems kyis dbang phyug ste// de rnams kyi ni nang du bzhugs// rang gi rig pa bza' bar bya// snying rje'i kha yis
131a4: btung bar bya/ / gnyis med rnal 'byor ma dang rol// sgyu ma'i rjes su 'gro rnams 'grub// thams cad de yi rang bzhin du// bza' ba bza' ba med par bya// pad ma gar dbang bsgom par bya// ji lta'i rim pas mtshon par
131a5: bya/ / ba yig gzhan gyi grong du 'gro// brtan pa thams cad rma yi yig/ na yig g.yo ba'i rnal 'byor te// te yig bde ba'i lha can yin// shA yig rta la sogs pa'i stobs// ra yig dga' rol rgyu can yin// srid dang /
131a6: mya ngan 'das kun la// de yi rab tu sbyor ba bya// mtshams kyi skad ni 'di rnams kun// bde mchog phyi mar shes par bya// bgrod pa 'di rnams la rten nas// pad ma gar gyi dbang phyug rang // he ru ka dang bde mchog nyid//
131a7: rdo rje sems dpa' sogs gtso bo// pad ma gar dbang phyug de yang // sbyor ba kun la shes par bya// pad ma ye shes yang dag grags// gar gyi dbang phyug rnam shes can// gnyis pa gnyis med yang dag
131a8: byung / / lha kun 'dir ni byung ba yin// shes pa thams cad de la gnas// khams gsum du ni gar dbang phyug/ gar byed pa yi sku chen la/ de nas rtags ni mtshon par bya// nam mkhar zhen pa'i sbyor ba yis// mchog tu

131b1: rmad du byung bar 'gro/ / rnal 'byor ma'i 'khor lo dbus// lhan skyes gzugs kyis rol par gyis// 'di yis rtag tu dbang gis las// de rnams kyis ni dga' ba byed/ gang dag gang gis las rnams la// de dang de yir
131b2: bsgom par bya/ / sgrub po rnams kyi byang chub rtsar// sangs rgyas thams cad dbang du 'od// de nas bdud ni bcom byas nas// gar byed bzhin pas pad ma 'dzin// sdig pa thams cad rab 'joms shing // che son pa rnams
131b3: gnas par byed/ / 'dod pa thams cad 'grub 'gyur cing // rnal 'byor rnams kyi srid la sbyor// rang gi sems kyis dngos grub 'thob// rnam rtog nyid du mi bya'o// gzhan du srid pa'i sbyor bdag nyid// sems thams cad ni
131b4: rab 'dug pa/ / 'khrul zhing chud zos mu stegs rnams// bstan pa rnams la rab 'jug bya// bag chags ngan pa yongs spangs nas// byi nas rang bzhin bstan par bya// bza' ba thams cad mnyam sbyor las// bza' ba med par/
131b5: rtag tu gnas// bcom ldan pa dam gar mdzad pa'i// de bzhin gshegs pas 'di ga sungs so// zhes bya ba ni dmag dbang gi chog ster ba byed pa nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa'o// de nas rnam par snang mdzad kyis// mtshan nyid bshad kyis lha mo nyon// gzugs
131b6: las 'das pa'i ye shes gang / / de ni ye shes chen por brjod// rnam par snang bzhin pa de bzhin// sems dpa' chen po'i ming can no// spu khung rtse mo thams cad las// de rnams des 'thon stobs chen po// de rnams bu gar
131b7: rab zhugs pas/ / 'khor lo bzhi yi mtsho skyes son// ji ltar mar la mar zhugs pa// de bzhin du ni khams la zhugs// g.yo ba 'gog par byas pa yis// de 'drar thams cad mthong bar 'gyur// gang mthong ba ni de
131b8: mthong nyid/ / dngos gis gdong ni lta bar gyis// mi dang mi mo lha sogs kyi// gzugs ni pad ma'i 'dab chu bzhin// srog chen po der shes bya ste// shi ba'i lus las nges par 'thod// aM ga yi ge yid la bya// dbugs

132a1: rnab yis mngon par bya/ / bdag nyid kyisan du ga to// gsor ba yini rnas 'byor ldan// sems la ma gyi yi ger 'gyur// lus la gnas par brtson par bya// ta yig mchog gi dang po yis/
132a2: shes dngos po rnams su sprul// chos kyi dbyings rnams kyi dbus su// rnam snang mdzad kyi bsgom pa'o// bdud rtsi'i rgyun 'dzag pa rnams kyis// sngags pa la ni 'bad par bya// bye ba stong phrag grangs kyin// rnal 'byor
132a3: ma la 'dod spyod 'gyur/ / 'dod pa rnams kyis mi 'pho ste// 'dod na bde ba rnam par spro// de tshe rnal 'byor ma mnyes nas// dngos grub thams cad ster bar byed// sdug dang mi sdug rnam dpyod pa// rnal 'byor ma la
132a4: mi bya'o/ / myur bar stong phrag rnam kyi gzugs// rnam par snang mdzad du bsgrub bya// sna tshogs du ma'i skad kyis chos// de rnams lus ris can gyis nyan// rnam snang mdzad dang mi bskyod dang // rin chen dbang dang
132a5: A ro l-ig/ don yod rdo rje sems dpa' dang // rgyu yi rdo rje 'chang la sogs// shes rab pha rol phyin sogs kyang // de rnams rnal 'byor ma las rig/ 'gro drug grol bar byed nyid dang // bde 'gro rnams su
132a6: 'jug pa po/ / blo ldan so sor sems can don// gnyis med dngos por byed par 'gyur// mi shes nyon mongs gzhomangon du// tshul 'di yang ni bsgom par bya// khams thams cad kyi til mar ni// dogs pa med pas
132a7: bya ba yin/ / rnam snang sbyor bas btung bya 'am// thug pa yang de nyid kyis bya'o// de yis sna nas sbyin par bya// rdo rje'i lam du rtag tu'o// rdo rje 'chang gi gzugs su 'gyur// rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi yid 'ong // gnyis pa
132a8: thams cad kun sbyor las/ / rnal 'byor mas 'dod thar par sbyor// bcom ldan thams cad dag pa'i sku// rab grol mdzad pas 'di gsungs so// zhes bya ba ni rnam par snang mdzad kyi cho ga ste rab tu byed pa nyi shu rtsa gsum pa'o// de nas gsad chen bshad bya

132b1: ste/ mdor bsdus pa yis rgyas par min// rdo rje sems dpa'i rab sbyor bas// gnas thams cad du gang dag bzhugs// rdo rjes mi byed ye shes te// sems dpa' snying po ston pa'o// stong nyid snying rje dbyer med pa// rdo rje sems
132b2: dpa rab tu grags/ / zla ba rjerje'i basbyor bas// gnas rnams bgrod pa bstan par bya// pu li las lte bar 'bab// dz+wa la d+ha ra yang dag gnas// u byin du ni kun tu spyod// ar bu der bza' dang bdud can no// go d+ha ba dir rol
132b3: paste/ / rA me shwa ring rgyal dang pham// de bi ko Ti ri rjes su 'dzin// mA la wer rnal 'byor ma'i gtso// kA ma ru par tshig 'grub bo// oM trer mngon sum dngos grub ster// tri sha ku ner dbang rnams kyi// myur du dngos grub rab tu 'jug/
132b4: kos la'i rnal 'byor dngos grub ste// ka ling kar phra mo'i dngos grub ste// lam pa ka ru rtag par 'grub// kAn cir gsang pa'i dngos grub bo// hi ma la yang 'thun pa 'grub// pre ta pu ri rang gi lta ba// gri ha de btang bkas gnang
132b5: ba/ lhan skyes 'gro med sor b+ha ra// gser gling du ni rang don 'grub// nA ga rer gnas kyi dngos grub ster// si d+hur stobs 'grub de bzhin du// ma dur 'chi med dngos grub bo// ku lu ta rang bzhin dngos grub tu// de nyid rnal 'byor
132b6: rnams la skye/ / rdo rje sems dpa' rtag bsgoms nas// thams cad dngos grub 'gro bar byos// gnas sogs rnal 'byor ma dbus su// khams su gyur pa'i ri chen po// gsang ba'i tshigs tu shes par bya// mchog ni lhan cig
132b7: skyes par dran/ / dgyes pa ye shes shes byaste// thams cad bdag nyid yon tan gnas// rtag bzhugs gnyis med rnam pa ste// sems can 'jig rten las bshinas khyod naganas kyi yang/ rdo sems dpa' bdag nyid kyis/
132b8: rAda'i dbus las yang dag byung // de nyid du ni thas nas 'gro// gnas par de ni mngon par brjod// de yang thams cad chog bzhin// dpa' bo mchog rnams kyis shes bya// de nyid nyi shurtsa bzhi'i bdag/ de ni nus par rab tu

133a1: bshad/ skyes pa dang ni skye bzhin pa'i// nus pa thams cad rab 'jug gis// dngos med ma yin pa'i gzugs kyis// dbyangs dang phyi mo gsum spangs pa// thig le'i gzugs ni sems dpa' che// rdo rje sems dpa'
133a2: rab tu grags/ / dpa' bo thams cad mnyam sbyor las// rnal 'byor ma rnams kun gyi gtso// sgyu ma'i gnas kyi dngos grub ni// 'jug mdzad bcom ldan gyis 'di gsungs// zhes bya ba ni gnas thams cad kyi bdag nyid can
133a3: gyi rab tu byed pa ste nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa'o/ / de ltar dpa' bo gtso bo yi// las kyi tshogs rnam shes par bya/ nyi shu bzhi bdag nyid nyams dga'// thams cad gsang chen gyis gnas su// gsang chen rgyas par bshad pa can//
133a4: kun spyod cho ga bshad par bya// sngon bshad khams kyi 'du shes ni// gsum gsum du ni bshad pa yin// nyi shu rtsa bzhi gsum rnams can// de rnams brgyad brgyad shes par bya// dpa' bo nyi shu bzhi rnams kyi// re re'i
133a5: nyi shu rtsa bzhi ste/ / zlum po'i rnam pa'i rnal 'byor du// thig le nyid ni bzhag par bya// de rnams dkyil 'khor phyi rol du// bskor bas ting 'dzin rdo rjer 'gyur// shar las sogs pa rim bzhin du// rdo rje 'khor lo sog
133a6: par 'pho/ / dkyil 'khor du ni lha thams cad// rnal 'byor ma kun shes par bya// bdun bcu drug lhag pa'i lnga brgya// nyin zhag rnams su yongs 'pho bya// re ra yi ni srog 'gyur ba// sum bcu rtsa bdun phyed bcas pa'o//
133a7: nyi khri brgya phrag bcu drug ni// nyin zhag la ni shes par bya// lus can kun gyi rang bsam pa// de rnams kyi dus rab tu 'jug/ rnal 'byor de dngos bsgom rnams la// sangs rgyas bsam pa rab tu skor// 'di rnams kun
133a8: nyid dpa' bo rnams/ / gnas sogs nyi shu bzhi can la// thim dang longs spyod bdag byed pas// dus dang dus tshod za bar byed// 'di lta'i cho ga'i bya ba yis// kun tu gnas pa bdag ma yin// rnal 'byor ma tshogs

133b1: dang dpa' ga/ den bdag dang bdag gang ram bzhan na// sangs rgyas 'dzag tan thams cad tu/ bdag dang bdag ga par snang yul mang // yang ces cam du kyang 'das pa// gzung ba la bstan pag//
133b2: de kho na nyid ma rig pa yis 'jig rten mongs// de kho na nyid rnam par spangs pas dngos grub min// rnal 'byor rnams la rgyun rgyal du// de dang de'i cho ga ye shes// 'od gas la sgyum bdag gis ni// sgyu ma'i 'jig
133b3: rted la bshad do/ / kye lhan cig skyes pa'i rang bzhin gcig pur bstan// lha dang lha min sa gsum 'joms la 'dud / dbang po dang na 'jig rten pa yis mi shes te// mchog tu bde ba chen po'i klu yas mchod
133b4: bar gyis/ / gang zhig las thams cad pa'i gzugs su bsgom par bya'o// srid dang mya ngan 'das par ston pa gal ci// sgyu ma gti mug gis ni mi mor gnas// sems can theg pa da dung nyams par gal byed// de ltar
133b5: yongs su dgyes pa'i mgur/ / bcom ldan rang nyid kyis gsungs so// de nyid dkyil 'khor rnams dang ni// byang chub dus su thang bar gyis// dpa' bo thams cad mnyam sbyor las// rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog/
133b6: rdo rje mkha' 'grod bzhin gshegs// bcom ldan bdag pos 'di gsungs so// 'di ni dpa' mkha' 'gro rgya mtshon la 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las de kho na nyid nyi shu rtsa lnga'i bdag nyid rgyud thams cad kyi dod ston pa
133b7: po gsang chen thams cad ba zhes bya ba'i le'u ste lnga bcu pa'o/ / de nas rnal 'byor ma dpa' bo// rnam pa du ma'i 'khor gyis kyang // rdo rje mkha' 'gro khyab pa'i bdag/ bcom ldan bdag po la bstod pa// khyod ni 'dod
133b8: chags chen po'i tshul/ / dngos dang dngos med rang bzhin can// dag pa'i rang bzhin gyi ni gzugs// chos rnams bstan pas tshim par 'gyur// chos dang chos min pa'i gzugs// chos dang chos pa khyod gnyis sde//

134a1: bdagags skal pa ngas pa yis// 'dag tan kun kyadan can// bdag tad ldan pa bab// sangs rgyas 'dag tan drug byed pa// khyad byas dam chagan pa// gzhan pan cag
134a2: nyid las byung / / bdag gis bsod nams rjes bsgoms pas// byang chub mchog tu yid bsgrub so// ston pa mchog tu bde la bzhugs// de yis sems can don mdzad pa'o// hUM gi yi ge'i sgra sgrogs pas// nga
134a3: rgyal can gyi bgegs skrag 'gyur/ / khyod kyis nye bar bsten pas ni// de rnams la ni skye 'chi med// bde ba'i rgyal po nyid du rtsen// byang chub kyi ni yid du bgrod// khyod dang thabs gcig 'dres par 'gyur// gong bu
134a4: gcig pu gnyis med bzhugs/ / de ltar bstod pas rdo rje che// mchod pa bzhi ni rab ston mdzad// dkyil 'khor bdag dang gnyis med nyid// mchod pa rnams ni gnyis med byed// phyi dang nang bdag nyid can rdzas// gnyis
134a5: pa yi ni mchod par dran/ / bza' dang btung sogs la rol pa// gnyis med mchod pa gsum pa'o// bzhi pa chos dang rnal 'byor dag/ 'dzin pa yi ni mchod pa'o// de lta'i mchod pa la brten nas// thams cad byas
134a6: pas las rgyal por/ / 'gyur ro rdo rje mkha' 'gro ni// gru gsum du ni mnyes bya ste// sngon du dkyil 'khor byas nas ni// lag pa g.yon pas thams cad du// pad ma yis ni bskor bas snod// sngags pa rnams kyis
134a7: gzung bar bya/ / sngon du rnal 'byor ma la ni// skra grol ba yis gtor ma sbyin// rnal 'byor ma kun chu skyes ni// kha yis bzung nas dkrug par bya// de yi lag par son pa'i dpal// gang su yis kyang dbrog mi nus//
134a8: ji ltar bde bas bde ba gzung // rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mchog mnyes bya// rtag tu dam tshig bskyang bar bya// spun gyi spyod pa'am bsten par bya// snying rje'i mchog dbang gyur bya zhing // dpa' bo rnams ni mi rtag par

134b1: bsgom pa snang ba med pa ya/ / rang bzhin dbang du gyur par gnas// rdodza pa dam snyoms 'jug pas// phyag rgyan dag bdag nyid mchog/ stong nyid gnyis med nal 'byor bas// dngos po thams cad spang bar bya// den
134b2: dam can de nyid 'dir bya/ / rtag tu byang chub sems dran bya// man ngag gcig ni bsgoms pa yis// man ngag thams cad mtshon par bya// ji ltar sa gcig thob pa yis// sa thams cad ni 'thob par 'gyur// de bzhin
134b3: man ngag thams cad kyang / / mnangag gcig gis 'thob par 'gyur// byis pa rnams dang rgan po dang // rnal 'byor ma rnams thams cad du// mnyam pa'i mchod pa'i cho ga yis// mkhas pa yis ni bya ba yin// ma mnyam
134b4: pa yis dngos grub 'joms/ dmyal ba sogs par ltung bar 'gyur// rgan po yon tan kun gnas pa// de rnams mnyes pas byang chub ster// khyad par mchod pa nyid ni 'dir// byis pa rnams dang de bzhin yang //
134b5: gnyis bcas rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis// me tog bskor ba la sogs bya// kun tu smod pa'i dag mi bya// 'dod dang 'dod min sbyor bral bya// ma byin par yang blang bya zhing // rtag tu srog chags gsad par bya// sems
134b6: can rnams la brdzun smra zhing / / ma sogs rnal 'byor ma la bgrod// 'khor lo mchod pa rgyun du bya// bza' bya lnga la sogs pa sbyin// de yi bsod nams kyis 'thob pa// dus thams cad du bgegs med dang //
134b7: grub pa'i rnal 'byor ma mthong bas// bsam pa gzhan ni rab tu 'jug/ dpa' bo thams cad mnyam sbyor las// rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog/ rdo rje mkha' 'grod bzhin gshegs// bcom ldan bdag pos
134b8: 'di gsungs so/ / dpal mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las bstod pa dang mchod pa bzhi la sogs pa gnyis su med pa'i dam tshig bsten pa'i le'u zhes bya ba ste lnga bcu rtsa gcig pa'o// /

135a1: rlung 'di rab tu blang ba ni// mthung 'azung bar mi 'gyur ro// mtshan nyid thams cad yongs su rdzogs// mtshan nyid med pa thams cad srungs// sum bcu ba na bdag nyid dul gyung// gnas
135a2: med mkha' 'gro rgya mdang/ gnyis so/ zung zung chen po// 'dus pa'i rnam pa'i gzugs can te// sangs rgyas byang chub sems rnams kyi// dus thams cad dun lan gnas// yig kun gyi zam tog/ 'dum tha
135a3: sum bcu drug dang / / mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho ba bshad de// chen po chung ngur gsungs pa'o// ri rab kyi ni rdul tshad kyi/ mkha' 'gro thams cad kyis gsungs so// mtha' yas shing ni mu med
135a4: nyid/ / brtsod pa'i dus kyi sa'i nang du// bcom ldan mtha' yas pas 'di gsungs// shAka kye seng ges gsungs pa'i rgyud// rnal 'byor pha rol son pa'o// nyan pa ston pa rang nyid de// 'chang po skye bo gzhan kyang ngo // legs
135a5: par gsungs dang 'chad 'gyur ba/ / de'i rang bzhin du'ang 'grod par 'gyur// bsdu ba mdzad pa sogs rnams kyis// bdag las bgrod pa de thob bo// ma mo thams cad 'dus rnams kyis// rdo rje'i gnas rnams su bsdus/
135a6: gcig la gcig gi bzhed pa ni// gsol ba 'debs shing gsol 'debs mdzad// bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa yi// tshig 'di la ni mngon par dgal// sdig pa rnams las grol bar gro// srid pa las ni
135a7: bar byos/ / dpa' bo thams cad mnyam skyor las// rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog/ rdo rje mkha' 'grod bzhin gshegs// bcom ldan padag pos 'di gsungs so// dpal mkha' 'gro rgya mtshon la 'byor ma'i
135a8: rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las rgya mtsho drug la sogs pa la rnal 'byor dang ye shes dang sdom pa dang bya ba dang de kho na nyid rgya mtshor gyur pa dang / / mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho las 'di rnams dang mi mnyam pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po

135b1: zhes bya ba rdzogs s+ho/ / // dpal ba la yul grub pa'i gnas chen po yu tung lhun gyis grub pa'i gtsug lag khang chen por rgya gar gyi baN ri ti chen po rdo rje slob dpon rtog ge pa rnams kyi gtsug gi nor bu dus deng sang 'gran
135b2: pa med pa/ / snying rje chen pos thugs brlan pa'i nga tshul can// phyogs sna tshogs nas 'dus pa'i skye 'gro rnams la chos dang zang zing gi char gyis tshim par mdzad pa dpal rdo rje phag mo'i zhabs kyi chu skyes kyi rdul la reg pa
135b3: shAkya'i sras po rgyal ba'i sde'i zhal snga nas dang / / bod kyi lo ts+tsha ba shAkya'i dge slong d+harma yon tan gyis mnyan cing bsgyur ba'o// phyis gang zag chos kyi spyan can dpal mchog dang po'i rdo rje'i bka'i tshul dang yang bstun te zhus gtug/
135b4: legs par byaso// mkha' mnyam pa de rdzogs sna tshogs sprul pa sangs rgyas rnams kyi sku// des gsungs dri med sna tshogs gdul bya'i bsam dbang gis// gsung gcig gis kyang sna tshogs don mang ston pas dpyad par
135b5: bka'/ / de ltar yin yang ji ltar mi bdag shing rta cher zhugs nas// g.yul ngor 'jug dus rkang gis bgrod rnams 'thab par mi brtson nam// de bzhin sngon gyi mkhas pa chen po rnams kyi rjes 'brangs nas// kho bos gzhan
135b6: don nus min na'ang phan pa'i bsam pas bsgyur/ / 'di la gzhung bla ma'i ma yin rang gi blo gros skyon gyis ni// sgra don 'gal bar gyur pa bcom ldan dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma rnams dang // mkha' 'gro'i tshogs dang bstan dga'i lha rnams
135b7: mkhas pa rnams kyis bzod par rigs/ / 'di las thob pa'i dge ba dri med cung zad des// 'gro kun rdo rje 'chang gi go 'phang thob gyur cig/ bdag gis srol btong tsam 'di la// sgra don 'jug pa mkhyen rnams kyi// skad
135b8: gnyis sgrubs gzigs pa na/ / skyon du gyur snang bcos par zhu// phrag dog sgo nas mi phyar zhing // rjes su yi rang ba yang mdzod rdzog s+ho// sid d+hi/ sid d+hi/ sid d+hi/ rgya gar skad du/ shA ma hA sa ma ba rod dA ya tan tra rA

136a1: bas+ya rA ma/ / bod skang du/ dpal ba de mchog 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po// dpal te draka la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
136a2: pathams cad kyi su dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje btsun mo'i b+ha gnams la bzhags te/ / 'phags pa dga' bo la sogs pa 'ad chags dang bral ba rnams kyis bkod cing // 'phags pa spyan ngas gzigs kyi dbang thug la sogs
136a3: pardal 'byor kyi dbang phyug bye ba phrag brgyad bcu dbas su phyag na rdo rje la gzigs nas 'dzum pa mdzad pa dang / / phyag na rdo rje stan las langs te// bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas// pus mo g.yas pa'i lhangs la
136a4: btsugs te/ / lag pa thal me sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba btab pa// kye rnam pa kun mchog sdom pa'i// bskyed pa'i rnal 'byor mtshan nyid dang // rdzogs pa yang ni ji ltar lags// bcom ldan lha las nyan
136a5: par 'tshal/ / rlung dang me dang chu dngas// de bzhin nam mkha' ji ltar lags// rnam pa lnga ni ji ltar lha// gtso bo yul drug de bzhin ci// phyi dang nang du gnas pa yi// sku gsum byin brlabs ji lta bu// lha yi sku ni ji ltar
136a6: lags/ / gtso bos de bzhin lha mo gsungs// zla ba nyim ci zhig lha// lam lnga po ni ji ltar lags// lus kyi rang bzhin ji lta bu// de bzhin rtsa'i gzugs ni ci// rtsa ri grangs kyi tshad ni du// de bzhin lus kyi gong bu ci//
136a7: sbas pa'i dam tshig gi ni brda// gtso bos bdag la bshad dra gsol// byi dang nang gi bdag nyid kyi// gnas la sogs pa'i brda ru zhig/ ji ltar sa la sogs pa 'thog/ mtshan mdza ltar mthong bar 'gyur// khyed kyi
136a8: las ni bcu gnyis gang / / sngags kyi bzlas pa ji ltar 'gyur// bgrang phreng dag ni ji ltar rigs// bzlas pa'i grangs ni du zhig lags// lha'i rnam pa'i rnal 'byor ci// dkyil 'khor brib du zhig mchis// sngags kyi

136b1: dngos grub ci zhigs/ / gzhon du ma'i mchod pa'i// bya dang bya min nyim gang// gtsa ba myom byed gtor ma ci// bdud rtsi lngasags ji ltar lta/ sngags bu lngasegs ji ltar gyur// dkyil 'khor zlab ba shang dugs
136b2: thigag pa pa ni dzi lar 'gyur/ / de skangs de yongs su spyang // bsrung ba'i 'khor lo ji ltar 'gyur// ljo pon gyi ni byi ba gang // ji ltar slob ma yongs su gdang // dbang bsrung ba'i grangs ni dra// bzhi pa yang ru
136b3: snar 'gyur/ / dus kyi nges pa dzi lta bu// de bzhin 'chib bsru ba gang // dus bzhi'i mang ni dri zhig mchis// gling bzhi pa ni ji ltar lags// dus dang dus min dngos grub ci// stod pa ji ltar spyad par bgyi// rnal
136b4: ma'i rgyud ri dra/ / ral 'byor krung ni ji ltar 'gyur// mdo sde'i grangs ni ji lta bu// de bzhin pha rol phyin pa du// rab gnas sbyin sreg mchod sbyin dang // sngags kyi dngos grub ji ltar 'gyur// bcud kyi ler ni ji ltar lha
136b5: myos byed btung ba ji ltar 'gyur/ / gsang sngags ji ltar 'byung 'gyur lha// sngags btub ni ji ltar 'gyur// tshar gcod pa ni ci zhig lha// gtso bo rjes gzung ji lta bu// bcom ldan de nyid rnams ni ci// stong pa
136b6: nyid dang snying rje gang / / stong pa nyid cirang bzhin ci// ji ltar de bzhin nyid rang bzhin// chos rnams thams cad yongs shes pa'i// bsgom pa'i mtshan nyid gtso bos gsungs// dpal bde mchog 'byung ba'i rgyud las//
136b7: zhus pa'i le'u ste/ dang po'o// / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// phyag na rdo rje gas rab 'byung ba 'di zhus pa legs so legs so// de nas de'i phyir bskyed pa yi// rim pa'i bsgom pa yang dag bshad
136b8: snga rtsegs las kyi rang bzhin gyi/ / skye gnas bzhi po rnams su 'gyur// sgong skyes mngal nas skyes pa dang // drod gsher dang ni rdzus skyes rnams// dang bakhrung khrung rma bya dang // ne tso gzhang sogs sgo skyes te/

137a1: glang po ma he ba lang ta// bong bu mi sogs mngal nas skyes// srin bu 'bu dang phye ma leg// nya la sogs pa drod ga sher skyes// lha dang dmyal ba'i sems can rnams// de bzhin par de'i srid pa dang /
137a2: bskal pa dang po pa la sogs// 'di rnams rdzus skyes sems can no// shar gyi lus 'phags ban lang spyod// de bzhin byang gi sgra mi snyan// gling gsum po'i mi rnams ni// longs spyod chen pos yang dag 'tsho// blun
137a3: rmongs bye brag mi phyed cing / / rtog med rnam par spyod med pa'o// 'dzam bu gling du legs skyes pa'o// las kyi sa par rab tu grags// legs byas nyes par byas pa'i las// mchog dang 'bring dang tha ma rnams// skye
137a4: sngon gyi rnam smin 'dir/ / skye bo rnams la snang bar gyur// rgyags dang ser sna gdug sems rnams// g.yo rgyu mngon pa'i nga rgyal dang // chags sdang gti mug la sogs kyis// rims dang nad la sogs pas gzir/
137a5: 'dzam bu gling pa'i gtso bo mchog/ yul dbus su ni skyes pa ste// sngon gyi dge ba la ltos nas// dbang po rno 'bring rtul por 'gyur// mi ru skyes pa 'bras bu'i dam pa dang po ste// rang gi khyim nas nges 'byung rnyed pa
137a6: gnyis pa yin/ / rab tu byung nas dge ba bsgrub pa gsum pa ste// rtse gcig yid ni thob par gyur pa bzhi par gsungs// sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin// mi rnams kyis rab mi shes te// thog med dus kyi nyon mongs
137a7: kyi/ / bag chags rab tu bsags byas pas// de phyir sngon byas las kyis ni// skye dang 'chi ba yang dag 'byung // tshogs pa ma rnyed de srid du// zhag bdun par do'i srid par gnas// srid pa bar do'i sems can ni//
137a8: 'dren pa'i bgrod pa ji bzhin du// 'di ltar las kyi zhags pa yis// 'gro ba drug tu rab tu skye// pha ma'i kun tu sbyor sogs ni// srid pa'i skye bos mthong 'gyur nas// rta la zhon bzhin rnam shes ni// rlung gi bzhon pa/

137b1: zhan nas su// skad cig zang cig nyid lani/ shin tu sbyar bar 'ongs 'gyur nas// shin tu dga' dang bcas stobs kyis// kha' las nas 'jug par 'gyur// rgyan stang phrag bdun bcu gnyis// rab ba skar nga na
137b2: cig la/ / a li ki li 'u byas pas// mchog tu dga' ba yang dag thog// khra ba khrag de'i dbras su ni// thig la'i gzugs kyis yang dag gnas// dang po'i rnam bcur nur po// mar mar po na gnyis pa yod// ltar
137b3: ltar por zlas gsum pa ste/ / de bzhin bzhis ga ga ga// rlung rnams kyis ni bskal tsam gyis// ga'i rnam pa la khur 'gyur// tha balngar gyur sa bon las// yan lagal ni ba r+b+haH// zlababadun na dang thA/
137b4: sed mo rtags ni skye bar 'gyur// zla ba brgyad na dbang po dang // lus kyi yan lag 'byung bar 'gyur// zla ba dgun yang dag rdzogs// zla ba btsun sems dang ldan// nur nur rang bzhin mi bstod pa// mar mar zin
137b5: rin chen 'byung / / 'od dpag med mgon ltar ltar po// gor gor po ni don yod grub// sa khrang 'gyur rnam par snang mdzad de// rnam pa lngar ni bstan pa yin// dri chu khrag na mi bskyod pa// sa bon rang bzhin 'od
137b6: dpag med/ / gong ba rin chen 'byung ldan te// ro gcig 'dres pa rnam snang bzhugs// skye gnas dbus su rtsa gnyis ni// g.yas dang g.yon na de bzhin gnas// g.yon nu khu ba zhes bshad de// g.yas
137b7: ras de bzhin khrag yin no/ / de dag gcig tu 'dus gyur pa// chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin no// las kyis bon dbang pob pas// rlung gis yang dag bsgyur nas su// chos kyi 'byung gnas sgo ran// gang
137b8: rangs par phyogs par 'gyur/ / sku g.yas su ni brten nas su// cog bur mngon par phyogs te gnas/ su g.yon yang dag brten nas na// shes rab ltar na mngon phyogs 'gyur// mkhas pas

138a1: bon ltung ba'i rim/ / dus kyi skad cig yang dag mtshon// g.yas ni rlung ni rgyu ba gang // thams cad du ni skyes bur 'gyur// g.yon nas rlung ni rtsub gang // nges par bud med rnams su 'gyur// gnyi
138a2: ga'i dbus rgyu'i sa bon gang / / rtag tu ma ning 'gyur ba'o// chu khams pa yir shes par bya// me yi khams ni ma yi'o// lpags pa sha dang khrag rnams ni// ma las skyes zhes bshad pa ste// rgyus parkang dang khub
138a3: rnams/ / pa las skyes zhes bshad pa yin// drug po 'di dag bsdus pa'i lus// rdo rje sems dpas gang gsungs pa// gzugs dang tshor ba 'du shes dang // 'du byed rnam shes de bzhin te/ sangs rgyas lnga yi rang bzhin
138a4: du/ / phung po nges par skye ba yin// sred pa skyed pa'i rim shes pas// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thob bya'i phyir// 'di ni phung po yongs mkhyen pa'i// de nyid gsung ba rnams kyis bshad// 'di ni bskyed pa'i rim pa ngas par
138a5: bstan pa'i rim pa dbye ba ste gnyis pa'o/ / // de nas gang zhig shes tsam gyis// myur du dngos grub thob 'gyur ba'i// rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i bsgom pa ni// yang dag rab tu bshad par bya// lus kyi dkyil 'khor la
138a6: brten nas/ / chos dang longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku// rdzogs pa'i byang chub rim bsgrubs pas// lus kyi dkyil 'khor zhes gsung so// dbang po dman pas bskyed rim gyi// dkyil 'khor bsgom zhing bsam par bya//
138a7: dbang po rnon pos skad cig gi// rnam pas sems tsam dkyil 'khor bas ma// skad cig rnam pa'i rnal 'byor gyis// rdzogs pa'i rim pa bsgom pa'i// khams gsum gzhal yas khang bdag nyid// srog chags rnam
138a8: ni dkyil 'khor ba/ / de dbus skad cig rnam pa yis// dkyil 'khor bdag po rnal 'byor pa'o// oM AHhU~M gi sngags kyis ni// sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor te// mtho risas stengs sa 'og tu// skad cig gis

138b1: nisku gcig 'gyur/ / skad cig rnam pas rnal 'byor te// skad cig rnam pas gsang sngags 'don// dbang po kun dang mnyam sbyor ba// mkha' 'gro dra ba'i bde ba mcheg/ khams bzhi pa dang phung po lnga// de bzhin yul drug bdag
138b2: nyid ni/ / khrag mthung lha mo'i ye shes te// de la tha dang mi brtag go// dkyil 'khor de bzhin nyid rgyas btab/ de bzhin mkha' mnyam stong pa nyid// sna tshogs de bzhin nyid bdag med// thabs ni snying rje'i stobs yin te// rlu
138b3: du 'jug pa rnam rtog bral/ / dkyil 'khor snying po mchog yin no// rnam par mi rtog sbyor bsams kyang // de tshe mi rtog bsam mi khyab// de yang rnam pa kun gyi mchog/ bde ba'i dbang po rnam pa med// de nyid dngos dang dngos
138b4: min bdag/ rtag tu srid pas 'byung bar mdzad// sna tshogs spros pa'i rtog pa med// rtag tu 'byung ba bde ba che// skye ba med pa'i rang bzhin gyis// de las skye ba yang dag 'byung // bems po min phyir bdag nyid rig/ mi
138b5: shes rnam par mi mthong bas/ / gzugs med gang du'ang mi nas shing // 'gyur ba med phyir brtan pa'o// kun rdzob skye ba 'byung bas na// chad pa min phyir dngos med min// lhan cig skyes dga'i rang dngos su// chos
