252a1: khro bo khams gsum sems can ste// nang gi dbye ba 'di nyid ni// bla ma'i zhal las rnyed par 'gyur// bla ma dman pa'i sems can rnams// sngags dang phyag rgya rnyed mi 'gyur// gang zhig shin gas
252a2: bas ni/ / mdzam gling 'dir sangs rgyas bsngags// gru gsum dag pa e yi dbyibs// dbus su dgyes pa'i e baM yin// gru gsum dkyil 'khor nyams dga' bar// rdo rje rayi rnam par byung // btsun mo'i
252a3: b+ha ga zhes kyang bya/ / chos kyi 'byung gnas zhes byar bshad// de yi nang song pad ma'i ni// 'dab ma brgyad pa snying por bcas// de la A li kA li 'dres// sde tshan brgyad ni rnam par gnas// sngags kyi gzug
252a4: kyi lus can gyi/ / las kyi tshogs ni byed par 'gyur// yi ge rnams ni lnga bcu nyid// rig byed rnams la nye bar gnas// sngags rnams nyid dang rgyud rnams dang // phyi rol tshul gyi bstan bcos kyi// rdo rje snying
252a5: bo'i rang bzhin 'di/ / gzhan du a las cung zad med// a ka tsaT ta ba ya sha/ sde chen dga' ba lnga bcu yang // mnyam pa dag tu sprul pa rnams// rdo rje rali pad mar son// 'dab ma brgyad po phyogs rnams dang /
252a6: mtshams rnams su ni 'di rnams rigs// de rnams dbus su ze 'brul// dam pa'i dbang phyug ma yod do// sde tshan brgyad po rnams kyis ni// yi ge dam pa yongs su bskor// ya ni yig 'bru kun gyi mchog/ don chen
252a7: sde tshan gtso bo ni/ / lus can rnams kyi sngags kun ni// 'di nyid las ni yang dag 'byung // gang zhig ral gri/ mig sman dang // rkang byug ri lu rkang 'og dang / gnod sbyin mo'i yan lag ma// 'jig
252a8: ten gsum gyi khongs su rgyu/ / dngul chu'i 'gro bas rjes su 'brang // gang zhig thams cad mthu che ba// rang gi khyim du lnga bcu 'dod dang ldan par 'grub bo// de ni sde tshan brgyad nang son// dbyangs mchog sde tshan bdag

252b1: nyid 'byin/ / skye bo rnams kyi tshig rgyas pa// gang zhig cung zad rtogs bya ba// de kun sngags kyi gzugs kyis ni// de phyir rab tu skye bar 'gyur// lus can rnams ni thams cad kyi// sgra ni sngags zhes brjod par/
252b2: bya// sna tshogs mdud pa'i gnas chen las// chos kyi ral rnam par 'byung // dngos grub rdzu 'phrul rnam gnas pa'i// sngags dang nges pa gang yang med// rang bzhin gyis ni ma skyes pa'o// sngags kyis yig
252b3: 'bru dbang phyug mchog/ yang dag sbyor 'byung mtshan nyid ni// de nas mchog tu rab bshad bya// e ni sa ru shes par bya// las kyi phyag rgya spyan ma nyid// snying rje chen mo thabs chen mo// rang bzhin sna tshogs
252b4: spyod yul ma/ / lte bar sna tshogs 'dam skyes la// sprul pa'i 'khor lor rnam par gnas// baM ni chu ru shes par bya// chos kyi phyag rgya mA ma kI// byams pa dang ni smon lam tshul// lha mo rdo rje'i rigs gtso mo//
252b5: snying khar chu skyes 'dab brgyad la// chos kyi 'khor lor yang dag gnas// ma ni ma ru brjod pa ste// phyag rgya chen mo gos dkar mo// dga' dang stobs kyi rnal 'byor gyis// lha mo pad ma'i rigs byung
252b6: ma/ / lkog mar chu skyes 'dab brgyad gnyis// longs spyod 'khor lor yang dag gnas// ya ni rlung gi rang bzhin te// nyon mongs thams cad rab 'joms byed// dam tshig phyag rgya chen mo des// lha mo las kyi
252b7: rigs gtso mo/ / btang snyoms ye shes rnal 'byor gyis// sgrol ma 'khor ba sgrol ma'o// 'dab skyes 'dam ma sum bcu gnyis// bde chen 'khor lo chen por gnas// e ni shes rab brjod par bya//
252b8: ba ni thabs dang ldan pa nyid// baM gyis rnam par brgyan pa nyid// e ni nges par mdzes par 'gyur// thabs dang shes rab rang bzhin gyis// steng dang 'og tu snyoms par 'jug/ e nyid dang ni bo nyid dag

253a1: gnyis gnyis su ni brjod pa nyid/ 'di skad ces bya ba'i tshig gi phrad ni de skad ces gsungs nas zhes bya ba'i mthar thug pa'i rgyud kyi tshogs la bsnyegs so zhes brjod do// bdag gis thos pa zhes bya
253a2: ba ni de skad du 'dod chags chen po 'di la rtag tu gnas pa'o/ / shA zhes bya ba ni 'dzag par gsungs so// ta zhes bya ba ni gang yang bde ba chen po'i mgon po'o// bdag gis thos pa zhes bya ba ni bdag nyid
253a3: kyis thos pa'i phyir rna ba'i ye shes kyis thos pa yin gyi/ / gas pa ni ma yin no// bcom ldan 'as mi rtogs pa'i skyon gang lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// sdud par byed pa dang 'chang pa po
253a4: dag dbyer med par 'gyur ro/ / yang na rtogs pa nyid ni gdul bya'i skye bo'i dbang du byas nas 'chang ba po nyid dang sdud par byed pa yin te/ 'chang ba bong chos kyang nga // rang gi tshogs ldan nyan pad/ de dag ji ltar
253a5: 'tshal bar bgyi/ / gang du bde ba chen po'i mgon po gar mdzad pa'i tshe// gcig nyid gcig dang du ma'i ro zhes bya ba'i tshig gis rol par mdzad pa'o// rigs kyi bu bcom ldan 'das kyis gang cung zad gsungs
253a6: pa de bdag gis gcig na zhes bya ba ni dus gcig nyid la'o/ / gcig na zhes bya ba ni skad cig la'o// thos pa zhes bya ba ni lhag par son pa ste/ 'dis bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i ting nge 'dzin rnyed do zhes bya bar bsnyegs so//
253a7: dus zhes bya ba ni dus tshod ces gsungs so// dus ni rnam pa gsum du brjod// bde ba'i dus dang sdug bsngal dus// bsam gyis mi khyab dus nyid do// 'o ma'i rgyun ltar sna buka tu/ 'od med pa'i dus su gsungs// me'i gzugs
253a8: kyis 'gro ba nyid/ / sdug bsngal dus dang de gcig grags// gcig ni lhan cig med pa yin// dus ni bsam gyis mi khyab 'gyur// 'dod chags med cing chags bral med// dbu mar dmigs par mi 'gyur ro//

253b1: del 'dod chags nus mtshan nyid/ 'dod chags bral ba 'gog par gsungs// 'di bral dbu par mi rtog pas// 'di gsum dmigs par mi 'gyur ro// 'dod chags nyid dang chags bral nyid// 'dres par gyur pa rnyog pa med// de
253b2: bzhin 'dod chags chags bral las/ / ro mnyam gcig pu'i skad cig ma// dngos po kun gyi ro mnyam pa// bsgom pa'i dus ni gcig tu gsungs// 'di lta ste// dbang phyug dang / gzugs dang / grags
253b3: pa dang / dpal dang / ye shes dang / brtson 'grus phun sum tshogs pa ste// b+ha ga drug ces gsungs so// de 'di la mnga' ba'i phyir bcom ldan 'das so// yang na gang zhig mi mthun pa'i phyogs kyis
253b4: chos de rnams bcom pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das so/ / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rnams dang / de rnams nyid kyi snying po dang // de nyid kyi rdo rje dang / de nyid kyi btsun
253b5: mo dang / / de'i b+ha ga de la bzhugs so// kye bcom ldan 'das bzhugs so zhes bya bas ni gsungs lags// bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' stsal pa// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ro cig pa thabs sna
253b6: tshogs kyis 'dul ba'i skye bo'i yid 'phrog pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i don to/ / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi snying po rdo rje'i rang bzhin gang gi chos kyi 'byung gnas la// gang gi tshe
253b7: bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa de'i tshe bdag gis thos pa'o/ / 'di lta ste/ shes rab gang gis nyon mongs pa dang / nye ba'i nyon mongs pa 'joms pa de'i phyir shes rab b+ha gar gsungs te/ b+ha ga der de bzhin gshegs pa thams
253b8: cad btsun mo lhan cig du bzhugs so/ / e ma sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// kun mkhyen ye shes bla na med// de bzhin gshegs pa'i bde don gang // btsun mo nye bar mdzad pa'o// rigs kyi bu 'di skad bdag gis

254a1: thos pa zhes bya ba'i yig 'bru ni/ chos kyi thog mar rtag tu yang dag par gnas pa ste/ dag pa dang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi dngos grub skyed par byed pa'o// lag na rdo rje ma bshad pa de ngas
254a2: khyod la bshad do/ / tshig 'bru 'di rnams kyis sems can rnams 'khor ba las pha rol du shin du ring bar 'gro ba mngon du mtshon par mdzad pa dang // mngon du mdzad pa de nub pa'i sems kyis skye ba 'dir sangs rgyas
254a3: nyid dam/ rdo rje sems dpa' thob par 'gyur te// gang dag bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i gnas ma thob pa de ni bde bar gshegs pa ste sangs rgyas yin no// mtshan gzhi mtshon par byed pa ni sems dpar yang dag par gsu/
254a4: sdang bas bsten pa can gyis mnar med par rab tu ltung bar 'gyur bas na// kun nas nyon mongs pa can gyi sems kyis ro spang bar bya'o// kun nas nyon mongs pa can gyi srid pa'i 'jigs pa las 'das pa'i sgrub/
254a5: pa po dpal dang ldan pas dag pa'i sems sgom par byed de// thabs dang shes rab kyi sbyor ba 'dis ji ltar yang dag pa thob pa dag pa'i yang dag par rig pa'i bdag nyid can gyi mtshan gzhi thabs dang shes rab
254a6: kyis nus pas nam mkha' dang mnyam zhing gnas gsum du snang ba ste/ / de'i mtshan gzhi ni mtshon par dga' ba dang / thams cad du son zhing rgyu dang rkyen spangs pas yid bzhin gyi nor bu lta bur 'jig rten gyi
254a7: rang dang gzhan gyi don byed de/ / dngos grub thams cad kyi mchog go// rgyud darnams klung gzhigasang ba dpal yang dag par sbyor ba las byung ba'i brtag pa'i rgyal po ste dang po rdzogs s+ho// // de nas yang /
254a8: dag pa bshad bya// rtsung po la phan don du// gang gis slob mdabang bskur ba'i// tshag yang ni bshad par bya// dang por lha yi bdag nyid kyi// rnal 'byor pas ni nor 'dzin spyad// bdapas tshu las rdo rje can// byas

254b1: byinas dkyil 'khor bri/ / tshal dang skye bo med gnas dang // byang chub sems dpa'i khyim dang yang // khang stong dang ni khyim nang du// dkyil 'khor dam pa bzhengs par bya// rdul tshan dam pa nyid dang ni// yang na 'bring bo nyid
254b2: gyis te/ / rin chen lnga yi bdag nyid phyis// yang na 'bras la sogs pas bri// dkyil 'khor khru gsum bya ba dang // mthe bong gsum ni lhag par bya// der ni rigs lnga las byung ba'i// rigs ma bzang po gzhug par bya//
254b3: sngags kyi lam gyi rjes btsal bas// gang che mkhas pas dbang bskur ba// sangs rgyas kun gyi mngon sum du// dkyil 'khor bde bar gshegs gnas su// 'jig rten khams ni mtha' yas bdag// blo dang ldan pa
254b4: de bzhin blang / / rang byin brlab pa'i gnas thob pas// dam tshig nyams pas 'jigs pa yis// rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis don dam las// sngags kyi lam ni de bzhin gsungs// rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs lha'i// dam tshig
254b5: rim pa shin tu ring / / de phyir don kun la 'bad pas// dbang don rgyal ba'i bdag nyid skyes// rdo rje slob dpon yon tan mtsho// ji bzhin sbyar bas gsol ba gdag/ yang na ma dang srid bu mo// bu sring mo yi bu mo nyid// 'di
254b6: nang gang de ji lta bar/ / rnyed nas bsgrub pa nyid du gyis// yang na mngon du 'di med na// kun mkhyen gyis bsngags rig ma ni// sangs rgyas rnams kyis khyad mdzad pa// de ni de phyir gzung bar bya// skye ba gnyis kyi bu mo dang //
254b7: yang na bco blag ma dang / yang na gdol ba mo dang / gzung mo dang / rigs las skyes ma dang // yang na rgyal mo ma dang / gar mkhan gyi bu mo dang / bzo mo dang / yang na ri dgas kyi mig ma dang // rgod pa phra ba dang / ro smang
254b8: rgyas pa dang / nu ma mtho ba dang / b+ha ga bzang ba dang / dam tshig gi spyod pa la shin du dam pa dang // de kho na la gnas pa dang // sngags dang rgyud shis pa ste// sgrub pa po'i dbang po la gnas gsum du che ba'i bu mo 'di

255a1: dag bshad do/ / rigs kyi rim pa nyid kyis 'di rnams kyis thams cad 'gyur ro// ma rnyed ji ltar gang rnyed de// de bzhin bcu drug lon pa nyid// dang po'i lang tsho phun sum tshogs// mig mdzes phyag rgya rnyed nas ni//
255a2: rig ma de nyid blangs nas ni// skyabs su 'gro ba'i rim pas ni// sbyangs nas de nyid gsang ba dang // sngags dang rgyud kyi rim kun bsgrags// sgra 'am 'og gi lam du lces// de nyid de bzhin steng du gzhug/ kun gyi cha rig sna
255a3: tshogs byed/ / rim pa nyid kyis rna cha dang // ska rags che dang sa mdo// lag gdub dang ni rkang gdub ldan// de ltar dngos grub dam pa ster// gang zhig sbyangs pa'i rig ma kun// nye bar 'tshe ba med gnas su// rig pa
255a4: 'dzin pa 'khor mang po/ / de nas tsan dan gos phreng sogs// rnam par brgyan nas dbul bar bya// dri dang me tog rim gro yis// 'o ma'i mchod sogs rgyas pas ni// phyag rgya thabs gcig sgrub pa pos// gus par 'bad pas
255a5: yang dag mchod/ / slob mas pus mo'i lhang ni// sa la dad pas gtsugs nas ni// thal mo sbyar nas bstod pa 'dis// ston pa la ni zhu ba bya/ stong pa'i snying po phyag 'tshal bstod// rtog pa thams cad yang dag spangs// thams
255a6: cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes tshogs/ / ye shes sku la phyag 'tshal bstod// 'gro ba'i mi shes cod pan can// dang pa'i de nyid don ston mdzad// bdag med chos las byung ba'i// rdo rje sems dpa' phyag 'tshal bstod// rdzogs sangs
255a7: rgyas dang byang chub sems/ / pha rol phyin pa'i yon tan rnams// mgon po las ni rtag tu byung // byang chub sems la phyag 'tshal bstod// dkon mchog gsum dang thig chen dang // de bzhin brtan dang 'gro ba dang // khams
255a8: gsum mo ni 'di dag kun/ / 'gro ba'i dpa' bo phyag 'tshal bstod// yid bzhin nor bu ltar gyur pa'i// 'gro ba'i 'dod pa'i don grub phyir// dpal ldan bde gshegs bka' bzhin mdzad// sangs rgyas sras po

255b1: phyag 'tshal bstod/ / de nyid bla med bdag 'tshal bas// yon tan mdzod khyod bka' drin las// kun mkhyen rdo rje dbang gis ni// da ltar nyid du bka' drin skyobs// sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang ba ni// ji ltar
255b2: dpal thugs rdo rje yis/ / rdo rje chos can la gsungs pa// de bzhin mgon pos bdag la skyobs// bcom ldan zhabs pad spangs nas ni// gzhan du bdag la 'gro ma mchis// 'khor ba'i 'gro las des rgyal bar//
255b3: de phyir mgon po thugs rje mdzod// de nas rdo rje slob dpon dpal// rjes su brtse bcas phan sems kyis// slob la snying rje bskyed nas ni// tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor dgug pa dang // 'dod yon lnga yis gang ba dang
255b4: bla re bres pas nye bar 'bar/ / rnal 'byor ma dang sbyor ldan zhing // dril bu sil sil sgra dang ni// me tog bdug dri nyams dga' ba// lha yi dri phreng bde ba'i mchog/ dpal ldan rdo rje sems sogs lha'i// dkyil
255b5: 'khor mchog tu ngo mtshar bar/ / slob dpon skal ba bzang po mchog/ de nas phyag rgya sbyor byas nas// rgyal ba'i bdag skyes byang chub sems// pad ma'i snod du gzhag par bya// rnga yab g.yob cing gdugs
255b6: dang ni/ / bkra shis tshigs bcad gla rnams kyis// phyag rgya ldan pas slob mad// 'gro ba'i gtso bos dbang bskur bya// slob dpon mchog gi dbang phyug gis// dbang ni rin chen mchog byin nas// bzang po'i rang
255b7: bzhin legs sbyangs pa'i/ / dam tshig yid 'ong nges par sbyin// khrag chen dang ni ga pur bcas// tsan dan dmar po sbyar ba dang // rigs kyi bdag po'i chu ldan zhing // lnga pa sems las yang dag byung //
255b8: 'di rnams dam tshig yang dag par// sangs rgyas rnams kyis nye bar gsungs// bzang po rtag tu bskang bar gyis// sdom pa yang ni da ltar nyon// srog chags gsang bar mi bya zhing // bud med rin

256a1: chen yod mi sbeng / / des ni slob dpon spang mi bya// sdom pa shin du dpyad par dka'// gong du gsungs pa'i rig ma 'am// yang na bdag gi rnal 'byor ma// dag cing sprul pa'i rig ma ni// si h+lag bur bsgos pa/
256a2: ni// ji srid khu ba ldan gyur pa// de srid phyag rgya bsten par bya// phyag rgya'i gdong yang bcing ba dang // thabs kyi gdong yang de bzhin te// bsten pas yang dag gang byung ba// slob ma'i kha ru snang bar bya// ro mnyam
256a3: slob ma'i spyod yul nyid/ / de nyid la ni bya bar bshad// rang rig ye shes nyid du 'gyur// rang gzhan yang dag rig pa spangs// mkha' mnyam rdul bral stong pa nyid// dongos dang dngos min bdag nyid mchog/
256a4: thabs dang shes rab rnam par 'dres// 'dod cags 'dod chags bral bas 'dres// de nyid srog chags rnams kyi srog/ de nyid yi ge dam pa nyid// de nyid 'di ni kun khyab byed// de nyid sangs rgyas ye shes can// he ru ka dpal zhes
256a5: byar brjod/ / gzhan rnams gang rnams de rnams dang // dngos dang dngos med de las byung // dga' ba dang po dpa' bo ste// mchog tu dga' ba rnal 'byor ma// shin du bde dga' thams cad nges// de bde thabs las
256a6: thams cad rig/ dang po dga' ba tsam nyid de// mchog tu dga' ba gnyis pa'i grangs// gsum pa dag 'bral dga' bar bshad// bzhi pa lhan cig skyes par brjod// de yang dbang ni rnam pa bzhi/ dang po la ni bum pa'i
256a7: dbang / gnyis pa la ni gsang ba'i dbang // gsum pa shes rab ye shes te// bzhi pa de yang de bzhin no// byang chub sems kyi dbang gis ni// slob ma sdig pa bral ba yin// sangs rgyas grong khyer mchog sngon du//
256a8: de nas de la gnang ba sbyin// byang chub snying po'i bar du ni// phyogs kun du ni 'khor lo ni// chos kyi 'khor lo bla na med// kun du mchog tu rab tu bskor// thabs dang shes rab rang bzhin bdag/ yid bzhin

256b1: ro ba ltar mthong nas/ / snor med bral zhing ma zhum pas// sems can don na de ltar byas// dbang dang bkas gnang tha ba nas na// byab byas pas ra 'jamanapa// 'gro bdaga' bar byu pa ga// shan du ldan da
256b2: tshig 'di brjod/ / ding bdag skye ba 'bras bur bcas// bdag gi 'tsho ba 'bras bur bcas// de ringasas rgyas rigs kyis/ de ni ngas kya gsu 'gyur/ bskal pa rgya tshor 'jig // mnar med skye ba yang dag 'khrugs/ nyon
256b3: mongs 'dam ni ba rgal dka' las/ / bdag ni mgon po khyod kyis bsgral// khyod kyi zhabs kyi bka' drin las// theg pa rdzogs pa lta bur bdag/ bag chags thams cad bral bas na// bdag la byang chub 'tshal ma
256b4: mchis/ / rangs shing mig ni bye ba'i yis// zhabs la 'jus nas gus par bya// gang dang gang zhig sdug pa'i rdzas// re ba med pa'i sems kyis ni// de dang de nyid dbul bar bya// bla ma'ang snying rje ldan pas ni// sgo sa'i
256b5: zhen pa bzlog pa'i phyir/ / de la phan pa'i bsam pas bzung // de nas phyag 'tshal mchod nas ni// bla ma la ni son rnams dbul// gser ni steng phrag brgya dang ni// rin chen rnam pa sna tshogs dang // gos ni zung
256b6: 'gyur brgya nyid dang / / glang po rta dang yul 'khor nyid// rna cha dang ni rkang gdub dang // nor bu dang ni sor gdub sogs// gser las byas pa'i mchod phyir thogs// rang gi chung ma bu mo dang / bran po bran mo sring
256b7: mo nyid/ / phyag 'tshal nas ni dbul bar bya// bdag gi dngos po thams cad kyis// blo dang ldan pas bla ma dbul// di ring tshun chad bdag bran du// khyod la bdag ni 'bul lags zhes// de ltar zhu ba byas gyur
256b8: pas/ mngon par 'dod pa'i gnas thob nas// de ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyis// bdag la bka' drin legs par skyobs// ji ltar bla med byang chub de// byin gyis brlabs kyis bdag gis bsgrubs// bla na

257a1: med pa'i byang chub gnas/ / / kun mchog mchod pa bskyed par bgyi// sems can gnas gsum spyod pa rnams// de nyid la ni gzhag par bgyi// dbang cho ga 'dis sbyin par bya zhing slob ma'i lhan
257a2: par mos pa dang / / zab pa dang rgya che ba'i rig pas lhag par mos pa'i yid kyis shes par byas nas tshig nyid kyis dbang rin po che sbyin par bya'o// gang thob dbang rab mchog ni rigs kyi bdag por gzung ba rnyed
257a3: bar dka' zhing mtshungs pa med par gdams/ / longs spyod rdzogs pa'i zhing gi dpal dag blang bar byas pas byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i dbang bskur ba// bka' yig nang ba rnyed nas 'jig rten gsum gyi dgra bo
257a4: las rgyal rtsom pa'i go bgos pa yi blos/ / byang chub dag la dgod pa'i sangs rgyas 'dir ni de nyid rnal 'byor pas ni dri ma med par spyod// byang chub sems kyi dbang gnyis pa las rab tu byed pa dang po'o// // de nas
257a5: thabs dang shes rab don/ / bsgom pa yang dag rab bshad bya// pha dol don brtson brtson 'grus kyi// sgrub pa po la phan pa'i phyir// 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho'i 'jigs pa las// bsgral dka' gang zhig rnam bsgom pas nas
257a6: 'byor pas ni rang don du/ / mya ngan 'das par gnas mi 'gyur// gang gis khyad 'phags mthar thug par// sangs rgyas dri med ngo mtshar rmad// 'grib dang 'phel las rnam par grol// byang chub bla med thob pade
257a7: 'gyur/ / phung po lnga sogs chos rnams dang // theg gsum shin spang mi bya// chos dbyings shin du mnyam pa nyid// chu shing lta bur yongs su gzung // stong pa bsgom par mi bya ste// stong ma ni bsgom par mi bya'o//
257a8: stong pa mi spang rnal 'byor pas// stong min yongs su mi spang ngo // stong dang stong min gzung ba las// rtog pa nyung min skye bar 'gyur// yongs su spangs na kun rtog te// de phyir de gnyis yongs su spang //

257b1: gnyis kyis gzung ba yongs spangs pa// rnam grol gnas dang bral ba ste// nga zhes bya ba'i kun rtog 'di// de phyir de ni yang dag spang // rnam pa med cing dogs pa med// 'dod pa med cing sdig pa bral// thog ma/
257b2: tha ma'i rtog las grol// nam mkha' lta bur mkhas pas bsgom// snying rje ldan pas sems can la// rgyab kyis phyogs par mi bya zhing // sems can yod dang yod min zhes// de ltar yongs su brtag mi bya//
257b3: spros pa med pa'i rang bzhin nyid// shes rab ces ni rab tu grags// yid bzhin nor ltar ma lus pa'i// thams cad don byed snying rje nyid// dmigs med gnas su shes rab dang // dmigs med snying rje chen po nyid//
257b4: blo dang lhan cig gcig 'gyur ba// nam mkhar nam mkha' ji lta ba'o// gang la sgom pa po yang med// gang yang rnam par sgom papar med// bsgom bya nyid kyang yod min pa// da yi de nyid bsgom par brjod// gang yang bya ba
257b5: yod mni 'dir/ / bza' bya nyid kyang yod ma yin// byed po bza' las rnam par grol// don dam rnam par sgoms pas ni// 'di la sgrub po gang yang med// gang yang bstod par byed pa med// dor ba cung zad med par
257b6: brjod/ / blang ba cung zad yod ma yin// dri za'i grong khyer lta bu dang // sgyu ma smig rgyu 'dra ba dang / 'phrog pa zla ba'i grorang khyer mtshungs// rmi lam rtse ba lta bur blta// sgyu ma ji bzhin thams cad du// lta ba nyid dang reg par
257b7: bya/ / 'gro ba thams cad gnas pa ni// gang yang rnyed par mi 'gyur te// sbyar ba'i 'dus par bsam mi khyab// rmi lam sad pa lta bu ni// ji ltar gzhon nu'i gzugs kyis ni// dbang po gnyis ni 'dus pa yis//
257b8: b+ha ga ra ling ga bzhag nas ni// sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa sgom// ye shes ci zhig skye zhe na// thog ma dbus mtha' dri ma med// rang gis rig pa'i ye shes de// gzhan du smra bar mi nus so// gzugs rnam

258a1: thams cad blta ba dang / / sgra rnams nyid kyi dran pa dang // smra ba dang ni rgod pa dang // sna tshogs ro ni zab dang / las rnams thams cad byed pa na// gzhan du sems ni mi 'gro bas// de nyid rig pa'i rnal 'byor/
258a2: pa'i// rnal 'byor rtag tu skye bar 'gyur// 'di ni gnyis su med par brjod// 'di ni byang chub sems mchog nyid// rdo rje rdo rje sems dpa' dpal// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byang chub nyid// 'di ni shes rab pha rol gyi
258a3: pha rol phyin pa kun gyis dngos/ / mnyam nyid bsam bya nyid du gsungs// sangs rgyas kun mchog bsgom bya nyid// 'gro ba brtan dang g.yo ba'i bdag/ byang chub sems dpa' mtha' yas dang // rdzogs sangs rgyas dang nyan thos
258a4: stsogs/ / de nyid las ni thams cad skyes// dngos dang dngos med sbyor bral ba// rnal 'byor pas ni de nyid bsgom// dngos dang dngos med rnam grol ba// bsgoms na myur du 'grub par 'gyur// ma lus skyon la sdang ba dang // kun
258a5: nas nyon mongs rgyab phyogs nges/ / dpal ldan pade gshegs yon tan rnams// mtha' yas de las skye bar 'gyur// kun rtog mang po'i mun pas khyab gyur pa'i// rab tu 'joms pas smyo zhing glog 'gyur ba// chags sogs
258a6: dgag dka'i dri mas gos gyur pa'i/ / sems ni rdo rje can gyis 'khor bar gsungs// rang bzhin 'od gsal rtog las rnam par grol// 'dod chags la sogs dri mas gos bral ba'i// gzung ba dang ni 'dzin med sems dpa
258a7: mchog/ de nyid mya ngan 'das pa mchog tu gsungs// sdug bsngal phung po du ma'i mtshan gyur pa// 'di las gzhan du cung zad yod ma yin// bde ba mtha' yas 'byung ba'i rgyur gyur pa// de las gzhan du grol ba'ang yod
258a8: ma yin/ / sdug bsngal ma lus zad par 'dod pa dang // rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi bde mchog thob 'dod pas// sems ni brtan par byas nas 'bad pas dpyad// de yi rang bzhin dngos po med par byed// ji srid rtog pa'i

258b1: mun pa'i yul sdug po/ / skye dgu'i yid bsgribs sdug bsngal mtha' yas pa// ji srid de nas da ni bral yin te// de srid bde ba rgya chen tha dad min// mnyam pa nyid kyi mthar thug 'phags dgyes pa'i// de yi zad kyis
258b2: rang gi bya ba yang / / rgyas pa de yi yan lag 'gro ba blta// de ltar de kho na nyid kyi rnal 'byor pas rnal 'byor gyi nges pa byas nas bka'i gnang ba dang / rang gi dam tshig la gnas pas sgom par byed na lag pa'i phyag
258b3: rgya dang / sngags dang / sku gzugs kyi rgyal bsgom pa dang / dam tshig gi thun mong gi dngos grub sgrub par byed pa yin no zhes pas ci zhig bya// sangs rgyas nyid kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i mtshon pa mngon du rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor
258b4: yin te bskyed pa dang / de mtshon pa na gnas gsum po nam mkha' lta bur 'gyur ro// gzhung thams cad spangs nas thob pa'i gnas kyi bsam gtan gyi rnal 'byor de la brtson pas rang rig pa tsam
258b5: la spro bas nyin dang mtshan du goms par bya'o/ / ri'i rtse mo dang // zhi ba'i gnas dang / pad ma'i tshal dang // rgyal po'i chal dang / dben pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i gnas dang / rang gi khyim 'am// sems la mngon par
258b6: 'dod pa thams cad mkhyen pas bsngags pa 'di'i nang du gang dang gang gi gan pa deng gan shing sngags shes pa spro ba dang ldan pas sgom par byed de/ / thabs dang shes rab ma rtogs par sangs rgyas nyid mngon du thob par mi
258b7: 'gyur ro/ / de'i phyir shes rab ma dngos su yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub sbyin par byed pa bzang mo spang bar mi bya ste// phyag rgya re re dang ldan pa 'di ma rtogs par dngos sgrub ster bar mi 'gyur ro// de phyir ye shes
258b8: skyes pa ni/ / phyag rgya bzhi ni sbyar bar bya// gti mug dam tshig brgya ste// zhe sdang phyag rgya chen por brjod/ gdog las kyi phyag rgya ste// 'dod chags chos kyi phyag rgya bdag/ yo gis phyag rgya sna tshogs 'di// bskyed nas rig ma bza'

259a1: bar bya/ / de la gnyis ka yang lha'i gzugs su mngon du bsams nas gti mug las zhi ba dang / khro bo las ma rungs pa dang / 'dod chags las chags pas las rnams byed do// de'i don tu rab tu byed palnga
259a2: po 'di rnams kyis rgyal ba rnams yin no/ / snga dro dang nyi ma'i mtha' dang / nyi ma phyed dang / nam byed kyi dus su yang phyag rgya'i rnal 'byor bya'o// mnyam par sbyor ba las gzhan du ni 'grub par mi 'gyur ro// bstan pa la/
259a3: smod pa'i 'jigs pa dang / skye bo gdug pa'i nang du gnas pa'i rnal 'byor pas rang gi sems 'ba' zhig de bsams pas sems la lhag par mos pa mngon du bya'o// gang zhig yang rnal 'byor pa brtson 'grus kyi
259a4: 'bad pas rnal 'byor 'di bsgrub par bya'o/ / shes rab mngon du ma rnyed na byol song dag la'ang rtag tu goms par bya'o// de ltar gang zhig rnal 'byor pas gal te pad ma 'dzin pa la mngon du nyi ma re re 'am/ zla ba so so 'am
259a5: lo la reg par mi byed na dam tshig nyams par 'gyur ro/ / dam tshig nyams pas rnal 'byor pa bag med par skye bar 'gyur te// byang chub sems dpa'i dam tshig blang bar byas nas yang mi byed par sdom pa gzung ste/ de'i phyir kun
259a6: gyis sdom pa dang ldan zhing de kho na la gnas pas phyag rgya'i rnal 'byor bya'o/ / gsang ba'i nye ba'i rdzas dang sngags dang rgyud kyis 'di skad yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yang dag par sbyor ba'i rnal 'byor pa rtag tu nye bar 'dug
259a7: ste/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i gnas su gnas gsum po rtsa gcig pa'i tshul gyis bsgom par bya'o// thabs dang shes rab kyi don bsgom pa zhes bya ba gnyis pa las rab tu byed pa gnyis pa'o// // de nas 'khor lo
259a8: thams cad kyis/ / rnam par 'phrul pa yang dag bshad// dpal ldan rdo rje sems sogs lha'i thams cad las ni sna tshogs byed// gsang ba mchog gi dgyes pa na// thams cad bdag nyid 'di la bsgrub// rnam par bral dang

259b1: dam snang / / rang gi ma thogs rnams pa nga // kun las sngags phyag ste// kun las snga chags sngam pas na// kun lam sna gas bya ba rnams/ sa bad bar A yar bya// de gagag na
259b2: 'khor ni/ / stong pa nyid kyi ye shes nyid// khro ba'i sgrub thabs thams cad dang // zhi ba rnams kyi lha rnams la// ci zhigang yis bshad par bya// bsam gyi mo khyab sangs rgyas gar// bsgom pa lha yi rnal 'byor dag/ sngags kyis bcas
259b3: ba'i tshig rib dang / / bris su'ab ni sku gzugs dang // sems kyi thams cad sprul pa ste// sems can rnams la phan 'dod phyir/ nga yis rgyud du bsgrags pa yin// stong nyid gcig las rdo rje can// rigs ni rnam pa lnga rug su pra
259b4: rdo rje snying pos gsol pa/ / bskyed pa'i yig 'bru gzugs dang ni// phyag rgya dbyibs kyi mchog rim dang // sngags kyi bzlas pa'i cho ga yang // gang gis sgrub po 'grub 'gyur ba// gtso bo shin du dga' chen pos// bka' drin
259b5: gyis ni bskyab du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// dang por byams pa bsgob par bya// gnyis pa snying rje rnam par bsgom// gsum pa dga' ba bsgom pa dang // kun gyi mtha mar btang snyoms so// yang ni stong pa'i bying
259b6: chub semaso/ / gnyis pa la ni sa bon bsdu// gsum pa la ni gzugs brnyan rdzogs// bzhi pa la ni yig 'khrung go// re bas nyi ma sngon du rnam bsgoms nas// nyi der hUM byung sna tshogs rdo rje ste// rdo rje de nyid kyis ni rab dang
259b7: gur yang cho ga bzhin du bsgob par bya/ / dang por ron bsgom par bya/ chos kyi dbyings kyi bdag nyid brjod// de steng rnal 'byor pa gnas nas// he ru ka nyid rnam par bsgob// rang gi snying khar re pha bsgom// de las byung
259b8: ba'i nyi dkyil 'khor/ / der ni hA gi dbyibs nyid ni// thabs dang shes rab bdag nyid can// kha dog nag po 'jigs chen po// hUM las byung ba'i rdo rje nyid// rdo rje lte ba'i dbus gnas par// yang ni hUM gi de nyid bsgom// de

260a1: nyid yongs su gyur bltas nas/ / zhe sdang bdag nyid rnam par bsgos// rdo rje skye ba dpa' bo che// 'dab skyes sngon po 'dra ba'am// yang na sngo dang nyi ma ltar// dad pas nges par bsgom par bya// nam mkhar rje btsun
260a2: bltas nas ni/ / rdo rje skye ba snying rje che// rgyan rnams thams cad 'dzin pa yi// lha mo brgyad kyis mchod par bya// dkar po dgas mtshan pa 'dzin// chom rkun bdud las rgyal ba'i sdod// ro langs ma ni chu lag ma/
260a3: g+ha swa rI ni sman 'dzin cing // puk+ka sI ni rdo rje lag/ de bzhin ri khrod ma ro 'dzin// gdol pa mon cing te'u rdung // g.yung mo sku la 'khyud pa ste// mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas pa yis// 'di rnams kyis ni gtso bo mchod// de nas
260a4: gnas la rnam grol ba'i/ / chos rnams kun gyi bdag nyid 'gyur// A li zla ba kA li nyi// sa bon nang du son rig pa// de nyid sems dpa' zhes byar brjod// mchog tu dga' ba'i rang bzhin can// nam mkha'i dkyil
260a5: 'khor khyab pa yi/ / rang gi lus mtshungs rnam par spro// bsdus nas snying khar dgug pa na// yo gi zhe sdang bdag nyid 'gyur// nam mkha'i khams kyi nang son par// de nas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bsam// hUM skyes sdo dang /
260a6: nyi ma ltar// rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan// phyag gnyis pa la zhal gcig pa// spyan gsum sgra ni gyen du ser// sdang mig brgyad gnyis po 'di byi ba ga/ 'jigs byed mnana'i g.yon pa na/ rdo rje la T+wA~M gnyid dang // thod pa yang ni g.yon
260a7: pane/ / g.yas na rdo rjen ga po nyid/ tshunani 'don par byed pa'i bdag lho mo brgyad kyi bskod nas ni// dur khrod du ni mgon po rol// de ltar rnal 'byor pas ni bsgom// rnal 'byor bdud rtsi sngon po kun// de nyid bcom ldan rnal 'byor te// rdo rje sems dpa'
260a8: de bzhin gshegs/ / khro bo'i gzugs ni 'dzin gyur pa// phyag bzhi yis ni rnam par brgyan// bdud bzhi rnam par dag pa ni/ dga' ba bzhi yi rang bzhin no// sngar gsungs dkyil 'khor 'khor lor gnas// hUM gi sa bon las byung/

260b1: ba'i// g.yon na thod pa lha dang ni// lha min khrag gis bkang ba dang // g.yas na rdo rje me lta bus// 'jigs pa'ang ni 'jigs par mdzad// gzhan pa yi ni phyag dag gis// lus la yang dag 'byud pa nyid// shes rab rdo rje phag mo ni// bcom ldan
260b2: 'das kyis gzugs su bsgom/ / dang por stod pa bsgom bya zhing // gnyis pa la ni cha bral nyid// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// hUM ni der ni bsgom par bya// de bzhin zhal gsum phyag drug par// lha yi gzugs su bsgom
260b3: par bya/ / dang po'i zhal ni dkar min zhing // g.yas pa dkar zhing zhi ba nyid// g.yon pa dmar po lta bu ste// spyan gsum bzang po'i gzugs can nyid// rgyan rnams kun gyis yang dag gang // thod pa'i gdan la yang dag gnas// bshad/
260b4: gci khu ba khrag rnams kyis// thod pa phyag gis bzung ba dang // gzhu dang mda' ni 'dzin pa nyid// de bzhin rdo rje dril bu nyid// dang po rdo rje 'bar ba nyid// gsum par de bzhin rtse gsum pa// dpal ldan shes rab 'khyud pa dang /
260b5: ral pa'i cod pan brgyan pa ste// sprin gyi 'od 'bar du ma ni// sangs rgyas dam tshig spro bar bya// b+ha ga'i dbus su bsgrub pa pos// der ni bdag nyid bsgom par bya// lha mo lhan cig ldan par ni// de nas phyag rgya bsgom par bya//
260b6: thod pa'i stan la gnas par ni// 'dab mar lha mo bri bar bya// sna tshogs gzugs ma yid 'ong ma// zhal gcig ma la phyag bzhi ma// dang por rig ma bri bar bya// gzhu dang mda' ni 'dzin ma mdzes// thod pa khu bas gang ba dang // lcags
260b7: klu lag pas 'dzin pa mo/ / gnyis pa rtse gsum lag pa dang // khrag gis gang ba'i thod pa dang // rdo rje de bzhin zhags pa nyid// gsum pa lag par ral gri dang // thod pa chu yis gang ba dang // de bzhin rdo rje dril bu nyid// bzhi pa kha nA ga
260b8: lag ma/ g.yon pa'i lag pas thod pa nyid// mu sun di dang ba dan gsum// lnga pa zhags pa'i lag pa dang // thod pa lag pas bzung ba dang // de bzhin ud pa la cad te'u nyid// drug pa'i lag pas pad ma dang // thod pa tshil

261a1: gyis gang ba dang / / de bzhin me long dgra sta nyid// bdun pa 'phad mdud lag pa dang // dung dang 'khor lo'i mtshon cha 'dzin// thod pa khrag gis gang bar ni// khru gang tsam du yang dag bri// brgyad pa bum pa'i lag pa dang // de bzhin
261a2: rdo rje dril bu nyid/ / thod pa skyes pa'i lpags pa yis// bka' ba rdzas kyi gang ba ni// ze 'brur bde ba chen po dang // 'dab mar lha mo bri bar bya// rol mo rnam pa sna tshogs rnams// gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor bri bar bya// lha me rdo rje lcug
261a3: klu dang / / rdo rje zhags pa lcags sgrog dang // de bzhin rdo rje dril bu nyid// sgo yi skyong ba yang dag bri// b+ha ga'i dbus su bsgom bya zhing // phyis ni bzlas pa yang dag brtsam// hUM ni rdo rje sems dpa' yi// oM na dbyangs kyi dbye ba nyid// AHni rig
261a4: dang yang dag ldan/ / shel ni dag pa lta bu nyid// hrIHni de la yang dag sbyar// de bzhin du yang swA hA nyid// sngags kyis bzlas par yang dag gsungs// bsam gtan yi ge gcig po nyid// lha mo rnams kyi hrIHnyid ni// 'dab ma rnams la de nas
261a5: dged/ / mchod pa bzhi yi rang bzhin gyis// sa bon bzhi dang yang dag ldan// sgo yi sbyong ba thams cad du// dang po dbyangs yig la sogs ldan// b+ha ga nyid du sgrub pa pos// de nas rdo rje gzhug par bya// hrIHyi rnam pa nyid dang yang // de la
261a6: hU ni brjod par bya/ / zla mtshan dus su khrag bcas pa'i// khu ba kha yis bza' bar bya// bdag nyid dang ni b+ha ga la// me tog dri yis mchod par bya// gal te sgrub bo grub 'dod na// de nyid la ni bzlas par bya// rdo rje drag mo de bzhin/
261a7: gcig/ de bzhin rdo rje gzugs brnyan gnyis// gsum pa rdo rje 'dod chags ma// bzhi pa rdo rje zhi ba ma// lnga pa rdo rje gnod sbyin ma// drug pa rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma// bdun pa sgra yi rdo rje ma// de bzhin brgyad pa rdo rje ma// gnyis pa las
261a8: rab tu byed pa gsum pa'o/ / 'khor lo sgrub pa'i khyad par gyi// rim pa ji bzhin rdo rje nyon// zhi dang rgyas dang dbang dang ni// bsrung dang de bzhin mngon spyod nyid// re'u mig dgu sogs 'khor lo yi// phyi rol mu khyud nyid du bya/

261b1: 'khor lo las kyi kha dog sogs// mkhas pas rnam par bsgom par bya// oM tA re tuta tA re tu re swA hA// 'di yi sa bon thams cad kyis// phyag 'tshal bsreg blugs tha ma ni// dbus su ming ni sbyar bar bya// bsrung ba'i tshig kyang
261b2: rnam par bya/ / mnyam nyid ye shes stong pas ni// bdag gi lus ni bkru bar bya// mnyam nyid thams cad rig pa'i gnas// bsrung ba'i 'khor lo sbyor bya ba// bsrung ba ye shes can gyis bsgom// 'jigs pa thams cad ring du
261b3: byed/ / sems can dngos po med na ni// rnal 'byor dngos po bsgom par bya// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// pad ma'i gdan ni bsam par bya// dngos grub thams cad rab ster mar// bdag gi lus ni bsgom par bya//
261b4: oM tA re swA hA// mgo bo la'o// oM tu re swA hA// shing ga la'o// oM tA re swA hA// sA dag yo// o tu swA hA// rna ba dag dga'a'o// oM re swA hA/ lce la'o// oM tA re ni swA hA/ snying kha ra ro// yan lag drug ni rnam par gzung // 'phags ma sgrol ma bsam
261b5: par bya/ / phyag gnyis sems dpa'i dkyil dkrung bcas// rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan// kun la skyabs sbyin lag pa dang // g.yon pa ud pa la lta bu mchog/ sngags kyi rgyal pos bskul ba yis// lha rnams
261b6: thams cad bsgrub par bya/ / oM ku ru ku l+le bAhrI swA hA/ las thams cad pa'i sngags so// dgra dang rgyal pos bcings pa dang // 'gro ba'i shin du 'jigs pa'i dug/ yan lag rims ni sna tshogs dang // dus sogs dus min 'chi
261b7: ba yi/ / 'jigs pa'i gnas ni gang gang la// de dang de la rab sbyar bya// shes rab chud pa blo ldan par// bsrung ba bris nas gzung bar bya// bsrung ba bzang po 'di nyid ni// 'jigs pa thams cad du ni spangs// bsrung ba 'di ni
261b8: thams cad las/ / rnal 'byor de nyid gong na med// 'bar ba'i 'od zer lta bu yi// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bsam nas ni// de yi dbus su hri nyid ni// kha dog dmar po lta bu'i 'od// de nas bdag nyid bsgom par bya// zhal cig

262a1: mal phyag bzhi ma/ / mda' dang gzhu yi lag pa ma// ud pa la dang lcags kyu 'dzin// 'di ni bsgoms pa tsam gyis ni// 'jig rten gsum po dbang du byed// 'bum phrag gcig gis rgyal po rnams// khri yis 'jig
262a2: rten pal ba nyid/ / bye bas phrugs dang gnod sbyin sogs// 'bum phrag bdun gyis lha ma yin// 'bum phrag gnyis kyis lha rnams nyid// brgya phrag gcig gis sngags pa nyid// 'khor lo 'dab ma brgyad pa 'di// kha dog
262a3: dkar po shin du mdzes/ / mnyam nyid gzugs su bsams nas ni// khams gsum gyi ni rang bzhin gyis sngar gsungs mtshan nyid yang dag ldan/ gong du gsungs pas bsgrub par bya// shes rab 'bar ba'i las rnams ni// 'di
262a4: yi 'khor lo bsgom par bya/ / oM pradz+nye ma hA pra dz+nye hU~M swA hA// dngos po'i ngo bos bsgom par bya// 'od zer 'bar ba du ma yi// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// shes rab bdag nyid rnam par sprul// phyag gnyis sems
262a5: dpa'i dkyil mo dkrung / / rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan// kha dog dkar po 'od gsal ma// shes rab bdag nyid gzung bar bya// 'di yi sa bon bzlas nas ni// shes rab 'dab ma lta bur 'phel// gru ba 'am blo ni
262a6: dman pa yi/ / shes rab 'phel ba'i rnal 'byor ro// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// yi ge de la dgod par bya// thod pa'i gdan gyi dbus gnas par// zhal gcig pa la phyag bzhi pa// zhi ba'i 'khor lo dril bu 'dzin//
262a7: thod pa dang ni zhags pa nyid// de bzhin 'bar ba'i phreng 'khrugs par// kun du rnam par spro bar bya// 'dir ni rnal 'byor rim pas ni// rin chen 'byung gnas bsgom par bya// btsom gser gyi mdog lta bu// sku mdog
262a8: ser po gzi brjid che/ / thod pa gdan gyi dbus bzhugs par// zhal gcig pa la phyag bzhi pa// dpa' bo rin chen lcags kyu 'dzin// thod pa de bzhin zhags pa nyid// 'dir ni rnal 'byor rim pas ni// pad ma

262b1: rdo rje 'chang ba bsgom/ / zhal gcig pa la phyag bzhi pa// pad ma rA ga lta bu'i 'od// dpa' bo mda' dang gzhu 'dzin cing // thod pa'i gdan la yang dag bzhugs// pad ma zhags pa 'dzin pa nyid// rgyan rnams kun gyis
262b2: rnam par brgyan/ / 'dis ni rim pa'i rnal 'byor gyis// don yod phyag na ral gri 'dzin// thod pa'i gdan gyis dbus bzhugs par// zhal gcig pa la phyag bzhi pa// thod pa rdo rje dril bu dang // lugs kyu dang ni
262b3: g.yas pa 'phyar/ / bai dUr+ya ltar ljang khu ste// rgyan rnams kyis ni rnam par brgyan// nam mkha'i khams kyis dbus son par// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsam par bya// de yi nang son sa bon ni// bruM las spyan gyi dbyings
262b4: su ni/ / thod pa'i gdan gyis dbus gnas par// phyag ni brgyad kyis rnam par brgyan// 'khor lo'i lag pa mda' dang gzhu// de bzhin rdo rje dril bu nyid// zhags pa ral gri thod pa nyid// spyan gsum pa la zhal gcig
262b5: ma/ / rgyan rnams kun gyis yang dag gang // do shal dang ni rkang gdub brgyan// kha dog dkar mo shin tu mdzes// de bzhin thod pa'i dbu rgyun nyid// nam mkha'i khams kyi dbus son pa/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor long bags
262b6: de yi nang son bsam par bya/ / hUM las mA ma kI yi dbyibs// thod pa'i gdan gyi dbus gnas par// kha dog sngon mo 'bar chen mo// spyan gsum ma la zhal gcig ma// thod pa'i phreng bas rnam par brgyan// mda'
262b7: dang gzhu ni 'dzin pa nyid/ / lugs kyu dang ni ral gri nyid// zhags pa rdo rje de bzhin du// dril bu dang ni thod pa'o// 'khor lo rin chen pad ma dang // kha T+wAM ga nyid bcu gnyis ni// gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor bri bar bya// rgyan
262b8: rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan/ / b+ha ga'i dbus su yongs gang ba'i// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// der ni hrIHni bsam bya zhing // gos dkar zhes bya rnam par bsgo marko pa'i gdan gyi dbus gnas par//

263a1: 'dag pa ma'ab ca gtun rnams kun rgyas kAng ba // zug partad byas rnam pa bad+hAn/ gan pa 'an 'dzin pa dang // da pa lag pa sa me // nga ba rjem nga / na/
263a2: pa de bzhin rin chen nyid do shal dang ni rkang gdub sgra// rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan// rnal 'byor pas ni 'di bsgoms nas// myur du sangs rgyas thob par 'gyur// nam mkha' debus su yongs gang ba'o// zla ba'i
263a3: dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya/ / de yi nang song tA nyid ni// sgrol ma'i dbyibs su bsam par bya// bde ba'i gdan gyi dbus gnas par// phyag na brgyad kyis rnam par brgyan// ral gri phyag na chags bcas ma// ud pa lang
263a4: bzhin lugs kyu dang / / thod pa khrag gi gang ba dang // zhags pa de bzhin 'khor lo dang // gzhu dang mda' ni 'dzin pa nyid// zhal gcig ma ni yang dag bri/ kha dog ljang khu spyan gsum ma// rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan//
263a5: ltar rnal 'byor pas bsgoms pas// rdo rje sems dpa' mnyam par 'gyur// rgyud thams cad kyi gleng gzhi'i gsang ba dpal yang dag par sbyor ba las byung ba las brtag pa'i rgyal po gnyis pa'o// // he ru ka dang
263a6: bdag med ma'i/ / skyed pa'i sgrub dang de nyid nyon// gang gis gdug pa drag po yis// sems can 'bul bar 'gyur ba yi// mkhar 'gro mkha' 'gro mas mdzad pa'i// de dag thams cad khyod la bshad// rdo rje sems dpar gyur nas yang //
263a7: rdo rje can nyid rdo rjer ba ba// 'bar ba'i phreng 'khrugs drag po ni// kun du rnam par spro bar bya// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// sa bon breng ba de nas dgod// de nas rdo rje chags chen las// rig mar bcas pa khwa bar gyur/
263a8: sna tshogs gla yi mchod pa las// de nas rig ma bskul bar bya// rje btsun snying rje'i yid bzhengs shig/ puk+ka sA ni bdag la skyobs// stong pa'i rang bzhin nyid spongs la// bdag la bde chen sbyor bzhed mdod// khyod med na ni

263b1: bdag 'gus pas rgya brjen khyod ba'angs shig/ stong pa'i rang bzhin nyid spongs la// ri khrod ma 'bras grub par mdzod// dga' ga tse 'jig rten 'gron gnyer ba// stong pa nyid la bzhugs sas ci// khyod med phyogs ni ma
263b2: 'chal bas/ / gdol pa mo bdag zhu ba bgyid// bdag gis khyod kyis thugs 'tshal gyis// mig 'phrul mnga' ba khyod bzhengs shig/ g.yung mo bdag yid dran nyams pas// snying rje rgyun chad ma mdzad cig/ oM dang hUM
263b3: las de rje che/ / khu ba'i gzugs las bzhengs nas ni// zhabs rnams sal rdebs pa dang // lha dang lha man bsngags par mdzad// gca bag+h+na baM sha la Da/ 'ad yis bon dbyung bar bya// bdag po dga' ma'i sa bon lnga//
263b4: aM hUM sngon po 'bar gtsigs pas// ma me'i 'khor lo grong nyams dgar// gtso bo 'di ltar bsgom par bya// zhal brgyad pa la zhabs bzhi pa// phyag ni bcu drug dag gis brgyan// bdud bzhi mnyam par mnan pa nyid/
263b5: 'jigs pa'ang ni 'jigs pa po// sgeg cing dpa' bo ma sdug pa// rgod cing drag shul 'jigs su rung // snying rje rngam dang zhib yi// gar dgu'i ro dang ldan pa nyid// mgo la phreng bas do shal mdzad// nyi mar bzhugs shing rol
263b6: mor bcas/ / kha dog nag po 'jigs pa po// sna tshogs rdo rje spyi bor 'dzin// nyid kyi zhal nas hUM spro zhing // thal bas sku la byugs pa nyid// bdag med lhan cig mnyam sbyor zhing // dga' ba gnyis gnyis snyoms
263b7: 'jug pas/ / rba rlabs med pa'i rang bzhin can// rtsa ba'i zhal ni bzhad cing nag/ g.yas pa'i zhal ni kun dmatshungs// g.yon pa dmar zhing cher 'jigs pa// steng ma'i zhal ni rnam par gtsigs// spyan ni nyi shu rtsa bzhi
263b8: che/ / lhag ma'i zhal ni bud pa mtshungs// rdo rje ral gri 'dzin pa dang // mda' dang de bzhin 'khor lo nyid// de bzhin gshor dang dbyig pa dang // rtse gsum pa dang lcags kyu nyid// g.yon par dril bu pad mar bcas//

264a1: gzhu dang kha T+wAM ga 'phyar zhing / thod pa dang ni rin chen nyid// bsdigs 'dzub zhags pa de bzhin no// sangs rgyas sprin gyi 'od zer ldan// kun du rnam par stebar ba/ de ltar cho ga sna tshogs kyis// dkar mo loso//
264a2: de rnams dgog/ dkar mo kha dog dkar mo ste// gzhu dang mda' ni 'gengs pa mchog/ thod pa khrag gis bkang ba dang // de bzhin rdo rje gri gug nyid// chom rkun ma ni kha dog dmar// 'khor lo lcags kyu 'dzin par
264a3: brjod/ / thod pa dang ni cing te'u nyid// gsal ba'i gzugs can dgod par bya// rmongs byed ma ni sku mdog nag/ de bzhin thod pa dang shig shor// sa la rlog pa nyid dang ni// g.yas pa rtse gsum 'phyar ba'o// ro langs ma ni
264a4: dkar ser mtshungs/ / phyag dag nan chang dang chu// ral gri dang ni thod pa nyid// mdzes ma'i gzugs can bsgom par bya// puk+ka swa ni kha dog ser// dpag bsam shing gi lcug ma dang // sha yis gang ba'i thod pa dang //
264a5: rin chen dang ni mchog spyan nyid// gdol pa mo ni sdo mdog mchud// de bzhin rlung gi gos 'dzin ma// gzhan pa dag gis thod pa dang // de bzhin pad ma dkar po nyid// g.yung mo sde dang dkar ba'i mdog/ rdo rje dang ni
264a6: lcags kyu 'dzin/ / g.yon pas thod pa 'dzin pa ste// gzhan pas rlung gi gos 'dzin ma// g+hasma rI ni ljang ser mtshungs// rdo rje se thab dgra sta'i lag/ thod pa'i tshil bus yongs gang ba'i// g.yas pa mi 'jigs sbyin byed
264a7: ma/ / ri khrod ma ni dkar mdog mtshungs/ kha T+wAM ga dang thod pa'i lag/ rdo rje de bzhin zhags pa nyid// sna tshogs gzugs can bsgom par bya// ro hi ta dang phag nyid dang // rus sbal de bzhin lto 'phye nyid// seng ge
264a8: de bzhin stag nyid dang / / wa dang dge slong nyid rnams ni// de ltar dkar mo la sogs pa'i// thod pa brgyad du cho ga bzhin// rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan// sgeg pa la sogs ro dang ldan// rta yi

264b1: gzugs dang phag gi gdong / / khyi gdong de bzhin seng ge ma// zhal bzhi ma la phyag bzhi ma// sbrul gyi rgyan gyis rnam par brgyan// gling bu dang ni bi wa dang / mu kurkaDa dang rdza rnga ste// phyag gnyis ma la zhal gcig ma/
264b2: rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan// nag mo dkar ser lta bu dang // de bzhin steng du rta gdong ldang // ser mo nag mo dkar mtshungs dang // de bzhin steng du phag gdong dmar// dmar zhing nag dang dkar mtshangs
264b3: zhing / / de bzhin steng du khyi gdong ser// ljang dang nag dang dkar ba'i gdong// steng du 'bar ba'i seng ge gdong // thams cad skra ni steng du 'bar// g.yon brkyang ba yis ro mnan cing // spyan gsum khro zhing sgeg pa dang // rgas
264b4: pa'i bzhin ni bsgom par bya/ / he ru ka bskyed pa gsum pa las rab tu byed pa dang po'o// // ye shes mkha' 'gro'i sgrub pa ni// rdo rje gtso bo rgyal po nyon// gnyis med ye shes chos ldan pa'i// gnyis kyis dngos
264b5: po spangs pa yis/ / rnal 'byor kun sogs dang por ni// dag pa gsum ni gdon par bya// swa b+hA ba shud d+hoH/ sarba d+harmA swa b+hA ba shud d+ho ta/ badz+ra shud d+hoHsarba d+harmA badz+ra shud d+ho ha~M/ yog shud d+hoHsarba d+harmA yog
264b6: shud d+ho he/ / de ltar byas nas rnal 'byor pas// yang ni bsam gtan de nyid bya// yid dang rjes 'thun gnas rnams su// de nas bsam gtan brtsam par bya// bla re yang ni bri ba nyid// sna tshogs gos ni 'phyang ba dang /
264b7: 'phan dang rgyal mtshan bsgreng ba dang // phyogs bcu'i gnas ni thams cad du// dri zhim me tog sna tshogs dang // de bzhin dri yi dkyil 'khor du// skad cig gcig pa'i rnal 'byor gyis// bdag gis lus ni bsam
264b8: par bya/ / blo gros ldan pas sngar mchod nas// ye shes mkha' 'gro ma ni gzung // de ltar cho ga sna tshogs ni// nges par bsgom pa nyid du bya// ye shes rgya mtsho ri bo'i mgor// phyogs sogs kha dog bzhin

265a1: bsam/ / de bzhin gser gyi rgyan byung dang // rin chen bdun gyis rnam par spras// g.yer ka 'a bar ba'i phreng ba ni// 'dod pas kun du rgyas par ni// gnas ni lnga ru seng ge yi// gdan ni bsgom pa nyid du bya// nyi
265a2: ma'i dkyil 'khor bsams nas ni/ / gdugs ni dkar pos rnam par spras// bdag gis dbugs kyis phyung nas ni// dbus su ye shes mkha' 'gro ma// zhal gsum ma la phyag drug nyid// sems dpa'i dkyil mo dkrung gis
265a3: gnas/ / ma bcings sgra yis mdzes pa dang // sangs rgyas lnga yis rnam par brgyan// kha dog sngon mo 'jigs chen mo// sprul gyi rgyan gyis rnam par brgyan// rgod dang khrob sgeg pa dang // spyan gsum gsal ba'i gzugs can ma// sgra
265a4: cher rgod dang gtsigs pa mo/ / gos ni dmar pos shin du mdzes// steng du kha T+wAM gnyid dang // gnyis pa la ni dgra sta nyid// gsum pa la ni rdo rje nyid// g.yon na de bzhin dril bu'i sgra// gnyis pa la ni lhung bzed nyid// gsum pa
265a5: de bzhin ral gri 'dzin/ / 'od zer 'bar ba dum dang // dbus su mkhas pas bsgom par bya// ye shes mkha' 'gro'i mdun du ni// bdag gis dbugs kyis phyung nas ni// kha dog dkar mo shin du mdzes// ma bcings pa yi sgra
265a6: yis brgyan/ / sbrul gyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa dang // sgeg pa'i ro dang ldan pa dang // shin du mdzes pa'i gos kyis brgyan// phyag gnyis kyis ni rnam par smras// rnal 'byor lhung bzed kha T+wAM ga/ rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma bsgom bya//
265a7: shes byed gi cha la ni// bdag gis dbugs las phyung nas ni// phyag gnyis sems dpa'i dkyil mo dkrung // btso mo gser gyi mdog lta bu// rnal 'byor lhung bzed kha T+wAM ga/ ma bcings sgra yis rnam par brgyan// yan lag
265a8: sbrul gyis rgyan dang ni/ / shin tu mdzes pa'i gos kyis brgyan// 'jigs pa'i mkha' 'gro zhes bya bsgom// ye shes nub kyi cha la ni// yang ni ro langs ma phyung nas/ phyag gnyis sems dpa'i dkyil mo dkrung // kha dog sngonam

265b1: shin du mdzes/ / rnal 'byor lhung bzed kha T+wAM ga/ ma bcings pa yi sgra yis brgyan// lus la sbrul gyis brgyan pa dang // shin tu mdzes pa'i gos kyis brgyan// ye shes lho yi chal ni// gdol ba mon dmar mo ltar// rnal 'byor
265b2: lhung bzed kha T+wAM ba/ / ma bcings pa yi sgra yis brgyan// phyag gnyis mal zhal gcig ma// sna tshogs rgyan gyis rnam par brgyan// yongs gang gzugs dang gzi brjid ldan 'di ni rnal 'byor pa yis bsgom// dbang ldan
265b3: lA mo si ga ma/ / gdod ni seng ger bsam par bya// dkar dang ser blta bun ni// klu dbang stan la g.yas brkyang gnas// rdo rje lcags kyu bsdigs 'dzu ba zhags// shin du mdzes pa'i gos gyis brgyan// 'od zer 'bar ba du mas
265b4: ni/ / lus ni 'bar bar bsgom par bya// mer ni stag mo zhes bya ba// rin chen bdun po mchog gi gdan// phyag gnyis sngo dang dkar ba mtshungs// gos dang rgyan gyis brgyan pa dang // 'bar ba'i rdo rje lcags kyu dang // de bzhin brjin
265b5: 'dzub zhags pa nyid/ / 'od zer 'bar ba du mas ni// lus ni 'bar bar bsgom par bya// bden bral lha mo wag dong ma// sgra cher rgod dang 'jigs pa mo// ma he'i gdan dang yang dag ldan// dmar zhing nag pa'i kha dog ma// lus
265b6: la shin tu mdzes gos dang / / phyag gnyis kyis ni rnam par spras// lcags kyu zhags pa bsdigs 'dzub ma// sbrul gyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa'o// rlung du lha mo 'ug pa ma// ser dang dmar ba'i kha dog ma// klu yi gdan la gnas pa dang // de
265b7: nyid rgyan ni rab tu brtag/ phyag gnyis sems pa'i dkyil dkrung gnas// lcags kyu zhags pa bsdigs 'dzub ma// 'od zer 'bar ba du ma yis// thams cad kyi ni thams cad 'bar mkha' 'gro ma brgyad dbus su ste// phyi rol
265b8: du ni bzhi po rnams/ / de ltar dgod pa'i rim bltas nas// phyi nas gnas ni rab tu brtag/ shar du mkha' 'gro'i rgyal mo dbang // phyag gnyis dang ni mdog dkar mo// yi dgas gdan la gnas pa dang // sbrul gyi rgyan gyis brgya

266a1: pa dang / g+hA ni gril zhidi dgas dang // se ni 'bar ba'i 'ad la bu// khar ni lag pa bcug nas ni// sgra cher rgod dang de bzhin 'bar// byang du mar me rgyal sa dbang // kha dog gser mdog drag shul sa// 'jigs par
266a2: gzugs can gtsigs pa can/ / shin du mdzes pa'i gos kyis brgyan// rab tu song ba'i stan la gnas// 'bar ba'i me ni lta bu'i 'od// thal mo gnyis kyis lag pa ni// mgo ba'i steng du mar me bzhin// nub tu lha mo 'jig byed
266a3: kha dog dmar mo 'jigs pa mo/ / rab tu song ba'i stan la gnas// shin du mdzes pa'i gos kyis brgyan// khrag gi srad bu lag pa yi// snyim par khrag ni 'thung bar byed// me ni 'bar ba'i 'od drag mo// lha mo gtso mo 'jing
266a4: byed ma/ / lho ru g.yo ldan zhes byas// kha dog nag mo lta bu'i 'od// rab tu song ba'i stan la gnas// ma bcings pa yi skra yis brgyan// gos ni dmar po shin du mdzes// sbrul gyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa dang // bsdigs 'dzub dang ni
266a5: gtun shing lag/ thams cad sems ni rmongs par byed// 'bar ba'i me yi 'od drag mo// thams cad rig pas thams cad bsgom// 'di rnams gzugs sogs mdun du ni// dam tshig de bzhin bstan par bya// rlung dang me
266a6: yis bdun ga'i don/ / rdo rje'i sa bon gyis ni bskul// thig le sgras ni mnan pas ni// rgyun gyi char ni zhes byar gsungs// gsum pa las rab tu byed pa gnyis pa'o// // de nas bdag med sgrub pa ni// ci gsungs
266a7: mdo ru bsdus nas bshad/ / nam mkha'i khams kyi dbus son par// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bsam par bya// 'khor lo sngon du ci rigs par// lha rnams ji ltar 'byung ba nyid// 'khor los dang chu ni sngon// go rims bzhin
266a8: du byin za dang / / lha rnams kyi ni rlung chen dang // ji ltar sgom pa po 'byung ba'i// chos 'byung las skyes 'khor lo ni// 'phar ma gnyis dag skyon med pa// ze 'bru las ni gcig yin te// rdo rje can gyi sku gsum mchog

266b1: shA gdan dang ldanams/ / dan sa par gsas par bya// das snang duzab sa// zlab snang dus banacad// byinas bdud pas rgyal bsas nan// gnyis 'dus pa las bde chen po/ smras zlab ga gsu
266b2: kyis gnas/ / kA li'i gzugs kyis snang byed do// zla ba nyim gnyis 'dus pas// dkar mo la sogs rab tu grags// zla ba se long ye shes ldan// de bzhin mnyam nyid ye shes nyid// rang lha'i sa bon phyag mtshan ni/ sa
266b3: sor rtog par brjod par bya/ / thams cad gcig gyur nan tan nyid// gzugs brnyan rdzogs pa dag pa'o// mkhas pas cho ga gsungs pa ni// rnam pa lnga po bsgom par bya// A li kI li mnyam sbyor ba// rdo rje sems
266b4: dpa' nyid kyi gdan/ / yi gi las byung gong bu la// hUM phaT rnam pa 'dod mi bya// sems dpa'i gzugs brnyan las byung ba// dkyil 'khor bdag po bsgos par bya// phyag mtshan zhal sogs gong ma bzhin// zla ba chu shel nor
266b5: bu'i 'od/ / thabs dang shes rab rang bzhin las// de ltar thams cad rdzogs pa nyid// A li shes rab kA li thabs// zla ba nyi ma'i rab dbye bas// gang phyir dkar mo la sogs pa// kha dog dbye ba so so yin// de phyir kun du
266b6: rab 'bad pas/ / dkyil 'khor pa yang rab tu brtag/ rnal 'byor ma lnga 'di dag ni// nang gi 'phar ma yang dag gnas// phung po lnga yi rang bzhin gyis// rnal 'byor rig pas rtag tu bsgom// dbang por rdo rje gshin rjer
266b7: dkar/ / chu bdag chu yi rnal 'byor ma// lus ngag rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma// dbus su bdag med rnal 'byor ma// phyi rol 'phar mar dkar mo dang // chom rkun de bzhin ro langs ma// b+ha sma rI dang puk+ka sI// ri khrod ma dang
266b8: gdol pa mo/ / brgyad pa g.yung mos gang ba'o// 'og ldan ma dang steng ldan nyid// mkha' spyod sa spyod ma zhes brjod// srid dang zhi ba'i rang bzhin gyis// ngos su gyur ma yang dag gnas// lha mo thams cad sna tshogs

267a1: 'dog ga cen phyag rtsa lnga yis brdzun/ / zhal gcigs la phyag bzhis// spyan gsum gsal ba'i gzugs can ma// 'khor lo rnamam gul rgyan dang // lag pa ga du bus rags nyid// sangs rgyas ldan rnam dgaH/
267a2: 'di lnga phyag rgya dag par gsungs// ji ltar bdag med rnal 'byor ma// de ltar thams cad rnam par bshad// g.yon pas rnal 'byor lhung bzed dang // de bzhin steng du kha T+wAM ga/ g.yas na rdo rje sngon po dang // de bzhin du
267a3: yang gri gug nyid/ / rol zhon zhing gzi brjid 'bar// spyan dmar de bzhin steng skyes ser// kha dog sngon me ches gsal ma// stag gi lpags pas rnam dkris shing // 'jig pa'i me ni lba bur ni// gsal ba'i gzugs can
267a4: mde gnas/ / g.yas na dkar dang sngo ba ste// g.yon na mar gad sngo dang mtshungs// phyag gnyis mal zhal gcig ma// rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan// lag pa gcig na thod pas brel// g.yas na gri gug 'dzin
267a5: pa ma/ / rgod dang khro dang sgeg pa dang // de ni mchod pa'i gzugs gnas pas// sangs rgyas sprin dang mnyam pa yi// 'od zer sna tshogs kun du spro// de nyid gsum gyi rang bzhin bdag/ mkhas pas dbus su bsgom
267a6: par bya/ / gsum pa las rab tu byed pa gsum pa'o// // de nas dkyil 'khor chen po mchog/ yang dag rab tu bshad par bya// rdo rje dbyings dang mnyam pa'i dbyings// rdo rje dbyings zhes bya bar gsungs// dkyil
267a7: 'khor gnas ni sbyangs nas ni/ / phyag rgya chen por yongs su gzung // thams cad rnam par bltas nas ni// sngags pas 'di ni bsgrub par bya// sar pa legs par bkal ba dang // shin du tshang ma mdzes pas ni/
267a8: srang bus thig gdab shes rab can// ji ltar nus par dkyil 'khor nyid// grub zhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// rta babs rnams kyis shin tu mdzes// theg bzhi dang ni yang dag ldan// gos dang me tog phreng bas brgyan//

267b1: mtshams kyi cha rnams thams cad dang // sgo yi khyud kyi grwa rnams su// rdo rje rin chen rnams kyis smras// de'i 'khor lo so so'i skabs// nang du yang ni zhugs nas ni// rdo rje thig ni yongs bcug cing // phyi rol dkyil larje
267b2: thig gdab bya/ / ka ba brgyad kyis nye bar mdzes// rdo rje ka ba'i nang logs su// dkyil 'khor lnga yis rnam par brgyan// de nas dkyil 'khor nang du ni// sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan rnam par dgod// gsungs pa'i
267b3: dkyil 'khor chog yang / / sgrub pa'ang khyod la bshad par bya// de la dang por lha nyid kyi// khyim du sngags bzhugs nas ni// a las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ni// bsams nas de steng rdo rje ni// dkar po rtse mo lnga pa nyid//
267b4: tshogs bsam par byas nas ni// de bzhin gshegs pa kun sogs la// mchod nas phyag 'tshal 'di skad gsol// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' kun// bdag la dgongs pa mdzad du gsol// bdag ni che ge mo
267b5: zhes bgyi dris 'di nas ni bzung nas ni/ / ji srid byang chub snying po'i bar// ji ltar dus gsum mgon po rnams// byang chub tu ni nges mdzad pa'i// byang chub sems ni bla med mchog/ dam pa bdag gis bskyed par brtsi// dge
267b6: ba'i chos ni sdud pa dang / / sems can don byed tshul khrims dang // tshul khrims bslab pa rnam pa gsum// so sor bdag gis brtan par gzung // sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te// bla na med pa'i dkon mchog gsum//
267b7: sangs rgyas rnal 'byor las skyes pa'i// sdom pa ding nas brtan por gzung // rdo rje rigs mchog chen po la// rdo rje dril bu phyag rgya yang // de nyid las ni so sor gzung // slob dpon dag kyang gzung bar bgyi// rin chen
267b8: rigs kyi rnal 'byor gyi/ / dmatshig yid du 'ong ba la// nyi ma re re drug byas nas// sbyin pa rnam bzhi rab tu sbyin// byang chub chen po las byung ba// pad ma'i rig mchog dag pa la// byi dang gsang ba theg pa gsum// dam pa'i

268a1: chos kyang so sor gzung / / las kyi rigs mchog chen po la// sdom pa thams cad ldan par ni// thams cad so sor gzung bar bya// mchod pa'i las kyang ci nus bgyi// byang chub sems ni bla med pa// dam pa bdag gis
268a2: bskyed par bgyi/ / sems can kun gyis don gyi phyir// sdom pa ma lus gzung bar bgyi// sa bsgrol ba dag bsgral bar bgyi// ma grol ba dag grol bar bgyi// dbugs ma phyin pa dbugs dbyung zhing // sems can mya ngan 'das
268a3: la gzhag/ de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa thams cad kyi rtse mo las byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te tshig 'dis bka' stsal pa// de nas bsam gtan gnas 'dug nas// chos rnams
268a4: thams cad bdag med par/ / yang dag rjes su blta bar bya// phyi dang nang gi bdag nyid can// 'di dag thams cad sems kyis brtags// sems las ma gtogs pa nyid ni// gzhan du yod pa ma yin no// chos kun rang
268a5: bzhin 'od gsal ba/ / chos kun dang por ma skyes phyir// yid kyis a nu t+pan+d+ra brjod// de nas rang sems de nyid 'dis// rang bzhin gyis ni 'od gsal ba// 'dod pa'i sngags kyis bzlas pas ni// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor
268a6: rnam par blta/ / oM tsit+ta u0f7fti be d+hi ka ro mi// tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor che dag pa// nam mkha' lta bur dri ma med// yid gnyis kun las rnam par grol// mchog tu rnam par rtog pa 'joms// nyon mongs dri ma thams cad
268a7: ngag/ dang po zla ba ltar bltas nas// sangs rgyas kun gyi yon tan 'dir// a yi gzugs kyis 'jug par 'gyur// a A i I u U ri rI li lI e e o oM aM aHbcom ldan zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi//
268a8: yon tan khyad par ji ltar lags// bcon ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// gru gsum rgya chen rang bzhin can// sangs rgyas kun gyi yon tan gnas// 'di ni a sogs gzugs kyis ni// sangs rgyas yon tan

268b1: 'jug par 'gyur/ / shel dang zlab la bur ri// de yi sted du 'jug par 'gyur// sems ni rang bzhin 'di gsal bas// de nyid dga' bar byed pa'i rgyu// sngags pas 'di yi sngags kyis ni// byang chub sems ni
268b2: skyed par byed/ / oM bo d+hi tsid+ha ud pa tu ya mI// byas pa'i rjes su rim 'byung ba// sems can rjes su 'dzin pa po// dge ba'i chos kyis yang dag gang // nyon mongs thams cad nges par gnon// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor
268b3: dbus su ni/ / byang chub zla ba gnyis pa can// 'dir yang skar ma'i rnam pas ni// sangs rgyas yon tan ka sogs kyi gzugs kyis gzugs brnyan lta bu'i// rnal 'byor gyis ni 'jug par 'gyur// ka la ga g+ha /
268b4: radz+dzaH/ rarba DAD+ha Na/ ta prad d+ha na/ pa pha ba b+ha ma// yar la wa/ sha Shas hak+ta/ 'di yi dkyil 'khor chog kun// rgyud ni gzhan du ma gsungs so// de la dbus su rtsa lnga pa// 'od zer dkar po bcas pa nyid// kun du bzang
268b5: po'i sems bskyed pa/ / brtan par byed pa'i rgyu'i phyir// bdag nyid rdo rje'i gzugs brnyan du// 'di yi sngags kyis bsgom par bya// e tiSh+Tha badz+ra// byang chub spyod pa bla na med// de yis ni rtogs pa 'di// ye shes dag pa
268b6: zag pa med/ / zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni// rdo rje ngas par brtag par bya// nam mkha'i khams ni thams cad kyi// tshad du yang dag gang ba yi// rdo rje'i lus kyi bdag nyid// sngags pas bsgom par bya ba'o// 'di na sngags
268b7: kyi rnal 'byor gyis/ / spro ba dang ni bsdu bar bya// oM badz+ra At+ma ko ha// sangs rgyas kun gyi sku gang ni// snang ba med cing gnas pa med// ma skyes ma byas dag pa nyid// dngos po med pa la sogs spangs// gcad med dbyer med
268b8: gzung du med/ / chos kyi sku ni gzugs med pa// rdo rje bdag med yang dag gyur// rdo rje'i sku ni gong na med// de ltar yang de rdo rjes mtshan po bsgom par bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad nyon cig

269a1: yang ni rdo rje sems dpa' ni/ / rnam pa kun gyi mchog ldan pa/ sa sa rgyas rnams kyi gzugs brnyan ni// 'di yi sngags kyis bsgom par bya// oM ma thA sarba ta thAg ta swAdz+dzahaM// su dang gsang ba de bzhin spyod/ spyod
269a2: yul de nyid rtogs pa ni/ / mngon par byang chub rnam pa lnga// sangs rgyas kun gyis bdag nyid gi// de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje snying po la sogs pas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad
269a3: gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das gsang ba'i rdo rje dang // pad ma'i rigs kyi ming ci lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ga/ rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa kun la gnas// pad ma'i rigs ni lha mo chen mo ldan// de yi rdo rje pad ma'i
269a4: steng du gnas/ / de las de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad don// de nas bdag nyid rnam par snang mdzad du bskyed nas steng dang 'og du sngags kyi yi ge bkod de// cho ga bzhin du ri rab dang // gru gsum rgya chen po bskyed par bya ste// 'od
269a5: zer sna tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor gyis brgyan pa las yang dag par byung ba'i mdzes pa'i gnas bsgoms nas/ / der paM las byung ba'i sna tshogs pad mar nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ro// rlung dang mo'i dkyil 'khor dang ldan pa yang la
269a6: was brgyan pa'o/ / de nas de'i steng du sngags kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsol ba btab cing bstod pa rab tu bsngags pa nor bu rin po che chen pos 'od gsal ba dang // kha dog sna tshogs shing dril bu dbyangs
269a7: ba dang / / rlung gis bskyod pa'i gos dang // 'phan dang / me tog gi phreng ba dang // do shal dang / do shal phyed pa dang zla bas nye bar mdzes par rdo rje nor bu'i rtse mor gzhal med khang bsam par bya'o// hUM gi sngags 'dis rang gi snying
269a8: khar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor du sngags 'di bkod de gyur pa las rdo rje rtse lnga pa bsgom par bya'o/ / yang sangs rgyas thams cad spro ba dang // bsdu bar bya zhing rdo rje de nyid yang yongs su gyur pa las rdo rje sems dpa' rnam pa/

269b1: kun gyi mchog dang ldan pa zla ba'i kha dog 'od lta bu ste// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng na bzhugs shing rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa// dpa' bo shes rab dang dga' ba gcig pus mdzes pas rdo rje dang / dril bu dang / ral gri
269b2: dang / / lcags kyu nyid dang / thod pa dang / zhags pa 'dzin pa nyid do// g.yas pa ni kha dog nag po'o// g.yon pa ni pad mar ga'i 'ong ngo // zhal gsum pa dang // phyag drug pa nyid dang // sbyar gsum pa dang / bzang po'i gzugs
269b3: can te/ / rang gi rig ma'i pad ma la bzhugs pa// dgyes pa'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya'o// rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan par dkyil 'khor ba'ang rab tu brtag par bya'o// shar du ni rnam par snang mdzad do//
269b4: lho ni rin chen 'byung gnas so// nub tu ni 'od dpag tu med pa'o// byang du ni gdon mithib grub pa'o// dbang ldan du ni spyan no// mer ni mA ma kI// bden 'bral du ni gos dkar mo'o// rlung du ni sgrol mo'o// phyi rol gyi 'phar mal
269b5: drag shul ma ni kha dog dkar me'o/ / lho ru ni rdo rje gzugs brnyan ma ni kha dog ser mo'o// nub tu ni 'dod chags rdo rje mkha dog dmar mo'o// byang du ni rdo rje zhib mo kha dog ljang khu ma'o// dbang ldan du ni rdo rje gnod sbyin mo kha
269b6: dog dkar ser lta bu'o/ / me ru ni rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma dmar ser lta bu'o// bden bral du sgra'i rdo rje ma ni sngon dmar lta bu'o// rlung dang sa'i rdo rje ma ni kha dog ldang sgyu ma lta bu'o// phyi rol gyi 'phar ma la dbang ldan du ni gling bu
269b7: ma'o/ / me ru ni pi bi ma'o// bden bral du ni mu kun dma'o// rlung du ni rdza rnga ma'o// gling bum la sogs pa ni phyag gnyis mal zhal gcig ma'o// phyi rol gyi snam bul me tog ma la sogs pa'i mtshan ma 'dzin pa
269b8: rnal 'byor ma gzhag par bya ste/ / de bzhin du phyag gnyis ma'o// shar gyi skal lham rdo rje lugs kyu mnam mkha' sngobasangs ma'i mdog bri bar bya ste/ zhal g.yas pa dang // gzhan pa ni gnag po dang / dkar

270a1: be'o/ / phyag g.yas pa'i dang po ni lcags kyu'o// gnyis pa la ni ral gri 'phyar ba'o// gsum pa la ni 'khor lo'o// g.yon pa na ni zhags pa dang / kha sdigs 'jub dang // dril bu 'dzin pa ste phyag drug pa bri bar bya'o//
270a2: lho'i sgor lha mo rdo rje zhags pa mkha dog dkar ser te// zhal g.yas pa dang // gzhan pa ni gnag pa dang dbang ba'o// g.yas pa na ni zhags pa dang // rdo rje dang / ral gri 'phyar ba'o// 'khor lo dang / dril bu dang / bsdigs
270a3: 'jub zhags pa can te phyag drug go/ / nub kyi sgo la ni rdo rje lugs sgrog ma ste/ de bzhin du yang kha dog dmar zhing gzi brjid che ba ste// zhal g.yas pa dang gzhan pa ni gnag pa dang dkar ba'o// phyag dug na lugs
270a4: sgrog dang / / rdo rje dang / ral gri dang // 'khor lo dang / dril bu dang / lcags kyu'o// byang gi sgo la ni rdo rje dril bu ma 'jigs par byed pa ste// zhal gsum ni ljang khu dang // nag mo dang / dkar me'o// phyag drug na ni dril bu dang / rdo rje
270a5: dang / lugs kyu dang / 'khor lo dang / ral gri dang / zhags pa'o// thams cad kyang sra steng du 'bar ba ste// sna tshogs pad ma nyim dkyil 'khong du gzhag par bya'o// me'i phyogs nas brtsams te me tog la sogs pa'i
270a6: mtshan ma 'dzin pa'i rnal 'byor ma de gzhag par bya ste phyag gnyis mar gsungs so/ / gang la sogs pa'i sgo rnams su ni rnal 'byor pa lugs kyu ma dang / zhags pa ma dang / lpags ldog pa dang / dril bu ma'i lags
270a7: 'ad pa / pa / byu mas ga ga nga gyu
270a8: dpal rnga rje sems pa'i phyi'i dkyil 'khor ro/ / gang ma lwa bu de'i byed kyis de'i nang du zla ba byed pa'i dbyibs lta bu'i rlung gi dkyil 'khor dang 'dra bka ba brgyad kyis nye bar mangs pa dang / phyi ril du ri mi ba nis

270b1: yongs su bskor ba'o/ / lha mo thams cad kyi gnas su ji skad gsungs pa'i gdan rnams ni dkar mo la sogs pa rab tu brtag par bya'o// de la dbus su hi'i yi ge rnam par bsgom par bya'o// de'i shar gyi re'u mig la
270b2: nitri'o/ / lho ru ni ho'o// rab tu ri ki'o// byang du ni rdeg// man ci / bden bral du ni dza // rlung du ni mdo// dbang ldan du haM // dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol tu dgod pa ni me'i mtshams su ni aM ngo // bden bral du ni u'o// rlung du
270b3: ni e'o/ / dbang ldan du ni ai dgod par bya'o// shar gyi sgo la dzaH'o// lho ru ni hU~M // nub tu ni pi // byang du ni hoHdgod par bya'o// phyi rol du dur khrod brgyad kyis yongs su bskor ba'i dkyil 'khor bsams
270b4: te/ / der dbang ldan la sogs pa'i 'byung po chen po brgyad po 'jigs par byed par dgod par bya'o// sha ra du ha ri pA sa la// lha yi tshe gra ni yang dag bri// lho ru tsu ta'i shing la ni// gshin rje'i gtso bo'i
270b5: dbang phyug bri/ / nub tu a shog gnas su// sprin gyi rgyal po der ni dgod// de bzhin byang du byang chub shing // gnod sbyin sde dpon mnyam par gzhag/ de bzhin mer ni ka ran dza ra// drang srong tshogs
270b6: kyis yang dag khyab/ / bden bral la ta dza ta ra ni// srin po la sogs de nas dgod// rlung du bArI pa la ni// rlung gi bdag po yang dag bri// dbang ldan pa Ta s+phu lA ni// yi dgas tshegs ni yang dag ni/ drag cam dang pa
270b7: dbang bcas/ / zla bcas nyi ma gshin rje'i cha// rgyas btab rmongs byas zos byas shing // thal ba'i dngos tsam 'tshe bar byed// thabs dang shes rab rnal 'byor gyis// g.yon par kha T+wAM brten nas su// dril bu
270b8: sil sil sgra sgrogs shing / / khrag gis bkang ba'i thod pa bsnams// g.yas su rdo rje 'bar ba ste// 'jigs pa yang ni 'jigs par mdzad// dkyil dkrung byed pa byas nas ni// nyid kyi brla stengs

271a1: g.yon pa mnan/ / tshangs pa las sogs mnan pa de// grags pa nye bar mi za ste// kun du 'od zer sna tshogs kyi// sangs rgyas sprin dang mnyam pa 'dis// slo ba yang ni sbyin par bya// de ltar rnal 'byor pas
271a2: bsgoms na/ / dngos grub myur du thob par 'gyur// dpal yang dag par sbyor ba las byung ba ste brtag pa'i rgyal po gsum pa'o// bcom ldan rnal 'byor rnal 'byor mi'i// ngag gi phyag rgya'i mtshan nyid ci// gsang ba nyan
271a3: bar 'tshal lags na/ / thub pa chen pos bshad du gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das mkha' 'gro ma rnam par rgyal ba'i stobs shes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas mkha' 'gro ma'i dam tshig gis
271a4: phyag rgya bka' stsal ba/ / kol+la i rin+thi a bo lpa// mu mU Ni re kak+ko la/ g+ha Na kri biT+TA ho bAdz+dza i// kA ru NaM ke a i Na ro lA/ ta hI b+ha la khA dz+dza i/ g+he D+ho ma a NA bidz+dza a i/ ha le ka li dzi ra pa ni a I/ du d+hAr
271a5: badz+dza a i/ tsa u sa ma kas+thu ri si p+sa// kap+sa ru lA i a i/ ma la in+ti NaM sha li dzi/ ta hA b+hi ru khA dza i a i/ pre kha Na kheT+Ta ka ren+te/ shud+d+ha a shud+d+ha na mu Ni a i/ ni ra shu ad ga na Da a/ ta hi dza sa raM
271a6: bi bI Ni a i/ ma la a dze kun du ru brta i/ Di Di ma ta ha~MHbadz+ri a i/ mu khi g+ho g+hu gu g+h+na/ mu b+hu lu b+hU/ dzaSh+Tha/ 'di rnams bltas nas rnal 'byor bdum tshan ma gsungs pa zhes bya ba la slobar bya'o// Sh+T+rik+Shas/
271a7: mA/ yo b+hi/ d+hi/ lu/ s+t+rI/ sa/ ger+the// g+hab+ha/ gi b+hU/ Di // ku/ y+YA dz+dza/ ke u0f7f/ sA/ pu/ dzA/ au/ A/ gauR+Sha/ des/ !/ o tI/ koka/ la/ kA/ hi pre/ gri so+o/ su/ na/ si/ ma/ ku/ de nas dag gi ts+tsho ma yi
271a8: cho ga'i rim pa bshad par bya/ / gang gis spun dang srong mor yang // the tshom med par shes bya ba// bo taM gi dang / pra ti pe ta gi dang / ga mu dang / lu ma ba dang / ni gar dang / tsa ru ka dang / hrid ya dang / kor ba dang /

271b1: ASh+Ta dang / ma bka dang / bar ba dang / thag da mnan dang / nar dang / rdul ga da na dag dang / marba ga dang / gathas dang / sras dang / ba na dang / bar te dang / kun dang / an dang / yal ka dang /
271b2: b+hag ni dang / mu taka dang / gri rtan dang / mu drA dang / ran ta swarga dzi hA dang / gan+d+ha ba hi Ni dang / a ka ma na dang / kun ta dang / kir no dang / go ma dang / nA dwa dang / lam po dar dang / dan+ta dang / nir d+ha dang / bidz+rI b+ha dang / d+hu t+ya dang /
271b3: d+humra bri ya dang / sA nu dang / sa ri ti dang / a gu lA dang / ba da nAM dang / rA dzi kA dang / a da nA dang / baM ka ti dang / tshu na do ha dang / tsa la dang / mri ka ba ti dang / maN Da la dang / sAm+ba dang / phal gu Sha dang / ma hAk+Sha ra dang / tshwan ga dang /
271b4: mad sted da/ ma bya k+ka dang / spa dang / dan s+phaR+Ya na dang / mu kha s+phaR+sha ni dang / ho dang / tri ka dang / shu n+ya s+phaR+sha ne dang / u ru spaR+shan dang / steng dang / 'og tu yod pa ni phyag rgya dang phyag rgya'i lam du gsungs so// yi ge dang ngag
271b5: gi ts+tsho ma ste bzhi pa las rab tu byed pa dang po'o/ / // rdo rje snying po snying rje che// yid ni gcig tu gyur pas nyon// gzugs can ma dang 'o byed ma// lA mA yongs gyur byis bcas mo// mi ldog mo dang 'dod ba mo// 'di dag
271b6: mkha' 'gro 'dun du gsungs/ / mngon par zhen pas blta ba dang // smin ma yon por gang byed cing // sngon gyi gzugs ni sdung ba dang // phyis ni 'jigs par byed pa yang // de ni gzugs can mar shes bya// dpa' bo ma ga
271b7: med bstan pa'o/ / sdug pa 'am gal te mi sdug pa'i// byis blta zhing 'o byed na// de ni 'o byed mar zhes bya// mkha' 'gro mchog kyang de nyid yin// byol song lta stangs khro gnyer gdod// 'di ni smin skur bsdigs par byed//
271b8: gzhan du dbugs kyi 'jigs byed ma// de ni lA mAr rnam par bstan/ pag dang lce spyang byil dang / rta rnams thams cad 'jigs byed pa// de ni yongs gyur ma ru gsungs// rab tu dga' zhing gsal bar dgod/

272a1: bar gyur shes pa ldog ma// de dbyes bcas mo du gsungs// gang zhig skyobs lag pa'am// bod pa'am ni nang pas sam// gos mtha'a' ma yang na shing gse ni// des reg pa ni 'tsho ma'i 'gyur// den mo ldog
272a2: mar shes bya/ / rgod dang sma dang dub dang / glo bur du ni khro 'gyur ba// de ni 'dod pa mar shes bya// mkha' 'gro rnal 'byor ma mor gsungs// thod pa dgra sta mche ba dang // chu srin rgyal mtshan ral gri dang // 'phang mdung du
272a3: ni bdun du gsungs/ / yang dag sbyor ba'i cho ga 'di// rnal 'byor rig pas rtag tu mchod// lus srul mo'i mtshan ma dang phyag rgya ste/ bzhi pa las rab tu byed pa gnyis pa'o// // de nas lA mA'i mtshan nyid ni// yang dag
272a4: rab tu bshad par bya/ / dmar zhing dkar ba'i bud med gang // pad ma'i mdab ma lta bu'i 'od// dkar po'i gos la rtag dga' zhing // tsan dan ser po'i dri dang ldan// bde gshegs 'dus pa nyid la dga'// chags shing
272a5: mthong na rjes 'gro ma/ / khyim du pad ma 'dri byed pa// pad ma gar dbang rigs las byung // smin ma'i dbus su rtse gsum son// lus ni sngo bsangs skyab dang // u dpal sngon po'i dri dang mtshungs// khyim du rdo rje bris
272a6: nas ni/ / rtag tu mchod pa byed pa ni// he ru ka dpal rigs byung ba// de ni mkha' 'gro mar shes bya// mig dmar dkar dang dmar ba dang // de bzhin rkang pa lag pa dmar// ra skyes khyim bya dag gis kyang // rtag tu dga'
272a7: bar gyur pa dang / / de yi khyim du rdo rje ni// bris nas rtag tu mchod byed pa// he ru ka dpal rigs byung // mkha' 'gror 'di la the tshom med// 'khor lo gang gi dpral ba 'am// lag par yang ni mthong gyur pa'i// ser zhing sde
272a8: bsangs bud med gapa/ / rtag tu gos ser dga' ba nyid// me tog dkar po'i dri chen dang // skal bzang phun sum tshogs mede// khyim du 'khor lo 'bri bar byed// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs rjes 'gro// nag kyi

272b1: gas su da gapa pa ni dgang nang mtho ba da/ gtugadus par yan pa na/ d+hA sa pa na/ rgyug tu mas la dga' ba dang / sud ci mang du smra ba dang // de rje khyim du byes pa // ya
272b2: byed pa na/ rdo rje phag mo'i rigs las byung // dka zhi gser dang mtshungs pa dang // 'bar ba'i mig dang bsdug // rdo rje gang ga bral ba'am// lag par yang ni mthong gyur pa// rtag tu rgyal srid dga' ba da// snyems shing
272b3: bden par smra ba dang / / ma li ka yi dri dang ldan// khyim du rdo rje bris nas ni// rtag tu mchod pa byed pa ni// dum skyes ma yi rigs las byung // rdul 'byor dbang phyug chen mo mchog/ shal dga' ba'i bud med gang // mig sman nag po
272b4: lta bu'i 'od/ / dpral bar mdung rtse'i rnam pa nyid// drag shul las la dga' ba gang // rtag tu dur khrod 'gro gang dang // 'jigs med sku khro med pa dang // gang gi dpral bar bsdus nas ni// khyim du thod pa 'dri byed cing // rtag
272b5: tu mchod pa byed pa ni/ / he ru ka yi rigs las byung // char sprin mdog 'dra'i bud med gang // so ni mnyam par gnas shing // rtag tu drag shul las rnams dang // g.yon pa'i mche ba byung ba ni// khyim du dgra sta 'dri byed cing
272b6: rtag tu mchod pa byed pa ni/ / rnam par 'dren pa'i rigs byung ba// de ni mkha' 'gror the tshom med// gang gi sgra ni le ba dang // bzhin ni yongs su zlum pa dang // rtag tu kha la smar dang // smin ma ring zhing bsdu dang // gos dka'
272b7: gtsang zhing zhi ba dang / / mib skyod bden par smra ba dang // rtag tu dam pa'i chos dga' ba/ dpa' bo'i sring mor de shes bya// pad ma'i phyag rgya sbyin par bya// yang na rus sbal phyag rgya bya// ril ba skyi blugs mchod byed pa// phyaH/
272b8: rgya'i lan du brjod par bya// de ni tshes bcu'i ris dag la// khyim du pad ma 'dri bar byed// ma mchu 'phyang zhing mig yangs ma// migo ni dmar zhing ser ba dang // che zhing skal/ bzang nor dang ldan// ser ni rtse

273a1: blta bu nyid/ / ring zhing lag pa ring ba dang // sna tshogs gos la dga' ba dang // ri mo gsum ni dpral ba 'am// steng gi mtshams su nges par gnas// rgod pa dang ni dga' ba nyid// lam gyi rnam pa gnon cing gnas//
273a2: g.yul du shi ba rnams kyi ni// gtam la rtag tu dga' ba nyid// de 'dra'i rab myos mthong nas ni// mdung rtse'i phyag rgyang ba bstan bya// rkang pa g.yon pa bskums pa yi// gar nyid kyang ni rab bstan bya// g.yon gyi yongs su bskor ba ni
273a3: phyag rgya'i lan du brjod par bya/ / bcu bzhi pa dang brgyad pa la// khyim du mdung rtse bris shing mchod// 'jig rten dbang phyug mtshan nyid yin// dmar zhing dkar ba'i bud med gang // mig ni ldang zhing ser ba dang // de bzhin sgra
273a4: ni 'khyil ba dang / / dar dbyangs bcings par snang ba nyid// ri mo gcig par rab tu gnas// de bzhin steng du ring ba dang // rtag tu gos dmar la dga' zhing // rtag tu rgod cing glu len dang // glo bur du ni khro ba dang // khyad par
273a5: du ni sems g.yo dang / / rtsod pa rtag tu dga' ba nyid// de 'dri'i rab myos mthong nas ni// 'phang mdung phyag rgya rab bstan bya// gnyis pa yis kyang 'bad ba yis// dril bu'i phyag rgya rab tu spyan// g.yon gyis yongasu
273a6: bskor ba ni/ / phyag rgya'i lan du brjod par bya// thung zhing byin pa sbom pa dang // rtag tu gos ser dga' ba dang / mgrin pa nas ni gos 'byung ba// de 'dri'i rab myos mthong nas ni// 'khor lo'i phyag rgya rab bstan bya//
273a7: gnyis pa'ang rab tu 'bad pas ni// dung gi phyag rgya sbyin par bya// de bzhin yongs su bskor ba nyid// de yi dus ni bcu bzhi la// khyim du rdo rje 'dri bar byed// yan lag kun la ba spur bcas// mig ni nag cing ser ba dang //
273a8: gtsigs shing rnam 'gyur 'jigs pa dang // bzhin sbom kha ni sbom pa dang // ma mchu 'phyang zhing khung mig dang // snan nyams par gyur pa dang // rtag tu dri za 'dod pa dang // sprin gyi kha dog lto che ba// de 'dri'i rab

273b1: myomos mthong nas ni/ / klu yi phyag rgya rab sbyin bya// gnyis pa yang ni 'bad pa yis// 'bang mdung phyag rgya sbyin par bya// yongs su bskor ba gong ma bzhin// de ni bcu gcig chos la ni// mche ba 'dri zhing rtag tu mchod//
273b2: mtshan ma'i phyag rgya ste bzhi pa las rab tu byed pa gsum pa'o// / de nas yan lag phyag tugi// mtshan nyid yang dag rab bshad bya// bud med gang zhig spyi gtsug reg/ spyi bo de la rab bstan bya// gang zhig dpral ba ston
273b3: pa la/ / mkhur tshos de la rab bstan bya// gang zhig so ni ston pa la// lce ni de la rab bstan bya// gang zhig ma mchu ston pa la// ko ske de la rab bstan bya// gang zhig mgrin pa reg pa la// lto ba de la rab bstan bya//
273b4: gang zhig lto ba ston pa la// lte ba de la rab bstan bya// gang zhig mjug ma ston pa la// sa ni de la rab bstan bya// gang zhig lgang pa ston pa la// ling ga de la rab bstan bya// gang zhig pus mo ston pa la// byin pa de la/
273b5: rab bstan bya// gang zhig lag pa ston pa la// dpung pa de la rab bstan bya// gang zhig rkang pa ston pa la// rkang mthil de la rab bstan bya// gang zhig sor mo ston pa la// sen mo de la rab bstan bya// gang zhigs ni ston pa//
273b6: la// nam mkha' de la rab bstan bya// gang zhig nam mkha' ston pa la// nyi ma de la rab bstan bya// gang zhig chu bo ston pa la// rgya mtsho de la rab bstan bya// gang zhig sor mo gcig ston pa// legs par 'ongs zhes
273b7: brjod pa yin/ / gang zhig sor mo gnyis ston pa// shin tu legs 'ongs brjod pa yin// g.yas pa'i smin ma sbyar tshul dang // g.yon pa'i sprin sgyur tshul ston pa// slob dpon gnyis dang 'du ba ston// rgyud thams
273b8: cad kyi gsang ba yang dag par sbyor ba las byung ba rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma'i brda ste/ brtag pa'i rgyal po bzhi pa'o// // de nas skye bo dam pa kun// 'du ba yang dag rab bshad bya// de la zas gcig bza' bar bya//

274a1: snod gnyis su yang ma lus brtson// kye bcom ldan 'das 'du ba'i gnas gang lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// gnas dang nye ba'i gnas dang ni// ning dang de bzhin te pa'i nig tshun
274a2: ts+tshan do ha 'du ba de bzhin nye 'du ba/ / dur khrod nye ba'i dur khrod dang // 'thung bcod nye ba'i 'thung gcod nyid// 'di rnams sin bcu gnyis te// sa bcu'i dbang phyug mgon po nyid// 'di ni gzhan gyis brjod mi bya// kye bcom
274a3: ldan 'das gnas la sogs pa gang lags/ / de bzhin du sa bcu gnyis po rnams rgya chen po las 'byung ba bka' drin gyis bsgrub tu gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// gnas ni dzAl+la
274a4: d+ha rar gsungs/ / de bzhin du ni u byin nyid// gnas ni ko la gi ri dang // de bzhin ar bud nyid do// nye gnas go ta ba ri nyid// de bzhin dga' ba'i dbang phyug dang // de bzhin de bi ko Tar bshad// de
274a5: bzhin mal ba nyid dang / / de bzhin kA ma rU par gsungs// o tre zhing ni nyid du gsungs// nye zhing tri sha ku ni dang // de bzhin ko sha la nyid dang // ki laM ka ra ni ci gsungs pa'o// de bzhin lam pa ka nyid dang /
274a6: kan tsi kha ba'i gnas nyid ni// ts+tshan dor yang dag gsungs pa dang // nye ba yi yang tsun do'o// pre ta a hi bA si gsungs// de bzhin khyim gyi lha nyid dang // so raSh+Ta dang gser gling nyid// 'du ba de bzhin nye
274a7: 'du ba/ / nA ga ra dang sin du ni// dur khrod nyid du brjod pa dang // ma ru dang ni ku lu ta// nye ba yi ni dur khrod nyid// snying rje de bzhin las kyi brang // ha ri ke la nyid dang ni// lan tshwa'i rgya mtsho nang song dang //
